items.description: Professor Strange is an action game where you play as a Supreme Mage. Take down your foes with various thrilling moves. Slash and cut your enemies, teleport them to the other dimension, and use your shield to defend yourself. Use your magical superpower and save the world!

items.title: Punch Max
items.description: Punch Max is a high-energy action game starring Max, a super-powered boxer fighting to reclaim his city from lurking evil. Use Max’s unique stretching punches to strike enemies from a distance as you battle through hideouts packed with traps, gear, and fierce bosses. Customize your gloves, power up, and master every level with explosive combos and tactical strikes.

items.title: Ragdoll Ninja: Imposter Hero
items.description: Ragdoll Ninja is a wild physics-based fighting game where you unleash chaotic ninja moves in over-the-top stickman battles. You’ll swing, tumble, and strike with unpredictable flops as you dodge attacks and take down sneaky imposters. Every fight is packed with comedy, action, and ridiculous ragdoll fun you won’t want to miss.

items.title: Random Cards: Tower Defense
items.description: Random Cards: Tower Defense is a tower defense game where you must use your strategy to decide which cards you will use for the battle. Each card has its own strength and its own power. Keep in mind that in order to win, you will need to calculate all the actions. Play out different tower defense scenarios, make wise decisions, and improve your cards.

items.title: Red Stickman vs Monster School 2
items.description: Red Stickman vs Monster School 2 is a platformer shooting game where you battle mobs with bullets. Now the stickman is armed with a pistol, machine gun, uzi, rocket launcher, laser gun, RPG, and much more! Shoot through your undead foes and reach the end in this action-packed stickman adventure! Check out ourstickman gamesfor more.

items.title: Rio Rex
items.description: Rio Rex - cause destruction in Brazil! This time you are let loose in the beautiful Rio de Janeiro but take a look back at the previous cities that have been destroyed in Mexico Rex and LA Rex.

items.title: Riot Assassin
items.description: Riot Assassin is a casual assassin game where you complete various missions to earn money. Retrieve the assassination contract from the guild dungeon, search and find your target on the streets, and kill them! Use your rewards to buy and upgrade your equipment. Get ready, assassin!

items.title: Robot Police Iron Panther
items.description: When the monster alien come to attack the earth, there's nobody can save us except the police robot. Build your own Iron Panther robot and fight the monster in epic fighting! Looking for more challenges? Hop on toCrash Arena Turbo Stars.

items.title: Robowars
items.description: Robowars is a thrilling 2D-pixel art game where you battle as one of humanity's last survivors against powerful robots in a futuristic world. Explore procedurally generated rooms, defeat robotic monsters with quick reflexes, and collect powerful weapons from four elemental categories. Every adventure offers a unique challenge in the fight to save humanity.

items.title: Rooftop Snipers
items.description: Rooftop Snipers is a chaotic two-button action sniper game where you can only shoot and jump. You can play the game with a friend or on the computer. It’s one of our many amazing two-player games you can play with friends!

items.title: Run
items.description: Run! Avoid the holes in the corridor. Run into the walls to rotate the screen. The best game in these series is definitelythe last one, Run 3. You should go play it now!

items.title: Run 3
items.description: Explore outer space in Run 3. Run 3 is an incredibly addicting, endless runner-type action/platforming game in which you play as a little grey alien. The little alien is trespassing in an architecturally challenged area that is floating in space. After trespassing in the prohibited zone which is full of increasing amounts of dangerous holes, you run. If you fall into one of the holes, you will find yourself lost in space so make sure to watch your step!

items.title: Runic Curse
items.description: Runic Curse is an action-adventure game where you step into the boots of Adrian, a shipwreck survivor stranded on a mysterious island. As you explore ancient ruins and cursed lands, uncover the secrets behind the Rune Curse and search for your lost crew. Face danger, solve mysteries, and embrace your fate in a world shrouded in shadows.

items.title: Samurai Madness
items.description: Samurai Madness is an action game that is a mix of roguelite, action, and casual play styles. Lead the fierce samurai warrior on his way to take vengeance on the evil syndicate! Prove your dexterity in this action game full of challenging encounters. Be smart, fast, and agile. Make wise and swift decisions.

items.title: Sandbox City
items.description: Sandbox City - Cars, Zombies, Ragdolls! is a zombie game where you can explore freely and drive around the city, but, be careful of the zombie's infection! Find the zombies and kill them before the infection spreads around and the city.

items.title: School Wars
items.description: School Wars is a real time strategy game that pits 4 different schools against each other in a huge turf war. You'll be playing as the gray school, and you'll attempt to take over by letting your units sit on the card face tiles until it changes to your school's color. The more tiles you control, the faster you'll get extra fighters. You win the game by taking over all of the tiles on screen.

items.title: Senya and Oscar vs Zombies
items.description: Senya and Oscar vs Zombies is a 2D side-scrolling game where you play as Senya, who needs to survive the zombie apocalypse. Later, you will find a cute orange cat that you named Oscar, and it will accompany you to kill all the zombies! Loot some useful items to equip such as helmet, armor, and weapon. Collect money and use it to upgrade yourself. Get ready to survive in the zombie world.

items.title: Shadow Ninja Revenge
items.description: Shadow Ninja Revenge is an action-platformer game where you play as a ninja seeking revenge on a man named Takeda who kidnapped your son. Use your shuriken and sword to take down the enemies and dash through the environment to the next stage.

items.title: Shark Simulator Beach Killer
items.description: Shark Simulator Beach Killer is exactly as it sounds – a simulation that allows you to control a 3D shark in shallow waters and the aim is to attack any living thing and rack up a huge amount of kills! This game certainly isn’t for the feint hearted and there is a lot of blood and gore so be prepared! The controls are simple – you control the shark using the WASD keys and attack using the space bar.

items.title: Silly Walkers
items.description: Silly Walkers is an action game where you can design and create your robot. The goal of the game is to save the town from Monsters. Use your robot to navigate obstacles and overcome challenges to save the day. Will you be able to complete your mission and save the city? It's up to you to find out in Silly Walker.

items.title: Siren Head: Playing in the Forest
items.description: Siren Head: Playing in the Forest immerses you in a gripping action game where an accident leaves you stranded in a dark forest. Your sole objective is to escape this eerie nightmare, but the terrifying Siren Head stands in your way. Survive the encounter and gather car parts to repair your vehicle and flee from this horrifying creature. Beware of the imposing and haunting 3D model of the Lilac-Headed monster, ready to send shivers down your spine. Experience an unexpected plot as you strive to survive and confront the Siren Head. Brace yourself for an intense final battle, where your skills will be put to the test in this chilling horror story. Can you conquer the nightmare and save your family?

items.title: Slash Royal
items.description: Slash Royal is a casual survival game where you fight until you’re the last player standing. Dash around the map securing various weapons to use against your opponents. Whittle your enemies down to none and be the only survivor in the arena to win the match.

items.title: Slasher
items.description: Slasher is a stickman action game where you slash down your opponents. Get money to buy random items and merge them to make a better weapon and head armor. Let the stickman deathmatch begin!

items.title: Smash Block Arena
items.description: Smash Block Arena is a chaotic boxing game where you dive into ragdoll mayhem with wild physics and unpredictable brawls. Pick your blocky fighter, drag to move, and unleash outrageous punches in fast-paced arenas. With random weapons, quick matches, and hilarious knockouts, every fight turns into a stunt-filled showdown of pure, blocky madness.

items.title: Smile Slime
items.description: Smile Slime is a physics arcade game where you take control of the orange slime ball that always smiling to smash and destroy the enemy's head using amazing speed and agility. Slow down time and aim at the enemy's head. Try to bypass all the difficult and tricky obstacles. Good luck!

items.title: Sonny
items.description: Sonny is an epic RPG-battle game.

items.title: Soul Grinder
items.description: Soul Grinder is a survival game to avoid and use your dark magic power to kill your enemies. Try to survive as long as you can and don't forget to collect the gems to upgrade your power.

items.title: Soul Not Found
items.description: Soul Not Found is an idle-incremental game with an undead army and battle theme.

items.title: Space Cats Battle Arena
items.description: Space Cats Battle Arena brings an action-packed fusion of space shooter and battle arena genres. Create your unique space battleship by merging blocks with an array of weapons, armor, generators, lasers, rockets, and more. Engage in thrilling PvP duels in the cool arena of war strategy. Unlock new technologies, craft loot, and build your dream battleship. Customize your ship for speed, power, or impenetrable defenses using different blocks with unique abilities. With 14 maps, 35 types of weapons, blocks, and devices, the outer space sandbox war strategy offers endless possibilities. Challenge your friend to PvP battles and immerse yourself in the mayhem space shooter war. Take command, launch your powerful ship, and dominate the master duel space battle!

items.title: Space Flight
items.description: Space Flight is a pixelated survival game set in space. Fly your ship around and keep it intact through an endless barrage of missile attacks. Collect power-ups to help you survive for longer. Save up your money and use it to buy new spaceships that are cooler and more powerful!

items.title: Space Hex: War Merge Shooter
items.description: Space Hex: War Merge Shooter is a strategic space shooter where every hex on your ship shapes the outcome of battle. Merge special galaxy weapons to boost firepower, gain extra lives, or create shields. Equip your ship wisely and fine-tune your tactics as you face relentless waves of enemies in this immersive space fight simulator.

items.title: Space Survivor
items.description: Space Survivor is a 2D action game where you must survive by killing the aliens. Start the game with one skill of your choice and progress by filling your experience bar to get new skills and upgrades. Avoid touching the enemies, and stay alive!

items.title: Space Wars Battleground
items.description: Space Wars Battleground is an action battle game set in a faraway galaxy where battles are fast, numerous, and to the death. The game features numerous characters that you play with and against people from around the world to dominate the competitive leaderboard and reach the heights of galactic victory with the support of your fellow fighters.

items.title: SpaceWars
items.description: SpaceWars is an action merge game with a cool galactic theme. Combine various space troops, space robots, and spaceships to create mighty armies in distant galaxies. Get to the space battle and destroy your opponents. May the merge be with you!

items.title: Spearfishing
items.description: Spearfishing is a realistic underwater adventure where you explore lakes, seas, and oceans in search of marine life and hidden treasures. Armed with scuba gear and an upgradeable harpoon, you’ll hunt over 30 species, from carp to sharks, while navigating coral reefs and avoiding deadly predators. Each dive brings new challenges, rewards, and breathtaking discoveries.

items.title: Spider Boy Run
items.description: Spider Boy Run is an arcade game that puts you in the shoes of Spider Boy, leaping across rooftops and evading obstacles. Collect skill cards to perform acrobatic jumps, tap to soar high, and experience the thrill of mid-air maneuvers and graceful landings. It's a fast-paced adventure that will keep you hooked!

items.title: SquadBlast
items.description: SquadBlast is an action multiplayer game, a run-and-gun shooter set in the dystopian world set in 2042. With deep class-based combat, each hero brings unique abilities to the battlefield, requiring strategic mastery for victory. The game seamlessly blends the intensity of FPS gameplay with dynamic movement options, offering a refreshing take on the genre. Engage in meaty multiplayer modes, explore diverse maps, and wield various weapons, from assault rifles to experimental supa weapons. Join the fight against oppressive forces, where every bullet matters, and skill reigns supreme.

items.title: Steam Heart
items.description: Steam Heart is a thrilling 2D puzzle platformer game set in a captivating steampunk world. Step into intricate, gear-filled environments where your mission is to fuel each level’s steam engine by collecting coal, adjusting valves, and releasing steam. Unlock the safe to reveal the hidden artifacts.

items.title: Stick Archers Battle
items.description: Stick Archers Battle is a fun archery game you can play by yourself or with your friend locally. Try to shoot arrows at your opponent by adapting to the changing environments and physics. Guess the right angles and distance so your arrows can get to your friend accurately. The one who reaches five scores first will win the game.

items.title: Stick Epic Fighter
items.description: Stick Epic Fighter is an action-packed, arcade physics-based fighting game where you are in control of a stick fighter to battle enemies in a dynamic, geometric world. Your mission is to evolve your character into an unstoppable force by unlocking powerful upgrades, mastering epic combos, and unleashing devastating fatalities that will destroy your foes. Conquer waves of enemies with precision and skill as you dominate each battle. Only after crushing every opponent will you unlock the portal to the next level, where even more significant challenges await. Sharpen your reflexes, perfect your strategies, and prove you have what it takes.

items.title: Stick Ragdoll Battle Simulator
items.description: Stick Ragdoll Battle Simulator is an action-packed strategy game that throws you into chaotic stickman warfare powered by wild ragdoll physics. Assemble your army, plan your formations, and unleash all-out battles where strategy meets slapstick mayhem. Every clash is unpredictable, every victory satisfying—can you outwit the madness and lead your stick forces to triumph?

items.title: Stickman Archero Fight
items.description: Stickman Archero Fight is a stickman action arcade game where you take control of a skilled stickman warrior and battle through waves of enemies using a variety of powerful weapons. As you progress, you'll move through different portals, each leading to new stages filled with increasingly tough opponents. Upgrade your stickman’s abilities, equip stronger weapons, and unlock special skills to become an unstoppable fighting machine. The fast-paced combat, strategic weapon choices, and thrilling challenges keep you on your toes as you fight to conquer every level and rise to the top of the leaderboard!

items.title: Stickman Army: The Defenders
items.description: The green army is fighting the red army in an epic battle... Defend the White House at all costs and become victorious!

items.title: Stickman Bullet Warriors
items.description: Stickman Bullet Warriors is a stickman shooting game to take down the other stickman enemies. Try to use as few bullets as possible to get a perfect score.

items.title: Stickman Clash
items.description: Stickman Clash is a thrilling action battle game where you battle as stickman warriors armed with an array of exciting weapons. Engage in fast-paced combat, outsmart opponents, and showcase your skills in dynamic arenas. The game's captivating action and challenging mechanics keep you hooked as you strive to become the ultimate stickman champion!

items.title: Stickman Destruction 3 Heroes
items.description: Stickman Destruction 3 Heroes is a ragdoll physics action game. Crash the stickman into obstacles, send him tumbling down staircases and through walls into oblivious bystanders. Cause as much destruction as possible to earn the most gold!

items.title: Stickman Fighting: Super War
items.description: Stickman Fighting: Super War is a ragdollphysics gamewhere you fight with other stickman warriors and be the supreme hero. Choose your weapon and attack enemies in this epic stickman battleground!

items.title: Stickman Epic
items.description: Stickman Epic is a fast-paced action arcade game that puts your fearless stickman hero on a mission to eliminate hordes of relentless zombies. In this adrenaline-charged adventure, your objective is to battle through waves of enemies while upgrading your character to become stronger and more resilient to even more difficult challenges along the way to victory.

items.title: Stickman Fighter: Mega Brawl
items.description: Stickman Fighter: Mega Brawl is a stickman battle game in which you must survive from the enemies by attacking them at the right moment.

items.title: Stickman Fighting 3D
items.description: It is time to fight. Choose your favorite stickman and perform awesome combos to take the opponents down!

items.title: Stickman History Battle
items.description: Stickman History Battle is a battle game where you can fight through different eras (the primitive, Vikings and knights, modern times, and the future) together with the stickman heroes. Build your great kingdom of Stickmen and fight against enemy civilizations. May the strongest win!

items.title: Stickman King
items.description: Stickman King is an action-packed arcade adventure where you guide a brave stickman through four distinct biomes. Face relentless enemies and defeat powerful bosses to prove your strength. Each battle tests your skill and agility as you strive to claim the title of King of Stickmen. Do you have what it takes to reign supreme?

items.title: Stickman Kombat 2D
items.description: Stickman Kombat 2D is an action-packed fighting game where you battle unique characters, each with their own moves, styles, and special attacks. Fight your way through challenging towers, defeating enemies to unlock new fighters and test your skills. The game delivers thrilling effects, including camera shakes, flashes, zooms, animations, and powerful special moves, that make every fight feel intense. With deep mechanics such as stamina management, combo chains, juggling airborne foes, and mastering blocks and breakers, Stickman Kombat 2D challenges you to take control of the fight or lose it.

items.title: Stickman Miners Wars
items.description: Stickman Miners Wars is a defense game where the bad guys take your kingdom, and as a king, it is your job to get it back! Recruit different armies like warriors, archers, wizards, and miners to help you out. Command them to attack the enemy's towers and castle. Collect gold and mine resources to make your kingdom stronger. Defend your towers and castle from bad guys and take over theirs! Can you save the kingdom?

items.title: Stickman Parkour Master
items.description: Stickman Parkour Master is an action parkour game where you help the stickman jump over obstacles, climb ledges, and get to the portal! There are many cool skins available that you can collect. Upgrade your desktop display in the main menu to make it look more fun! Run through many biomes, perform tricks along your way, and conquer all the levels.

items.title: Stickman Project
items.description: Stickman Project is a 2D physics-based action battle game where you take on your opponents by unleashing mutant chaos. You’ll battle through dynamic levels using fluid combat and fast reflexes. Choose between endless more or level-based missions and test how long you can survive in this intense, stick-figure showdown. Made by Neron's Brother, Creators of Supreme Duelist.

items.title: Stickman WW2
items.description: Stickman WW2 is a war strategy game with to fight for any country in World War 2! Assemble the most powerful army of stickmen from machine guns, flamethrowers, cannons, and tanks. Take command of an army, conquer the world, and achieve great victories! Let the strongest stickman armies win the war in this funstickman game!

items.title: Stickman Zombie vs Stickman Hero
items.description: Stickman Zombie vs Stickman Hero is an action platform game where you can play both as a hero and a zombie boss. When you play as a stickman hero, shoot all the zombies and gather other stickmen to be your allies. When you play as a zombie boss, you need to chase the stickman hero and make all his allies to be zombies. Good luck!

items.title: Street Fighter Simulator
items.description: Street Fighter Simulator is an action-packed fighting game where you rise through the ranks by mastering your combat skills, unlocking new abilities, and battling fierce opponents in dynamic and immersive environments. Whether you’re in Arcade Mode enjoying custom battles or in Career Mode earning your place as a champion, every fight brings you closer to becoming the Ultimate Street Fighter.

items.title: Summoner Master
items.description: Summoner Master is a captivating action game where you summon powerful creatures to help you defeat your enemies. Use your strategic skills to summon the right monster and choose the perfect time to unleash their devastating attacks. With each level, your enemies become more challenging, and you must adapt your strategy to succeed. Become the master summoner and claim victory over your opponents in this thrilling adventure.

items.title: Super Spin
items.description: Super Spin is an action battle game that combines the thrill of merging mechanics with intense, high-stakes spinner battles in a fast-paced arena setting. The game brings dynamic gameplay, strategic challenges, and vibrant visuals with every spin, creating an electrifying gaming experience. Customize and craft your ultimate spinner by merging powerful components, then enter real-time battles where you’ll need skill, speed, and strategy to come out on top.

items.title: Super Thrower
items.description: Get ready for an arcade-packed adventure in Super Thrower, an adventure game where precision meets chaos! You’ll navigate levels by launching objects at enemies with a powerful throw that’ll leave them flying to their demise. With every toss, you’ll need sharp strategy and aim to conquer the level, and if you’re not quick enough, it could be game over. Amp up your gameplay by unlocking skins that let you take on the battlefield in serious style. Whether you're flinging with finesse or unleashing pure mayhem, Super Thrower will have you hooked!

items.title: Super Utilizer
items.description: Super Utilizer is a thrilling arcade space shooter blending fast-paced action with match-3 strategy. Embark on a daring mission to clean up space by battling bizarre monsters, sorting interstellar trash, and upgrading your spaceship. Protect trade routes, conquer challenging bosses, and dive into modes like "Survival" and "Invasion." Adventure awaits beyond the stars—gear up and make your mark!

items.title: Survival Hero: Merge RPG
items.description: Survival Hero: Merge RPG is an action game in a fantasy world where you must battle with wild animals, evil monsters, and even scary dragons! Merge and equip your hero with a powerful weapon and strong cuirass. You have been called upon to save the world. Become an invincible knight or archer, try to level up, kill enemies, and buy and merge equipment to become stronger!

items.title: Swop Shoot
items.description: Swop Shoot is a shooting game where you control these 2 stickmen as a single unit. The blue stickman can only kill the blue enemies, and the red stickman can only kill the red enemies. Once you reach the end of the stage, you will merge and become the purple stickman to kill the boss.

items.title: Tailed Demon Slayer
items.description: Tailed Demon Slayer is an action-packed idle RPG where you join a brave hero fighting to reclaim Bestia from undead bosses. You’ll explore dangerous dungeons, unlock powerful skills, and collect unique weapons to sharpen your strength. Train hard, gather epic gear, and rise as the ultimate champion in a world teeming with thrilling battles and endless growth.

items.title: Takeover
items.description: Your kingdom is at war! Build up your armies, defeat your enemies, and take over their cities in this mouse-controlled real-time fantasy strategy game.

items.title: Tank Battle: War Commander
items.description: Tank Battle: War Commander is an epic turn based strategy game in which you must choose to fight for either the Axis or Allied powers during World War 2. Whichever side you choose, you must fight to repel the enemy invasion and eradicate their forces. During each turn, you must choose which course of action to take – you can choose between three different actions. Once you have chosen, a slot machine will randomly decide how effective your actions were.

items.title: Tank Merge Royal
items.description: Tank Merge Royal is an action game that combines elements of tank warfare, strategy, and resource management. In this game, players are tasked with merging various materials to craft and customize their own tanks, which they then use to engage in battles against other players.

items.title: Tank Wars
items.description: Tank Wars is an action game where you engage in explosive 3D turn-based tank warfare! Experience intense battles with strategic tactics and thrilling action. Choose from 5 unique tanks and navigate meticulously designed maps. Unleash devastating power-ups and dominate the battlefield. Play single, two, or four-player game modes, including a challenging campaign. With stunning graphics and addictive gameplay, Tank Wars delivers the ultimate tank warfare experience. Get ready for explosive battles and become the master of strategic tank tactics!

items.title: TankCraft
items.description: TankCraft is a battle tank game where you must take revenge on the villain who infected your tank mate and turned them into an evil tank. Find out who did it and destroy him. Build the strongest tank and install a super gun on it so you can defeat all your enemies. Don't forget about the super boosters also! Only by building the best and strongest tank, you can defeat all the evil tanks and their bosses.

items.title: Tanks 2D: Tank Wars
items.description: Tanks 2D: Tank Wars is a tankbattle gamewith various tanks to buy and upgrade, and wars to be fought. Mine gold to upgrade yourtanksand buy new vehicles. Jump into the game and fight on the fields of vehicular combat.

items.title: Tanks 2D: War and Heroes!
items.description: Tanks 2D: War and Heroes! is an epic tank battle game where you can buy tanks, upgrade them, and start the battle! There are many selections of real historical tanks to play. Equip yourself with repair kits and missile weapons to destroy a wide range of unique enemies and bosses. Can you defeat them all?

items.title: Tanks Arena io: Craft & Combat
items.description: Tanks Arena.io: Craft & Combat is a thrilling PvP action tank battle game where you are combating intense tank wars with a vehicle built and customized by none other than yourself. You will get to challenge players from around the world, so be prepared for plenty of surprises and a variety of strategies from your opponent.

items.title: Tanks of the Galaxy
items.description: Tanks of the Galaxy is a top-down tank shooter game that delivers explosive 2D warfare. Engage in thrilling battles as you annihilate enemy tanks and obliterate environmental obstacles. Utilize a wide range of weapons to dismantle your adversaries while skillfully evading their attacks. Stay resilient with shields to emerge victorious. Liberate planets from invading tanks, earn coins, and enhance your tank with powerful upgrades and weapons. Immerse yourself in addictive gameplay and dominate the battlefield!

items.title: Tanks PVP Showdown
items.description: Tanks PVP Showdown is a real-time multiplayer PvP action game to destroy your opponent's tank. You can use a variety of weapons to deal massive damage to your enemies. Earn some money to unlock new stronger tanks.

items.title: Tanks vs Zombies: Tank Battle
items.description: Tank vs Zombies is an action-packed tank game where you engage in thrilling battles against hordes of zombies and challenging bosses. With a wide range of tanks and skins to choose from, such as the Mause, E 100, T-35, and more, players can tailor their experience to their preferences. The inclusion of unique elements like well-aimed shots, bullet ricochets, and dangerous traps adds depth and excitement to the game. Strategic use of secret traps like circular saws, spikes, and concrete blocks enhances the tactical aspect of the battles.

items.title: Tavern Rumble: Roguelike Card
items.description: Tavern Rumble is a strategy roguelike deckbuilding card game. Begin your adventure with basic mercenary cards, strengthen your deck, and face challenging bosses. Explore card synergies and experience a roguelike journey with random dungeons, loot, mercenaries, and permanent death. Craft a unique deck, encounter creatures, take blessings, and become a legendary monster slayer. The game offers playable classes, cute pixel art, easy-to-learn mechanics, and the ability to play offline or online. Play now for a perfect card game break!

items.title: The Spear Stickman
items.description: The Spear Stickman is a fun and fast-paced stick game of brutal spear throwing combat. You control a stickman armed only with a spear - you must kill the other stickmen who appear at random on different platforms and attempt to kill you. Using your mouse you must adjust the angle of your shot and aim quickly to take down your foe!

items.title: Tiger Simulator 3D
items.description: Tiger Simulator 3D is a simulation game developed by CyberGoldFinch. Experience life as one of nature’s fiercest apex predators. Explore a beautiful habitat hunting for food, completing quests, and searching for your tiger soulmate.

items.title: Tilo
items.description: Tilo is a physics-based platform game with 40 challenging levels. You have to collect shards to complete the levels.

items.title: TimeWarriors
items.description: Time Warriors is a strategy game where you lead your army through history, from the Stone Age to futuristic battles. Upgrade your troops, build powerful bases, and use unique units and tactics to defeat your enemies. Master every era, outsmart your opponents, and rise to become the ultimate commander in this epic war game.

items.title: TNTcraft
items.description: TNTcraft is a Bomberman-like game in a Minecraft world where your mission is to explode the zombie spawner using TNT. Make a team with an AI or play with your friend locally. Make tactics and explode zombies, but beware, some of the zombies can explode and may hurt you. There are four different maps available. Fight against zombies with your friend, make tactics, and blast your TNTs!

items.title: Tower Bastion: Zombie Defense
items.description: Tower Bastion: Zombie Defense is an intense horde-survival action game where you command a hero in a desperate stand against waves of the undead. Arm yourself with powerful firearms, deploy strategic defenses, and fight through chaos to protect your base from total collapse.

items.title: Tower vs Goblins
items.description: Tower vs Goblins is a thrilling tower defense game where you defend your base against relentless goblin invasions. Strategically build and upgrade your fortress with powerful weapons like ballistae and magic crystals. Explore a medieval world filled with epic battles, unique challenges, and dangerous foes as you outwit enemies and safeguard your stronghold!

items.title: TowerWatch - PVP Battle
items.description: TowerWatch - PVP Battle is a tower defense game to fight the horde and other players using guns, traps, and magic. Battle and defend your tower in PVE & PVP Battles. Earn XP to upgrade your heroes & traps. Earn Battle Pass XP to win amazing skins, props, and rewards. Defend the Tower and defeat the evil forces!

items.title: Trap Craft
items.description: Trap Craft is a defense game where there is a hacker who is ready to fulfill any desire of a Princess, Noob, Pro, Herobrine, and the rest if they want to play a game that the hacker prepared. The game is to protect the portal from the zombies' attack. Each character has its own ending, so find out all of them! Set traps and fight against the zombies, survive, and also get yourself a pet for your company.

items.title: Trojan War
items.description: Trojan War is a tower defense game where you find yourself in the midst of a war and must defend yourself against relentless enemies. Assemble your army and strategically position towers to counter the enemy's attacks. Upgrade your weapons and towers as you progress through each level to strengthen your defenses. Employ strategic thinking and skillful tactics to effectively attack your enemies and avoid defeat. Prepare yourself for the challenges ahead and strive for victory in this intense war!

items.title: Two Sides of Hell: Portable Edition
items.description: Two Sides of Hell: Portable Edition is a 2D action game where you must defend the Ally's base from relentless enemy hordes. Take on waves of foes, test your skills in challenging boss fights, and see if you can survive the chaos. Developed by the creators of Two Sides of Hell on Steam, this bite-sized version packs intense action into a portable experience. Will you rise to the challenge and protect the base?

items.title: Viscous Ventures
items.description: Viscous Ventures is a 2D arcade platformer game where you must reach the finish by overcoming the monsters and obstacles along your way. Experience the epic journey across land, sea, and skies, utilizing diverse power-ups to conquer this 2D world!

items.title: Wacky Dungeon
items.description: Wacky Dungeon is a cartoonish action-packed RPG in which you can fight interactive battles against the weirdest of enemies.

items.title: War Groups
items.description: War Groups is a strategic war game set in the dangerous and mysterious Zone, where your goal is to capture all sectors and eliminate your enemies. Choose from over 10 unique factions, including stalkers, bandits, military forces, and sectarians, and build your army by collecting powerful artifacts.

items.title: War State IO: Conquer Battles
items.description: War State IO: Conquer Battles is a fast-paced strategy game where you lead your army, capture enemy camps, and expand your territory in real-time tactical warfare. Master the battlefield with quick thinking and smart maneuvers to claim victory.

items.title: Warrior Bee Apocalypse
items.description: Warrior Bee Apocalypse is a level-based horde survival game where you take on waves of enemy insects as a fearless warrior bee. Dodge, fight, and survive as the swarm closes in.

items.title: Warrior Clash
items.description: Warrior Clash is a thrilling war strategy game where only the strongest prevail. Take command of fearless warriors, train elite units, and engage in high-stakes battles. Outsmart your opponents with clever tactics and assert your dominance on the battlefield. Every decision you make shapes your journey in this epic challenge of strength and strategy!

items.title: We Not Survive
items.description: We not survive is an idle tower defense game that challenges players to stay alive in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies. As a survivor, you must defend your base from waves of terrifying monsters using a range of weapons and facilities that can be upgraded. The game's main currency is petroleum, which can be extracted and used to upgrade your base's weapons, projectiles, and health regeneration capabilities. As you progress through the game, you can unlock surprising unique powers and facilities that help you to defend yourself better against the increasingly challenging waves of enemies! So, are you ready to take on the zombie apocalypse and stay alive?

items.title: Weapons Ragdoll Arena
items.description: Weapons Ragdoll Arena is an action ragdoll game that throws you into an arcade battle where weapons fly in over-the-top ragdoll showdowns and every item packs unpredictable impact. Outsmart your rivals and survive the chaos as you climb your way to become the ultimate throwing champion!

items.title: Wild Animal Zoo City Simulator
items.description: Wild Animal Zoo City Simulator is a classic rampage game from HGames who have developed other similar themed titles. The animals of the city zoo are tired of being held captive and it is your task to help them escape and cause mayhem on the city streets! You can choose from a range of different animals including a crocodile, an elephant, a hippo and a lion.

items.title: Wizard.io
items.description: Wizard.io is an action game set in a realm of magic and mystery. Engage in intense duels amidst enchanting arenas teeming with mystical foes. Unleash elemental spells and cunning enchantments to overcome your adversaries. Explore dynamic spell combinations, collect magical orbs, and fortify your wizard's home base for strategic advantages. Unearth powerful artifacts to turn the tides in your favor.

items.title: Wolf Simulator: Wild Animals 3D
items.description: Wolf Simulator: Wild Animals is a fun and interesting animal simulation game in which you take control of a lone wolf. You must help the wolf survive against the harsh realities of the wild and try to find food and shelter. Move around this open world and hunt for prey - tackle other animals such as deer, bears and foxes - you must show your power and prove your strength as a hunter!

items.title: World Battle of the Future
items.description: World Battle of the Future is a battle strategy game in a post-apocalyptic world with memorable characters and a variety of weapons and skills. Try your best to survive the battle, develop your soldiers, strengthen weapons, and improve your armor and skills. Get resources to buy more military equipment and warriors. Gain experience in completing various missions. Upgrade your army by improving skills and weapons. Strengthen your military base. An epic battle for resources and domination of the world awaits you!

items.title: World Z Defense - Zombie Defense
items.description: World Z Defense - Zombie Defense is a thrilling action defense game where players must fight against hordes of zombies trying to overrun the world. In this post-apocalyptic scenario, your mission is to defend cities across the globe by strategically placing soldiers with different weapons, each offering unique stats like damage, shooting speed, and reload speed.

items.title: Zombie Coming: Roguelike Siege
items.description: Zombie Coming: Roguelike Siege is a roguelike game where you must defend against relentless zombie hordes using your skills, mines, barriers, and turrets. Strategically place mines and barriers to create a formidable defense line and use unique hero abilities like summoning an excavator to wreak havoc among the undead. Survive each day to earn rewards and face a variety of zombies, big and small, fast and slow, fiery and icy. Embrace your tactical prowess and build your defense in your style to conquer this chaotic onslaught.

items.title: Zombie Survival
items.description: Zombie Survival is a survival game where you must protect your home from the zombie's attack at all costs! Shoot the zombies through your home windows and repair the broken ones to slow down the invaders. Unlock new rooms to enhance your defense area, and don't forget to upgrade your weapon to handle the increasing number of zombies at each wave. Avoid getting stuck in the corners, or the zombie will eat your brain!

items.title: Zombie Drive Survivor
items.description: Zombie Drive Survivor is an action game where you get to drive a cool car and bravely face off against hordes of zombies! Bump into the zombies to crush them, but remember to watch out for your car's damage level because you don't want your car to be damaged and burnt down. Collect exp that the zombies drop every time you beat them. The exp will help you level up and become stronger. Unlock and pick awesome weapons to make defeating zombies even more fun! Many different types of zombies and enemy cars will try to stop you! But don't worry; you can earn coins to unlock new, more powerful cars and discover all sorts of cool weapons like machine guns, shotguns, rams, Molotov cocktails, rocket launchers, flamethrowers, harpoons, mines, traps, and more. There are two different game modes you can enjoy. Level game mode, where you can practice and have fun, and Endless Mode for you who want to challenge yourself to face wave after wave of zombies. The choice is yours!

items.title: Zombie Horde: Build & Survive
items.description: Zombie Horde: Build & Survive is an intense action survival game where staying alive depends on a combination of strategy, well-timed decisions, and action. Build traps, guide your hero through relentless waves of the undead, and upgrade your gear regularly to keep up with the ever-growing number of zombies aimed at destroying you. Stay sharp and push your limits to see just how many zombies you can take on at once.

items.title: Z Hunter
items.description: Z Hunter is an action-packed shooter game where you defend your base from relentless zombie hordes. You're the commander, leading troops against waves of undead enemies. Save survivors to expand your base and unlock new resources. Upgrade your character, explore new areas, and discover a unique weapon at each location. Get ready for an epic battle for survival!

items.title: Zombie World Escape
items.description: Zombie World Escape is a thrilling survival adventure set in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by the undead. As the bunker’s guardian, you’ll battle relentless zombie hordes, rescue survivors, and gather essential supplies. Face challenging bosses and make critical choices to protect humanity’s last hope. Every moment is a test of your courage and strategy.

items.title: Zombocalypse
items.description: Zombocalypse is an awesome zombie blasting game in which you fight waves and waves of undead.

items.title: 911: Cannibal
items.description: 911: Cannibal is a spine-chilling horror game where you have to escape the house of a maniacal cannibal. Playing as a kidnapped teenager, your mission is to find items that help you escape by solving various puzzles, all while covering your tracks to avoid detection. Can you outsmart the cannibal and escape his clutches, or will you be his next victim? Explore the ominous house, uncover notes, and unravel the twisted story of Minnesota's most frightening maniac.

items.title: 911: Prey
items.description: 911: Prey is a scary horror game with puzzles. In this game, you are a kidnapped teenager that needs to escape from a cannibal maniac who brought you to his house. Search for any useful items to help you get out of his house. Be very careful and cover up your tracks so that the maniac does not suspect anything!

items.title: Aidan in Danger
items.description: Aidan in Danger is an exciting platformer where you play as Aidan, a young red-haired elf armed with a slingshot. Your mission is to protect Drakor, the last dragon on Earth, from an interdimensional villain bent on world domination. Battle dangerous monsters, travel through time, and navigate challenging levels in this epic adventure. With immersive gameplay, stunning graphics, and a gripping story, help Aidan save Drakor and restore peace to the land!

items.title: Antarctica 88
items.description: Antarctica 88 is ahorror gamewhere you’re part of a rescue squad investigating a research station in Antarctica after communications went dark. It's up to you to solve the mystery. The game is filled with monsters, and there are various weapons to collect and puzzles to solve. Explore and discover objects to uncover more of the story. Can you open all the endings and find out the whole story?

items.title: Bathroom Escape
items.description: Bathroom Escape is an escape game where you must solve all the puzzles to escape from the bathroom. Find any objects that can be useful, and also, use your logic and memory skills to solve the riddles.

items.title: Black Light Escape
items.description: Black Light Escape is an escape game where you need to use logical reasoning to solve the most diverse puzzles. It takes attention and intelligence to escape, the game has a unique system of hints where the black light can guide you to the most diverse challenges responses.

items.title: Black Light Escape 2
items.description: Black Light Escape 2 is an immersive escape series that tests your logical reasoning skills through a variety of challenging puzzles. Escaping requires keen attention and intelligence, but fear not, as the game offers a unique hint system using black light to guide you towards solving diverse challenges. Engage your mind, have fun, and prepare for an exciting escape adventure!

items.title: Captains Idle
items.description: Captains Idle is a pirate game where you sail the seven seas as the Pirate King! Assemble your crewmates, upgrade your ship, and embark on an adventure, but beware of enemy pirate ships trying to sink you! Explore the islands, defeat bandits, find your X mark, and claim your treasure. Remember, a skilled sailor is made by navigating through rough seas!

items.title: Castle Craft
items.description: Castle Craft is a mystical adventure puzzle game where you merge resources while looking for Fiona's missing husband, Michael, all the while uncovering plenty of mysteries along the way. Begin in a fog-covered land, using ancient keys to explore hidden realms and trace the path of your lost family through different eras. Discover mysterious lands and piece together an enchanting legacy.

items.title: Cat Life Simulator 3D
items.description: Cat Life Simulator is an adventure game where you experience life as a cat! Explore diverse locations, hunt animals, and complete quests for both animals and humans. Upgrade your skills, collect rare items for your home, and cook food. Help your cat grow, start a family, and raise strong kittens. Customize your cat’s appearance, buy home items, and earn rewards for your achievements!

items.title: Cinema Panic 2
items.description: In Cinema Panic 2 you have to serve customers in the most popular cinema in town! Serve them hotdogs, popcorn, sodas and everything else that a cinemagoer wants.

items.title: Clicker Heroes Escape
items.description: Clicker Heroes Escape is an adventure escape game set in the enchanting world of Clicker Heroes. Solve intricate puzzles and uncover hidden clues to escape from various mythical realms. This game blends challenging escape mechanics with clicker gameplay, offering a fresh experience for both Clicker Heroes fans and puzzle lovers. Embark on a thrilling adventure filled with unique challenges and strategic choices. Are you ready to overcome obstacles and break free? Dive and experience a captivating blend of puzzle-solving and idle gaming!

items.title: Computer Office Escape
items.description: Computer Office Escape is a room escape game in a room with many digital stuff and PCs.

items.title: Cornfield
items.description: Cornfield is a pulse-pounding puzzle-survival game where you must outsmart a relentless corn monster. Navigate a shadowy maze filled with complex challenges, testing your strategy and nerves. Solve puzzles quickly and carefully to find the exit before the terrifying creature catches up and becomes their meal. Every step could be your last in this heart-pounding escape adventure.

items.title: Craft World
items.description: Craft World: Building Games is the new builder simulator where everything is limited only by your imagination! Build various houses of more than 300 unique blocks and decorate the rooms with various decor and furniture! The game has a similar visual style toMinecraft.

items.title: Creative Kill Chamber
items.description: Creative Kill Chamber is a point-and-click adventure with a mission to escape a secure facility filled with heavily armed enemies. As the title says though, you're going to have to be creative in your methods. You need to be able to come up with quick solutions to all of the (probably deadly) problems presented to you. Use anything and everything you can find around you to make sure you get out of there in one piece!

items.title: Crimson Room
items.description: Crimson Room is an escape room game originally developed in Flash. It was one of the first of its kind. Toshimitsu Takagi developed the game in 2004 and helped to popularize the escape room genre. To play the game, simply point and click. See if you can escape the Crimson Room!

items.title: Cube Stories: Escape
items.description: Cube Stories: Escape is an adventure point-and-click puzzle game that guides you into the depths of an abandoned mansion shrouded in mystery. You are a fearless video blogger on an adrenaline-fueled journey to uncover the truth behind a haunting urban legend. With every step you take, the eerie atmosphere tightens its grip, and the mansion’s shadowy corridors pull you deeper into the unknown. As you journey through the dimly lit rooms, cryptic puzzles and hidden clues await, each one unraveling more of the dark secrets concealed within the mansion's ancient walls. Your quick thinking and sharp wits are the only tools between you and this forsaken house's mysteries.

items.title: Daily Kitchen Escape
items.description: Daily Kitchen Escape is a puzzle-packed escape game where each day reveals a new room filled with hidden clues and brain-teasing challenges. Use your wits to solve clever conundrums, crack codes, and uncover secrets as you try to break free. A fresh room awaits daily, how many can you outsmart in a row?

items.title: Daily Room Escape
items.description: Daily Room Escape offers a brain-teasing puzzle adventure game where you are in a unique room filled with intricate riddles and hidden clues. Sharpen your problem-solving skills and unravel mind-bending puzzles to find the key to freedom. Each day brings a new theme, a different set of challenges, and fresh surprises waiting to be discovered. Keep coming back for your daily dose of brain-teasing fun, and see if you have what it takes to outsmart each escape room.

items.title: Dark Stones: Card Battle RPG
items.description: Dark Stones: Card Battle RPG is a strategic card-based battle game set in a dark fantasy world of magic and elemental forces. Assemble a team of humans, orcs, mages, elves, and other creatures to defeat powerful foes, capture their souls, and unlock new powers. Explore lands teeming with danger, from snowy valleys to scorched deserts and realms of the dead, while uncovering hidden secrets and facing epic challenges.

items.title: Design House Escape
items.description: Design House Escape is an escape game where you must navigate through a series of challenging rooms in a mysterious house. Use floor plans and models to strategize your escape. Every corner holds secrets and obstacles to overcome. Can you unravel the mysteries and find your way out?

items.title: Dino Survival: 3D Simulator
items.description: Dino Survival: 3D Simulator is an adventure simulation game that throws you into the wild world of Jurassic Park. Establish your base, venture into uncharted territories, and gather vital resources while facing off against fearsome dinosaurs like Raptors, Triceratops, and the formidable T-Rex. Fortify your defenses to withstand relentless attacks, and launch raids on enemy bases to claim valuable loot. Take on epic battles with elite bosses and even tame dinosaurs to build a powerful prehistoric army under your command.

items.title: Doors Castle
items.description: Doors Castle is a thrilling adventure through a haunted fortress filled with secrets, puzzles, and lurking horrors. Every shadow hides danger, every door holds a mystery. Explore eerie hallways, uncover hidden paths, and stay one step ahead of the creatures stalking the dark.

items.title: Drop Ahead: Sandbox Madness
items.description: Drop Ahead: Sandbox Madness is an adventure game that offers endless fun and creativity. Jump into the excitement by creating and sharing your own levels, or try out those made by players worldwide. Compete for top spots on the leaderboards. With constant updates, fresh challenges, and customizable skins, the fun never stops. Ready to dive into the madness and show off your skills?

items.title: Duck Life: Adventure (Demo)
items.description: Duck Life: Adventure is another episode of Duck Life series in which your duck now embark on an epic adventure full of challenges and hardships to become the superstar!

items.title: DUST - A Post Apocalyptic RPG
items.description: DUST is a text-based adventure game set in a radiated post-apocalyptic world.

items.title: El Dorado Lite
items.description: El Dorado Lite is an adventure game that marks its triumphant return to the web. Join Ace and his friends on an adventurous quest to discover the elusive golden castle, El Dorado. Engage in thrilling battles against global players, seeking the lost city through seven years of growth. For those who embarked on this journey in elementary school, now high school and college students, El Dorado is not just a game – it's a cherished part of your gaming history, creating enduring memories. Experience the excitement through various game modes, starting with the captivating Stage Mode.

items.title: Elevator Room Escape
items.description: Elevator Room Escape is anescape room gamewhere you solve puzzles to open the elevator and get out! Can you solve all the puzzles and escape the elevator?

items.title: Elvenrage
items.description: Elvenrage is a strategy-packed defense game where you play as an elven archer battling waves of orcs in a dangerous fantasy world. Craft gear, mine resources, build magical turrets, and raise a dragon as you fight to protect your realm. Upgrade your weapons, plan your defense, and survive against endless threats.

items.title: Elves Clan: Tricky Adventures
items.description: Elves Clan: Tricky Adventures it's a wild platformer game where you've got to help Triki, Friki, and Kiki get to Chicho's house. But be ready, because everything from platforms to obstacles is out to get you. Snag some unusual coins and Tricky-Piranhas to help you out. It's easy to start, but oh boy, it's a tough one to master. These cheeky elves are up to some pranks, and they need your hand. Are you ready for the challenge?

items.title: Embercry
items.description: Embercry is a thrilling adventure escape game where you unravel the mysterious disappearance from a locked house. Explore the captivating storyline of this room escape quest as you collect hidden clues, search every room, solve intricate puzzles, and ultimately find your way out while uncovering the main mystery. Are you ready to unravel the mystery?

items.title: Epic Mine
items.description: Embark on the ultimate mining adventure in Epic Mine, where strategy meets action! Dig deep into the center of the Earth, organize resource smelting, and maximize your profits to upgrade your skills. But beware—something lurks in the darkness beneath.

items.title: From the Bunker
items.description: From the Bunker is an intense adventure puzzle escape game where the apocalypse has left you stranded in a desolate, crumbling bunker. With limited resources and danger lurking around every corner, your mission is to outlast the harsh environment, scavenge for critical supplies, and plot your escape before time runs out. As you navigate the bunker’s eerie corridors, you'll need to upgrade your tools, defend yourself against unexpected threats, and take on challenges that will push your ingenuity and strategic thinking to the limit.

items.title: Escape Game: Room With a Lamp
items.description: Escape Game: Room With a Lamp is an adventure escape game where you must use logic to complete all the riddles in the house. Can you solve all the riddles? Let's find out!

items.title: Escape or Die
items.description: Escape or Die is an escape room puzzle game. You have 10 minutes to evacuate the room before the bomb explodes. The chances are slim, but if you think fast, you might survive!

items.title: Escape or Die 2
items.description: Escape or Die 2 is an escape room puzzle game. It’s the second game after the originalEscape or Die. You have 10 minutes to get out before poisonous gas fills the room!

items.title: Escape or Die 3
items.description: Escape or Die 3 is an adventure escape game where you must search the room for items that will help you escape. Search items in drawers, boxes, and anything else that you think will help you reach the end. Look carefully at the various patterns around the room and solve the riddles. Good luck to search for your way to escape!

items.title: Escape Room: Strange Case 2
items.description: Escape Room: Strange Case 2 is an adventure-packed escape game that immerses you in a suspenseful journey through the dark and eerie corridors of a mysterious asylum. Unravel sinister secrets, solve intricate puzzles, uncover hidden clues, and unlock doors as you navigate through the haunting environment.

items.title: Escape Series
items.description: Escape Series is an adventure puzzle game where your mission is to search for useful items in various rooms to aid in your escape. Carefully examine every detail around you and use your logic to solve the challenging riddles that stand in your way. Each room presents unique puzzles, requiring sharp observation and clever thinking. Find the clues, solve the puzzles, and make your escape!

items.title: Escaping the Prison
items.description: Escaping the Prison is a wildly unique adventure puzzle game in which you aim to escape from prison! After being thrown in a prison cell, you must use anything and everything at your disposal to escape: teleporters, anti-gravity equipment, toilet plungers—nothing is off limits in your attempt to escape! But be careful because one wrong move or a split-second hesitation could send you right back to your cell—or worse!

items.title: Fancy Pants Adventures World 4: Part 1
items.description: Fancy Pants Adventures World 4: Part 1 invites you to embark on an exhilarating platforming journey like no other. Join the Fancy Pants character in a wild and free-running adventure filled with buttery smooth platforming mechanics. Experience the thrill of precise jumps, slick slides, and stylish moves as you navigate through vibrant and imaginative levels. With the precision of a fountain pen, conquer challenging obstacles and enemies with finesse. Get ready for a fast-paced and visually stunning platform game that will test your skills and keep you entertained for hours. Prepare to embark on an epic platforming adventure and unleash your fancy pants prowess!

items.title: Fancy Pants Adventures World 4: Part 2
items.description: The second episode ofThe Fancy Pants Adventures World 4: Part 1. Your journey continues!

items.title: Foundation Kingdom Build Guard
items.description: Foundation Kingdom Build Guard is a casual simulation adventure game where you can mine, build, farm, and explore new lands. Collect materials from all over the medieval world and use them to restore justice and get rid of darkness. Don't forget that monsters attack you every night. Your medieval kingdom has been invaded by monsters. The whole world was covered in darkness. You have to free the medieval world and its inhabitants from terrible monsters and unravel the mystery of their appearance.

items.title: Frontier
items.description: Frontier is an adventure game set in the wild west where you play as someone who wants to make it big by trading goods with different cities. This desert-filled wasteland won't make it easy for you though, as pirates and bandits try to rob you, and if you're bringing something illegal, authorities may try to catch you. If you're smart and careful, an opportunity to gain a huge fortune by trading is waiting for you in this barren land.

items.title: Frost Land - Snow Survival
items.description: Frost Land - Snow Survival is a strategic base-building game where you battle the harsh cold to stay alive. You’ll wield a flamethrower to melt snow, uncover hidden resources, and expand your shelter. Every choice matters—manage supplies wisely and decide which frozen zones to explore as you carve out survival in a relentless winter.

items.title: Game Cafe Escape
items.description: Game Cafe Escape is another room escape game from masasgames. This time you have to solve puzzles and escape from a beautifully designed game cafe.

items.title: Heroes of the Arena
items.description: Heroes of the Arena is an RPG game where you create your own hero and forge a path through battles and adventure. You’ll team up with allies, face powerful enemies, and shape your journey by enhancing skills, unlocking pets, and joining epic clan wars. Every choice you make pushes you closer to becoming a legend.

items.title: Heroes of the Wasteland
items.description: Heroes of the Wasteland is a game with RPG elements set in a post-apocalyptic world. Assemble a team of stalkers to cleanse the wasteland of mutants, insects, and other creatures. Engage in strategic battles and explore the remnants of a fallen world as you strive to survive and thrive.

items.title: Horror Tale 3: The Witch
items.description: Horror Tale 3: The Witch is a spine-chilling first-person adventure that plunges you into the eerie town of Lakewitch, where children are vanishing without a trace. Solve mind-bending puzzles, explore haunting locations, and face the sinister witch Wanda in your quest to uncover the truth. Will you unravel the dark mystery and survive the nightmare?

items.title: Horror Tale
items.description: Horror Tale Kidnapper is a frightening first-person horror adventure game. Solve the disturbing mystery of the missing children at Lakewitch. Who is the kidnapper, and why are they doing it? Where are the children disappearing, and how can we save them? It's up to you to find out.

items.title: Horse Simulator 3D
items.description: Horse Simulator 3D is a fantastic 3D simulation game in which you can feel what it is like to be a horse on a beautiful island! Perform various tasks, start an adorable family, win various competitions, make your horse stronger and more beautiful, decorate your home, fight forest predators, help other good guys, and do much more!

items.title: House Escape: Office
items.description: House Escape: Office is anescape gamewhere you find tools and use them to solve puzzles. Can you find all the hidden clues and escape?

items.title: Idle Saga
items.description: Idle Saga is a fantasy adventure where swords and magic shape your journey. Gather powerful equipment, harness divine and demonic transformations, and conquer every realm in your path. Team up with mystical elves and mighty mercenaries to take on fearsome bosses. Every battle brings new challenges, making each step toward domination more thrilling than the last!

items.title: Iron Friend
items.description: Iron Friend is a spine-chilling first-person horror game where you must confront dark mysteries and survive terrifying encounters. As a staff member thrown into a horrifying situation, your goal is to uncover the truth behind the eerie events unfolding around you. Navigate through creepy environments, solve puzzles, and avoid lurking dangers as you piece together the sinister secrets hidden within. With every step, the tension rises as you face disturbing consequences for every wrong move. Will you survive the nightmare, or will you become another victim of the terror?

items.title: ISLANDER
items.description: ISLANDER is a Minecraft-style crafting game with various goals to complete.

items.title: Isometric Escape
items.description: Isometric is an escape game where you solve a series of puzzles to escape from isometric rooms. Find all the useful objects and use your logic and memory to solve the riddles.

items.title: Isometric Escapes
items.description: Isometric Escapes is a 3D adventure escape game where you must search for useful items in the rooms to help you escape. Look carefully around the rooms, and use your logic to solve the riddles. Find your way to escape!

items.title: Johnny Rocketfingers
items.description: Johnny Rocketfingers is a point and click adventure game that gives you control over Johnny Rocketfingers, the most "suppish" guy around. In this game, you help out a mom trying to find her daughter. Use anything around you that you deem necessary to finish your objective in each area you're thrown in.

items.title: Kitchen Escape
items.description: Kitchen Escape is an adventure escape game where you must use your logic to find the key and escape from the kitchen. Find tools to help you out, solve puzzles, and crack the passwords!

items.title: Knight Hero 2 Revenge Idle RPG
items.description: Knight Hero 2 Revenge Idle RPG is an exciting RPG platformer where you play as an undead hero seeking revenge. After being awakened from a centuries-old slumber, you must battle enemies and defeat powerful bosses. Upgrade your abilities, collect epic gear, and progress through unique worlds. With easy controls and rapid leveling, you’re always in for an adventure.

items.title: Knight Hero Adventure Idle RPG
items.description: Knight Hero Adventure Idle RPG is a fantasy adventure where the radiant princess, the rightful heir to the throne, has been abducted by malevolent creatures from the magical realm. As the appointed assassin, your mission is clear – rescue the princess and secure the fate of the kingdom. Equip yourself with a razor-sharp sword, a sturdy shield, and a trusty

items.title: Laqueus Escape: Chapter I
items.description: Laqueus Escape is a 3D room escape game. You have to figure out how to escape the mysterious place. Try thechapter 2!

items.title: Laqueus Escape: Chapter V
items.description: Laqueus Escape: Chapter V is the fifth episode of an escape game Laques Escape. Use your logic to solve all of the difficult riddles to finish the game.

items.title: Laqueus Escape 2: Chapter I
items.description: Laqueus Escape 2: Chapter I is an adventure escape game where you need to use your logic to escape from the room. You don't know how or when you've got into this strange facility. The time behaves strangely, and the place is ruined. Find your way out by solving all the puzzles and challenges!

items.title: Laqueus Escape 2: Chapter II
items.description: Laqueus Escape 2: Chapter II is a continuous series from the Laqueus Escape 2 adventure escape game. You are still trying to get out of this strange facility. Try to find all the clues that will help you solve all the riddles and successfully open the locked door. Things are getting more complicated, so prepare yourself to use your logic.

items.title: Laqueus Escape 2 - Chapter III
items.description: Laqueus Escape 2: Chapter III is an adventure escape game where you navigate a mysterious facility, unlocking doors by deciphering clues. Sharpen your vision and math skills to solve riddles and progress through this gripping escape experience. Uncover hidden secrets and overcome obstacles as you strive to break free from the enigmatic surroundings.

items.title: Laqueus Escape: Chapter II
items.description: This is the second episode ofLaqueus Escape: Chapter 1, a 3D thrilling room escape game!

items.title: Laqueus Escape: Chapter III
items.description: Laqueus Escape: Chapter III is the next episode of Laqueus Escape, a mysterious room escape game. Escaping was never this hard. Use your head and carry on!

items.title: Laqueus Escape: Chapter IV
items.description: Laqueus Escape - Chapter IV is a new chapter and new challenges of the Laqueus Escape series, a 3D room escape game. Look around, find clues, and use objects and solve puzzles to win this escape room game.

items.title: Laqueus Escape: Chapter VI
items.description: Laqueus Escape: Chapter VI is an episode of Laqueus Escape with a bigger and trickier 3D escape game than ever!

items.title: LinQuest
items.description: LinQuest is a 2D platformer game with a mission to help adventurer Lin to search for a mysterious treasure in 3 different dangerous zones.

items.title: Machine Room Escape
items.description: Machine Room Escape is a room escape game with various machines to interact with.

items.title: Magic World
items.description: Magic World is an adventure puzzle game where you engage in unique battles with mythical creatures and fierce enemies by defeating them via gem matching. The gameplay is strategic, as this is not your ordinary battle. Your enemies will use cover and battlefield advantages against you. You'll need a well-thought-out strategy and smart leveling up of all heroes to achieve victory!

items.title: Medieval Escape
items.description: Medieval Escape is a puzzle adventure game where you find yourself trapped in a room, it's up to you to uncover hidden clues, solve intricate puzzles, and locate essential items that will pave your path to freedom. Can you secure your freedom?

items.title: MIDNIGHT Remastered
items.description: This is the remastered edition of MIDNIGHT. Help the character to collect all the seven letters that are scattered in a dark and mysterious mansion.

items.title: Mini Mine
items.description: Mini Mine is a thrilling adventure arcade game where you dig deep, fight fierce monsters, and trade smartly to save Noob’s kidnapped girlfriend. Mine resources to upgrade weapons and tools, build a thriving village, and uncover hidden treasures. Unlock unique characters, set up automated production, and take down Cheater in an epic showdown!

items.title: Mirrorland
items.description: Mirrorland is a turn-based strategy set in a fantastical realm teeming with heroes and monsters. Embark on an epic journey through this magical world, brimming with perilous encounters and thrilling adventures at every turn. Traverse through the looking glass into a realm of enigmatic puzzles and terrifying foes. Unravel the mysteries, aid mythical beings, vanquish villains, and safeguard the universe of Mirrorland. With stunning visuals, an immersive storyline, diverse hero selection, and engaging multiplayer features, prepare for an unforgettable quest where bravery and cunning are your greatest weapons.

items.title: Monster Mash: Pet Trainer
items.description: Monster Mash: Pet Trainer is a captivating Monster Tamer adventure game where you train, fight, and explore a world teeming with incredible creatures. Engage in epic battles, face powerful bosses, and build your dream team with a variety of monsters. Immerse yourself in hyper-casual gameplay, surrounded by stunning visuals and captivating soundscapes. Unleash the power within as you become the ultimate monster trainer in this exhilarating quest of growth and discovery.

items.title: My Dweller Gang
items.description: My Dweller Gang is an adventure RPG game where you can gather resources, build the island, and the most important thing is to save the island from the evil magician. There's a big danger on the island because an evil magician from the Dark Lands is kidnapping dwellers! You are drawn into a fight with evil against your will, but you are ready to fight for your friends!

items.title: Mystic Escape
items.description: Mystic Escape is an escape game to reveal your lost memories that took place on the island. Enjoy this escape game experience by solving these challenging Japanese-style puzzles surrounded by beautiful scenery. Find mysterious artifacts and clues on the island that will lead you to the solution.

items.title: Nightfall: Survival Siege
items.description: Nightfall: Survival Siege is a strategic survival game where your planning skills are tested by day and your courage by night. You gather resources, build strongholds, and prepare your defenses while the sun shines. When darkness falls, hordes of the undead attack, forcing you to rely on light, quick thinking, and your fortified base to endure the siege.

items.title: No Crossroads
items.description: No Crossroads is a turn-based strategy game focused on resource management and small scale turn-based combat game.

items.title: Noob: Island Escape
items.description: Noob: Island Escape is a casual adventure game where you help Noob build a new ship and escape from the island! Collect resources and build the means required to escape the island. How long can you survive?

items.title: Noob Miner 2: Escape From Prison
items.description: Noob Miner 2: Escape From Prison is an adventure arcade mining game where your survival depends on your skills and strategy! You control your noob miner to dig, fly, eat, purchase goods, and pretty much do everything possible to not only survive but escape from confinement.

items.title: Noob vs Pro: Challenge
items.description: Noob vs Pro Challenge is a thrilling adventure where you decide between playing as Noob or Pro. Face 1000 zombies in an apocalypse, rescue a princess, outsmart the evil Herobrine, and navigate through dungeons to discover a secret portal. Upgrade your character, craft traps, and battle unique bosses to complete your epic journey.

items.title: Obby: +1 to Spaceflight Altitude
items.description: Obby: +1 to Spaceflight Altitude is an adventure simulation space flight game that takes your cosmic adventures to new heights, literally as your protagonist aims to fly. Step into the shoes of your customizable Obb character, upgrade your abilities, and fuel your rockets so you can soar across the galaxy.

items.title: Obby: Dumb or Genius IQ Test
items.description: Obby: Dumb or Genius IQ Test is a game where intelligence is everything! Boost your IQ by completing mini-games, taking on challenges, and battling in PvP duels. Collect IQ points from the map, win games for extra rewards, and try your luck on the wheel of fortune for bonus IQ! Compete against other players, earn cups, and exchange them for pets. The higher your IQ, the better your status. Climb the leaderboard and prove you’re the smartest player in the game!

items.title: Obby: Legendary Dragon
items.description: Obby: Legendary Dragon is a thrilling adventure battle game where you are on an epic quest to capture extraordinary creatures across fantastical worlds. Run through from enchanted forests to mystical mountains, each brimming with hundreds of stunning animals just waiting to be discovered. Get ready to hone your skills and grow your creatures through countless levels. With each step, you’ll forge friendships with fellow adventurers and uncover delightful surprises.

items.title: Obby: The Royal Race
items.description: Obby: The Royal Race is an adventure game where players can spend hours customizing and upgrading their Obby character, collecting cool cars, and tackling challenging parkour courses. The game offers an exciting mix of racing, platforming, and character progression, making it a thrilling experience for players who enjoy both speed and skill-based challenges. So get ready to rev your engines, upgrade your character, and take on the parkour challenges in this action-packed game!

items.title: OneBit Adventure
items.description: OneBit Adventure is an adventure game where turn-based roguelike RPG journey. Face off against ever-tougher rogue monsters as you venture deeper into the unknown. Customize your character with various classes and uncover the mysteries of this perilous world. Explore dungeons for valuable loot and level up to survive even longer. Dive into this offline adventure where danger and rewards await at every turn.

items.title: Overtitans: Destroyers of Worlds
items.description: Overtitans: Destroyers of Worlds is an experimental action game where you craft powerful spells by fusing runes into unpredictable combinations. With no cooldowns and no safety nets, you’ll wield raw, unstable magic to reshape the battlefield and confront colossal Titans. Push your limits, embrace chaos, and uncover secrets buried beneath a world that trembles with every spell you cast.

items.title: Panda Simulator 3D
items.description: Live the life of a panda in 3D Panda Simulator! Make a family, grow cubs, complete tasks, and improve your panda home.

items.title: Phoenix Contract
items.description: Phoenix Contract is an action-packed MMORPG where you craft your hero’s legacy through epic quests, fierce battles, and rich customization. Master powerful skills, take on towering bosses, and uncover mystical heirlooms. Whether clashing in intense PvP or uniting with allies to conquer vast realms, every choice shapes your destiny in this ever-evolving fantasy world.

items.title: Pirate Island
items.description: Pirate Island is a thrilling survival adventure set on a lawless island teeming with danger. Gather resources, craft tools, and uncover hidden treasures while navigating the treacherous jungle. Face off against merciless pirates in intense battles as you fight to escape this perilous paradise. Will you outwit your enemies or succumb to the island's grip?

items.title: Planet Life
items.description: Planet Life is a fun and exciting adventure game in which you must manage resources and build new things. You take control of a planet - this planet is lonely and its wish to meet other planets and explore the universe - you must help it grow so that it can do this!

items.title: Planetarium 2
items.description: Planetarium is an awesome game of adventure and exploration in which you can watch our solar system in action and see how the different planets and stars interact with each other and around our galaxy - this is an epic planet simulation game! Use your mouse to move around the universe and check out how our solar system works.

items.title: Pocket Zone
items.description: Pocket Zone is a gripping simulation game that challenges you to survive in a post-apocalyptic world. Venture to the Chernobyl nuclear power plant and fulfill your deepest desires with the legendary Performer of Dreams. If you're looking to escape the monotony of city life, prepare to journey through desolate lands where survival against a hostile environment is your primary goal.

items.title: Puzzle Room Escape
items.description: Puzzle Room Escape is a escape game that offers only one exit route. Solve puzzles to break free from a locked room. Your task is to escape the room through ingenuity and quick thinking.

items.title: Python Snake Simulator
