items.description: Parking Jam Escape is a puzzle game where you park each car correctly to make space for the main car to escape from the parking lot. Collect coins and unlock different cars!

items.title: Parking Panic
items.description: Parking Panic is a puzzle game to unblock the crowded parked car and make a way for the red car to escape.

items.title: Parking Space
items.description: In Parking Space, you have to skillfully drive cars and park them perfectly at the designated locations.

items.title: Perfect Drive
items.description: Perfect Drive is a fast-paced driving game that puts your skills to the test. Whether you're a seasoned driver or just starting out, buckle up and prove your abilities on the road. With every challenge, you'll need quick reflexes and precision to show you're the ultimate driver.

items.title: Decorate My BMW M5
items.description: Decorate the BMW to look as cool and pimped out as possible.

items.title: Pizza Car
items.description: Pizza Car is a simulation game where you do what it takes to be the city’s ultimate pizza chef on wheels! Get behind the wheel of your pizza car and bring hot, fresh pizzas to hungry customers! From busy city streets to quiet suburban neighborhoods, every order is a chance to prove your skills as both a chef and a driver. Take orders, prepare delicious pizzas, and keep customers happy to grow your business!

items.title: Plane Chase
items.description: Plane Chase is a driving game where you chase planes in your souped-up ride, aiming to leap into them mid-flight! Maneuver through absurd obstacles, make daring jumps, and customize your car for the ultimate getaway. With split-second decisions and strategic boosts, can you master the craziest chase ever? Fasten your seatbelt and rev your engine – it's time for takeoff!

items.title: PolyTrack
items.description: PolyTrack is a fast-paced, low-poly driving game featuring thrilling loops, jumps, and high-speed action where every millisecond counts. Inspired by TrackMania, it challenges you to race against the clock, constantly striving to improve your time on various tracks built by you and the Polytrack community! It doesn't get any more hands-on than that.

items.title: Race Clicker: Drift Max
items.description: Race Clicker: DRIFT MAX is an action-packed clicker game that puts you in the driver’s seat of intense drift races. Get ready to tap your way to victory in this fast-paced game where every split-second decision counts. Are you ready to drift your way to the top?

items.title: Racing Builder
items.description: Racing Builder is a casual strategy game that combines racing and customization to deliver an exciting and fast-paced experience. In this game, your goal is to adapt your vehicle on the fly by changing wheels, modifying the body, and adding improvements, all for free, while speeding through challenging tracks to outrun your opponent at every level.

items.title: Racing Empire
items.description: Racing Empire is an adrenaline-pumping game that lets you build your own racing dynasty. Earn tokens, upgrade and customize your car, and push your limits on the track. With high-speed action and strategic car modifications, Racing Empire lets you prove you're the ultimate racing mogul. Get ready to race and conquer the competition!

items.title: Racing Limits
items.description: Racing Limits is a racing game that lets you push your skills to the max. Race and overtake vehicles in city and highway traffic with four thrilling game modes: carrier, infinite, against-time, and free mode. Choose between one-way and two-way traffic, and experience three times of day - 'Morning,' 'Sunset,' and 'Night.' With multiple camera angles, sensitive controls, and realistic physics, it's a high-speed adventure you won't want to miss. Customize, upgrade, and take on numerous race events in this graphically stunning racing world!

items.title: Rally Racer Dirt
items.description: Rally Racer Dirt is a rally drift-based game, allows you to drift on both asphalt and dirt terrains while navigating through hills. This category is redefined with the introduction of Rally Racer Dirt, offering the best realistic and stunning controls for a rally game. Enjoy the experience of drifty and realistic tuned physics, coupled with detailed graphics, various vehicles, and racing tracks. Be a rally racer, driving like Ken Blocks and Collin McRae on the tracks. The game features a Realtime Multiplayer Mode, 13 different rally cars, tunable cars with adjustable features, upgradable cars and drive properties, 5 different tuned tracks, and more. Choose between two main game modes: Challenge mode, with 60 different challenges to pass, and Survival mode, where you drift and drive as long as you can, passing checkpoints.

items.title: Ram Cars
items.description: Ram Cars is a car battle game where you drive and smash an opponent's car by drawing a line. This game offers 3D graphics, different arenas, multiple challenges, upgrades, and rewards! Draw the line to move your car. While planning your path, you will also see the trajectory of the enemy. That is where you need to think fast to react and coordinate your moving direction well to be rammed right into your opponent. The best hits are when you T-bone your opponent, which is not so easy to do! Don't forget to also upgrade your car's health and strength. More health equals harder to smash, and more strength means that a well-planned hit could destroy another fighter in one blow.

items.title: Ramp Car Jumping
items.description: Ramp Car Jumping is a casual driving game where you send your car flying off a huge ramp, crashing into various obstacles. Smash through everything in your path, do flips, and fly as far as you can! Buy vehicles and unlock new tracks when you reach each target.

items.title: Real Car Parking
items.description: Real Car Parking is a skill-testing game that challenges your parking abilities. With various parking lots, vehicle types, and difficulty levels, it's a fun way to improve your skills. Experience realistic graphics, intuitive controls, and a wide range of vehicles as you navigate through narrow streets, office buildings, and more. Get ready to park like a pro and become a parking master!

items.title: Real Cars in City
items.description: Real Cars in City is a 3D car simulation with superb graphics and various game modes. This game has realistic vehicle driving physics and quality graphics. There are 20 sports cars, 36 racetracks, 1 free ride area, a police chase area, and a crash derby area. There is a vehicle purchase and development system in the game. You can race against artificial intelligence or drive freely.

items.title: Real Drift World
items.description: Real Drift World is a dynamic driving experience where you can explore the city or map freely, either on foot or behind the wheel. Master thrilling drifts, tackle challenging road features, and catch serious air on ramps. Switch up the adventure with multiple maps, parking levels, and tournaments. In this limitless world, your skills make the rules.

items.title: Real Drive 3D Parking Games
items.description: Real Drive 3D Parking Games is a parking car simulation game where you start with an SUV and unlock various vehicles as you progress. Test your driving skills in challenging levels, from rooftop terrains to off-road adventures. Master manual gear shifting and precision parking while enjoying a wide selection of cars, including sedans, trucks, muscle cars, and supercars. Get ready to unleash your inner racer and conquer each level with finesse!

items.title: Road Turn
items.description: In Road Turn, a fun one-button car game, your job is to direct the traffic. Prevent traffic accidents by controlling when the cars can turn onto the highway.

items.title: Rovercraft
items.description: Rovercraft is a driving arcade game that puts your creativity and driving skills to the test. Build and customize your very own rover, outfitting it with powerful tools like jet engines, super-wheels, and other high-tech upgrades to tackle challenging alien landscapes. Each terrain is a unique puzzle, filled with treacherous obstacles and steep climbs, requiring both ingenuity in your design and precision in your driving. As you navigate through these extraterrestrial courses, the true challenge lies in achieving the perfect balance between your engineering prowess and your skills behind the wheel.

items.title: Sandbox City
items.description: Sandbox City - Cars, Zombies, Ragdolls! is a zombie game where you can explore freely and drive around the city, but, be careful of the zombie's infection! Find the zombies and kill them before the infection spreads around and the city.

items.title: Sky Car Drift
items.description: Sky Car Drift is a car drifting game where you must compete drifting against your rivals on a thrilling track above the clouds. Master the art of drifting and aim for the longest drifts without crashing or falling off the edge to earn valuable trophies. Collect trophies to unlock a wide range of cool rewards, including over 200 cars, 120 drivers, 500 emotes, and 10 unique skies. Climb the trophy ladder to gain exclusive titles and showcase your skills. Compete in various drift categories, aim for the top of the leaderboards, and secure your spot in the prestigious hall of fame. Get ready to soar in Sky Car Drift!

items.title: Sky Riders
items.description: Sky Riders is a high-speed casual vehicle driving game. Put your driving skills to the test as you complete several challenging tracks. Stay focused and avoid falling off! Whether you're behind the wheel of a car or riding a motorcycle, prepare for an adrenaline-fueled adventure and unforgettable racing moments. Get ready to conquer difficult tests and feel the excitement of Sky Riders!

items.title: Slingshot Crash
items.description: Slingshot Crash is a thrilling game where you use a slingshot to launch cars and cause maximum damage. The more destruction you create, the more in-game money you earn to upgrade traffic, explosions, and more. Unleash your creativity to keep the chaos going and see just how far you can push the limits of destruction!

items.title: Slingshot Stunt Driver & Sport
items.description: Slingshot Stunt Driver & Sport is a sports car game where you morph cars into planes, embracing the ultimate thrill of aerial stunts. Adjust slingshot strength, pick your launch direction, and witness the chaos as your car takes flight. Skillfully navigate the skies, aiming for precision landings amidst challenging terrain. It's not just about driving – it's about becoming the fearless stuntman of your dreams.

items.title: Slope Car
items.description: Slope Car is an arcade game to drive your car on a randomized slope and go as far as possible. This game is a combination ofCrazy Roll 3Dand driving a car.

items.title: Smash Karts
items.description: Smash Karts is a 3D multiplayer IO kart battle game. Drive your go-kart, pick up weapons, and blow up other karts to win! Keep playing to level up and unlock new characters and prizes.

items.title: Stick Crush
items.description: Stick Crush is an exhilarating casual physics game that tests your reactions and skills! Start by revving your car, crashing into obstacles, and launching your stick character into the sky. Once airborne, navigate challenges, dodge obstacles, and take down enemies with precise maneuvers.

items.title: Stickman Annihilation 2
items.description: Stickman Annihilation 2 is an action-packed ragdoll physicsstickman gamemade by Sergey Mezkhahov. Drive an assortment of vehicles through people, fire, walls, and enjoy the slow-motion spectacle. Rack up gold coins from causing damage and use them to purchase new vehicles and levels!

items.title: Stickman battle 1-4 Players
items.description: Stickman battle 1-4 Players is a lively collection of dynamic action games where you battle with spinning weapons, score thrilling goals, race to the finish, and survive challenging levels. Jump into quick rounds or tournaments spanning several matches. Play solo or with up to three friends or bots, customize your cars, faces, and colors, and enjoy nonstop fun together.

items.title: Street Race Fury
items.description: Race your car to the finish line first by clicking whenever the meter gets in the green zone. Have fun with Street Race Fury, a cool drag racingcar game!

items.title: Street Racer 2
items.description: Street Racer 2 is a driving drag-racing game where your goal is to win races, upgrade, and buy new cars. This game offers an exhilarating mix of play modes, including drag racing, off-road challenges, and arcade-style fun. Each mode delivers a distinct experience, whether chasing high-speed thrills, conquering rugged terrain, or enjoying adrenaline-packed track action.

items.title: Street Racing: Open World
items.description: Street Racing: Open World is a stunning driving simulator with realistic physics, limitless customization, and breathtaking graphics. Build and tune your dream car with countless parts and vinyls, then put your skills to the test across a massive open world filled with diverse environments, from city streets to desert dunes. Complete tasks, earn money, unlock new cars, and upgrade them. Experience the thrill of high-speed racing!

items.title: Stunt Paradise
items.description: Stunt Paradise is a high-octane driving adventure packed with daring stunts and electrifying challenges. Push your limits as you soar off ramps, pull off jaw-dropping flips, and crash through explosive obstacles. Every turn delivers a new thrill, testing your reflexes and courage. Are you ready to conquer the ultimate playground for fearless drivers?

items.title: Super Racing GT: Drag Pro
items.description: Super Racing GT: Drag Pro is a fun and challenging drag racing game in which you must test your racing skills on a variety of awesome drag strips from around the world. In this drag racing game the controls are realistic – instead of just mashing the acceleration you must time your gear shifts perfectly and find a balance between gear changing and acceleration.

items.title: Syder Hyper Drive
items.description: Syder Hyper Drive is a futuristic stunt car game where you can perform thrilling stunts using a variety of cool vehicles. Unlock and upgrade different rides as you tackle challenging missions in an endless adventure. Show off your skills, conquer obstacles, and push your stunt-driving limits to the max!

items.title: Taxi Driver: Master
items.description: Taxi Driver: Master is a role-playing adventure game where you navigate city streets, ferrying passengers to their destinations. Explore a vast cityscape, interact with diverse clientele, and hone your driving prowess. Maneuver your taxi using keyboard controls, ensuring timely drop-offs to earn high ratings. With realistic simulation and mobile compatibility, it's a thrilling challenge for driving enthusiasts.

items.title: Telekinesis Race 3D
items.description: Telekinesis Race 3D is an engaging arcade game with a unique twist - superhuman abilities. The primary objective of the game is to engage in combat and destruction. Using your telekinetic powers, you can throw objects at enemies, lift and toss foes, and even interact with environmental elements to defeat adversaries. The game encourages creative use of telekinesis to overcome challenges and progress through the levels.

items.title: Time to Park
items.description: Time to Park is a fun and interesting car parking game. In this game, you must take control of a car from a top-down point of view and try to park it in a myriad of different spots. Your driving must be precise and you must line up in the parking spot perfectly! As you start out, the levels are easy, but the parking challenges become increasingly difficult.

items.title: Toy Rider
items.description: Toy Rider is a driving game where you will drive a small toy car and your goal is to reach your owner's hand. Perform jaw-dropping stunts such as jumping on ramps, flying through portals, and many other crazy stunts in this incredibly fun driving game.

items.title: Traffic Cop 3D
items.description: Traffic Cop 3D is a casual game where you play as a police officer enforcing the law of the road. Scan nearby drivers and use intel from the police database to decide whether you should pull them over, or let them go, all while progressing through the story and increasing your duties as a cop.

items.title: Traffic Loop
items.description: Traffic Loop is an idle game where you can earn money from the traffic. Morning traffic is usually the worst thing in the world, but now you have a chance to get an advantage of it! Buy cars and merge them together to create a better car. Better cars mean more money, plus merging cars together can also reduce traffic. All you need to do is to create traffic, merge cars, build roads, and keep the money flowing. Be the traffic tycoon and earn unimaginable amounts of money!

items.title: Traffic Parking
items.description: Traffic Parking is a challenging car puzzle game where you guide a vehicle home by navigating around obstacles like other cars and rocks. Strategize to clear paths and unlock tricks for tricky levels. With 45 levels, customizable car skins, and daily rewards, it’s designed to keep you engaged and entertained as you master each challenge.

items.title: Truck Driving Simulator Game
items.description: Truck Driving Simulator Game is a driving game that immerses you in the thrill of truck driving throughout Asia. The graphics offer a realistic experience with unique truck models and captivating environments.

items.title: Truck Simulator: Russia
items.description: Truck Simulator Russia is a 3D truck-driving simulation game where you can explore beautiful open-world environments while driving various trucks! Take delivery jobs and be a real Russian truck driver.

items.title: Trucks Race
items.description: Trucks Race is an arcade game where your job is to move the cargo as fast as possible. Your goal is to deliver all goods to the consignee as fast as possible. As you progress, you'll earn money and level up, unlocking new roads to explore. Test your skills on the highway as you take on challenging delivery missions. Get ready for a thrilling trucking experience!

items.title: Tuning Car Racing
items.description: Tuning Car Racing is an urban racing experience packed with variety and style. Explore a sprawling city, test 8 unique cars, and compete across 6 distinct racing maps with multiple variations. It’s pure high-speed competition set against the vibrant pulse of city life.

items.title: Turbo Cars: Pipe Stunts
items.description: Turbo Cars: Pipe Stunts is a high-octane stunt driving game. Browse various cars from classic Soviet models to powerful modern supercars and take them to the tracks. Blaze down slippery slopes and smash through obstacles. Earn gold and move to the next track!

items.title: Ultimate Night Racing
items.description: Ultimate Night Racing is a driving game where you test your driving abilities against probably the most talented adversaries your city brings to the table. This drifting unblocked game will allow you to flaunt your driving strategies as you leave your rivals in a dust storm. You can buy a new car and customize it to your liking!

items.title: WheelX Race
items.description: WheelX Race delivers thrilling mini-car action across dynamic tracks filled with twists, shortcuts, and challenges. Customize your ride with engine upgrades, nitro boosts, and unique paint jobs, then take on time trials or intense head-to-head duels. Earn rewards, unlock new cars, and race through vibrant environments with intuitive controls and smooth, fast-paced gameplay.

items.title: Xtreme Rivals: Car Racing
items.description: Xtreme Rivals Car Racing is an adrenaline-fueled 3D driving game that puts you behind the wheel of high-speed machines against fierce competitors. This car racing game challenges you with different roads and landscapes with rewards to match your effort.

items.title: Zombie Drive Survivor
items.description: Zombie Drive Survivor is an action game where you get to drive a cool car and bravely face off against hordes of zombies! Bump into the zombies to crush them, but remember to watch out for your car's damage level because you don't want your car to be damaged and burnt down. Collect exp that the zombies drop every time you beat them. The exp will help you level up and become stronger. Unlock and pick awesome weapons to make defeating zombies even more fun! Many different types of zombies and enemy cars will try to stop you! But don't worry; you can earn coins to unlock new, more powerful cars and discover all sorts of cool weapons like machine guns, shotguns, rams, Molotov cocktails, rocket launchers, flamethrowers, harpoons, mines, traps, and more. There are two different game modes you can enjoy. Level game mode, where you can practice and have fun, and Endless Mode for you who want to challenge yourself to face wave after wave of zombies. The choice is yours!

items.title: Australian Patience
items.description: Play a fascinating and fun version ofSolitairewhich is a mixture of Klondike and Scorpion.

items.title: Auto RiskRisk
items.description: Auto RiskRisk is a strategic 2D card battle game. This is an auto battler game where you must manage your fighters by strategically equipping different items and artifacts to assemble the strongest team possible in order to win the battle. Send them off to fight against AI opponents in single-player or against other human players online. By combining certain types of items, you can increase your strength or counter the opponents' strategies. Collect money after each battle and use it to level up and buy new equipment for your fighters. You can also buy multiple of the same items to combine them into stronger versions. Each item belongs to two different sets. If you collect multiples of the same set, you get additional set bonuses. Your fighters will automatically run out and fight for you with the equipment you have assigned to them. The loser of the battle will lose health, and if you go down to 0 health, you are out of the game. The last player standing is the winner!

items.title: BattleChonk
items.description: BattleChonk is a charming defense game where you guide adorable creatures in their fight against the mischievous Gloomps. You’ll boost your dice, unleash clever attacks, and guard your town with growing strength. As challenges increase, you unlock new Chonks and upgrades, keeping every chapter fresh, strategic, and full of delightful surprises.

items.title: Card Scramble: Viola's Diner
items.description: Card Scramble: Viola’s Diner is a heartfelt single-player adventure that blends card play with board game strategy. You’ll help Viola revive her family diner by preparing dishes, unlocking new designs, and customizing the space to reflect her memories. Along the way, meet colorful characters like Uncle Joey and enjoy hundreds of levels filled with warmth, challenge, and discovery.

items.title: Card Shuffle Sort
items.description: Card Shuffle Sort is a smart and calming puzzle game that challenges you to strategically rearrange cards by color. With increasing difficulty, each level tests your organization and problem-solving skills. Enjoy beautiful designs, intuitive gameplay, and daily challenges that keep you coming back for more. Perfect for sharpening your mind while unwinding.

items.title: Classic Card Games Collection
items.description: Classic Card Games Collection is a collection of over 150 solitaire card games, including favorites like Klondike, Spider, and Freecell. Explore new games with clear rules for every variation. Customize your gaming experience with unique card designs, backgrounds, and animated win effects. Dive into the classics or try something new while enjoying the personalized feel of each game.

items.title: Classic Solitaire
items.description:
Classic Solitaire game - the time-tested card game.
Classic Solitaire brings all the fun and enjoyment of this iconic card game to your web browser. The rules and gameplay remain the same – you have to move your cards around and try to match them by suit and number. This version of solitaire is fun to play and easy to pick up.

items.title: Cribbage JD
items.description: Cribbage JD is a classic card game also known as Crib, Cribble, and Noddy. It's a multiplayer card game traditionally for two players, that involves playing and grouping cards in combinations that gain points. The cribbage board is used for score-keeping.

items.title: Dark Stones: Card Battle RPG
items.description: Dark Stones: Card Battle RPG is a strategic card-based battle game set in a dark fantasy world of magic and elemental forces. Assemble a team of humans, orcs, mages, elves, and other creatures to defeat powerful foes, capture their souls, and unlock new powers. Explore lands teeming with danger, from snowy valleys to scorched deserts and realms of the dead, while uncovering hidden secrets and facing epic challenges.

items.title: Domino Duel
items.description: Domino Duel is a versatile battle of minds offering thrilling head-to-head matchups in multiple modes. Challenge AI, duel online, or face off with friends on one screen or across the globe. With flexible settings, rich customization, and helpful features like hints and move history, it’s the perfect arena to sharpen your strategy and climb the ranks.

items.title: Emily's Hotel Solitaire
items.description: Emily's Hotel Solitaire is a puzzle game where you embark on a tropical adventure with Emily, and fulfill her grandfather's dream of building the best hotel in the world! Immerse yourself in the magical atmosphere as you enjoy the challenging games of Solitaire and create your luxurious hotel paradise. With exciting Solitaire puzzles, glorious locations, and endless opportunities for customization, this game offers an unforgettable experience!

items.title: Flames & Fortune
items.description: Flames & Fortune is a collectible card game inspired by Card Crawl. Play as a knight wielding powerful fire spells to conquer dungeons. Strategically clear all cards to escape each level, collecting gold and using your deck to overcome challenges and adversaries. Engage in tactical gameplay as you navigate through treacherous dungeons, ensuring your survival and victory.

items.title: Foono Online Multiplayer
items.description: Foono Online Multiplayer is an engaging card game that takes inspiration from classics like Uno Online and Crazy Eights. The objective is to clear your hand of cards before your opponents do. It's a game of strategy, quick thinking, and a bit of luck. Foono offers endless fun and opportunities for social interaction. Whether you're playing casually with friends or in competitive online matches, Foono promises an entertaining card game experience!

items.title: Forest Dump
items.description: Forest Dump is a casual roguelike game that takes you on a unique adventure through a quirky and polluted woodland. As a clever and resourceful fox, your mission is to clean up your corrupted forest home by flipping cards to uncover mysteries, face off against trash monsters, and collect powerful weapons to aid in your journey. Combining card-flipping mechanics with deckbuilding elements, this game offers a strategic adventure full of surprises. Will you be able to clean up the pollution and restore the forest to its former glory? Jump into Forest Dump and find out!

items.title: Gin Rummy Online
items.description: Play Gin Rummy Online (Plus). Gin Rummy is a card-matching game you can play with one or more other players. This online version of Gin Rummy lets you play against opponents of various difficulties to build your skills and become a slick Gin Rummy master!

items.title: Golf Solitaire
items.description: Golf Solitaire is a fun and challenging solo card game. Clear all the cards by placing them in order and returning them to the pile until there are none remaining. This game uses a regular 52-card deck, but the rules differ from regular Solitaire.

items.title: Hanafuda Flash
items.description: Hanafuda Flash is exactly as the title suggests - it's a flash version of a classic Japanese card game, Hanafuda. This card game involves 2 players throwing and taking cards to/from each other to create a set of cards from a "suit". There are multiple suits with different points depending on the cards you've collected. This game will need a bit of studying, but once you get the hang of it, this game is super fun because of how fast the game starts and ends.

items.title: Hearts: Classic
items.description: Hearts: Classic is an online version of the traditional card in which you are trying to avoid scoring points as the game ends when a player reaches 100 points. If you are new to the game of Hearts, then there is a handy rulebook that helps you through the game teaching you tips and how to avoid losing the game.

items.title: Infinite Heroes
items.description: Infinite Heroes is a board card game where you must join the magical world of adventure. Challenge the monster army and defeat the demon. Simple at first glance, the game will present you with complex challenges. Creatures, artifacts, portals, spells, and heroes. Play as a tireless adventurer, a powerful magician, a great warlock, or any of the eight heroes! Get loot and treasure to win. As you progress, the strength of your opponents will also grow, and to win, you need to think through every step.

items.title: Kingdom Solitaire
items.description: Kingdom Solitaire is a captivating journey where you, as Tony the butler, restore a majestic castle by mastering challenging solitaire levels. Delight in vibrant artwork, unique cards, and exciting mechanics while uncovering a heartwarming tale of a queen and her beloved pets. With constant updates introducing fresh surprises, your royal adventure will never grow dull!

items.title: Kingmaker Academy: Warrior's Duels
items.description: Kingmaker Academy: Warrior's Duels is a card battle game where you must use your strategy to beat your opponent. Strategize and outsmart your opponents as you compete against talented rivals in the school's prestigious tournament. Hone your skills with each duel and aim to become the ultimate warrior and ruler of the academy. Can you rise to the top and claim victory?

items.title: Kings and Queens Solitaire TriPeaks
items.description: Kings and Queens Solitaire TriPeaks is a casual puzzle solitaire game whose objective is to stack all cards on the game table in sequence. This game is ideal for card players, especially solitaire fans, as it is intuitive to pick up quickly with similar solitaire gameplay but with a slight twist—cards are not in laid out the same way, suits don't matter and rank order can go from high to low to high again!

items.title: Magic Towers Solitaire
items.description: Magic Towers Solitaire is a free solitaire game with a medieval theme. Move all the cards from the three peaks back to the deck. Remove all the cards to move to the next round!

items.title: MemeBattle: What's That Meme?
items.description: MemeBattle: What's That Meme? is a hilarious card game where you collect legendary memes, tackle funny scenarios, and compete for laughs. Respond with the perfect meme to win votes and climb the ranks. Build your collection by unlocking epic meme packs and enjoy endless humor with every match. Prove your comedic genius and become the ultimate Meme Master!

items.title: Nébula Tarot Cat
items.description: Nébula Tarot Cat is a mystical journey where you consult a magical AI-powered cat for guidance. Dive into the enchanting world of tarot, ask your burning questions, and uncover the universe’s secrets through Nébula’s intuitive wisdom. With every card drawn, her insights illuminate your path, blending esoteric charm and AI precision to reveal the answers you seek.

items.title: Pocketro
items.description: Pocketro is a fast-paced roguelike card game that fuses poker mechanics with strategic deck-building. You’ll craft winning hands, collect random power-ups, and face tougher challenges with each round. Every decision shapes your run, making each session unpredictable and rewarding. Test your instincts, take risks, and outsmart the table in a game of clever gambits.

items.title: Pyramid Solitaire Ancient Egypt
items.description: Clear the pyramid of cards by pairing cards which add up to 13. This Ancient Egypt themed version of Pyramid Solitaire offers excellent and engaging gameplay.

items.title: Random Cards: Tower Defense
items.description: Random Cards: Tower Defense is a tower defense game where you must use your strategy to decide which cards you will use for the battle. Each card has its own strength and its own power. Keep in mind that in order to win, you will need to calculate all the actions. Play out different tower defense scenarios, make wise decisions, and improve your cards.

items.title: RSVP
items.description: RSVP is a card game to match the colors of your guest's cards to make them happy.

items.title: Social Solitaire
items.description: Social Solitaire is a free solitaire game featuring a relaxed and normal game mode. Using the points you earn in games, you can customize your deck and theme. Take a break and play solitaire!

items.title: Solitaire Crime Stories
items.description: Solitaire Crime Stories is a casual solitaire game where you delve into the mysteries of Springdale, a seemingly tranquil town hiding dark secrets. Join journalist Lana Whitt and her assistant Bill as you solve crimes by mastering Solitaire. Explore unique locations, meet intriguing characters, and unravel the town's enigmatic puzzles. Plus, enjoy bonding with Max, the adorable kitten companion, in between investigations. Ready to become a Solitaire master and detective extraordinaire?

items.title: Solitaire FRVR
items.description: Solitaire FRVR is a great HTML5 solitaire game developed by Chris Benjaminsen.

items.title: Solitaire Klondike
items.description: Have a good time to stack all the cards completely in this Solitaire Klondike game.

items.title: Solitaire Reverse
items.description: The reversed version of Solitaire. Have fun!

items.title: Solitaire: The Great Journey
items.description: Solitaire: The Great Journey is a relaxing card game that blends classic solitaire mechanics with an adventurous twist. Match cards one above or below your stack to clear the table and move forward. With every win, you unlock a new island to explore, turning each round into a step deeper into a vibrant, rewarding journey.

items.title: Solitr
items.description: Solitr is a puzzle card game, the online version of the classic solitaire game ideal for endless hours of fun—the perfect way to unwind after a busy day! Solitr lets you focus on strategy and relaxation as you lose yourself in the addictive simplicity of this beloved card game. And the best part is there is no clean up since it's all digital!

items.title: Spades
items.description: Have fun playing a classic internet Spades against 3 other opponents.

items.title: Speed
items.description: SPEED is one of the more classic card games that involves, well, speed. The goal of the game is to be the first player to discard all of the cards on your hand. You do this by choosing a card from your hand that is 1 step higher or lower than one of the 2 cards in the middle of the screen. This is where the title comes it - you won't be taking turns doing this. You'll need speed as the cards in the middle can only be used by the first player to discard their own cards there.

items.title: Spider FRVR
items.description: Spider FRVR is a type of Solitaire game from FRVR. You need to stack the cards on the board.

items.title: Spider Solitaire 2 Suits
items.description: Spider Solitaire 2 Suits is a challenging Solitaire game limited to two suits and two decks of cards. Move the cards around the tableau so they are in order by suit and number. Take more cards from the pile if you get stuck. See if you can win at this tricky game!

items.title: Survival Land
items.description: Survival Land is a casual game where you construct diverse items to build your community. Develop your village by strategically creating essential structures and advancing your society. Delve into the immersive world of VillageCraft, where your decisions shape the destiny of your evolving village. Enjoy the challenge of resource management and community growth as you embark on this engaging strategic journey.

items.title: Tavern Rumble: Roguelike Card
items.description: Tavern Rumble is a strategy roguelike deckbuilding card game. Begin your adventure with basic mercenary cards, strengthen your deck, and face challenging bosses. Explore card synergies and experience a roguelike journey with random dungeons, loot, mercenaries, and permanent death. Craft a unique deck, encounter creatures, take blessings, and become a legendary monster slayer. The game offers playable classes, cute pixel art, easy-to-learn mechanics, and the ability to play offline or online. Play now for a perfect card game break!

items.title: Tongits
items.description: Tongits is a three-player card game that is still in the Rummy family. The objective of the game is to empty your hand cards by forming sets(melds) or minimize the total score when a fight is called or when the central stack is empty. Each player will be dealt 12 cards while the dealer gets 13, and the rest of the cards are left as a draw card. The game begins when the dealer dumps a card. The next person can either pick up the disposed card if that card makes a set or adds to a set they already have or get one from the central stack. Collect hand combinations and dump unnecessary cards. The picking and discarding of cards goes on until someone wins by Tongits, calls a fight, or until the central stack runs out of cards. If this happens, the players tally the points of the cards they have in hand, and the one with the lowest wins. To call a fight, the player needs to put down a meld on the table, and no player drops any card on any of their melds in that round. If the player can use all of their cards in combinations by connecting to opponents’ or the exposed card sets, or if the player gets rid of all their cards, then the player wins by Tongits. Have fun with your friends, enjoy exciting moments, and relieve your stress every day!

items.title: Tri Peaks Social
items.description: The fun and famous Tri-Peaks version of the Solitaire card game.

items.title: Tuggowar
items.description: Tuggowar is an immersive deckbuilding experience game with strategic twists reminiscent of RTS games. Unleash your tactical prowess as you craft unique strategies and combinations to outsmart your opponents. Whether disrupting their plans or rushing with tanks, every move counts. Challenge others in PvP or enjoy a laid-back session against AI opponents. Are you ready to dominate the battlefield?

items.title: Four Colors
items.description: Four Colors lets you play the popular card game for free in your web browser. The aim of the game is to be the first player with no cards, similar to other Crazy Eights style card games. Play a game like UNO in multiplayer with 2, 3, or 4 players.

items.title: Waterworks!
items.description: Waterworks! is a card-based strategy game with a mission to maintain good water supply and develop the medieval town of Grudziadz.

items.title: Whooo?
items.description: Whooo? Is everyone’s favorite online guessing game! Use the process of elimination to guess who your opponent is holding. Play against various characters and unlock new face cards as you progress!

items.title: 10 More Bullets
items.description: So, how many ships can you destroy with 10 more bullets ? In this sequel of 10 Bullets, the objective remains the same: wait for the perfect situation and shoot to trigger massive chain reactions. And this time, upgrading your hero and collecting in-game boosters will make it a total destruction.

items.title: 12 MiniBattles
items.description: 12 MiniBattles is a casual two-player game featuring various minigames to play with a friend. With 36 uniquely chaotic mini-battles, each featuring a simple one-button control system, the game is easy to pick up but endlessly fun to master.

items.title: 3D Block Gladiator: Sword Draw
items.description: 3D Block Gladiator: Sword Draw is a thrilling arena battle where you face off against fierce warriors in a test of skill and strategy. Instead of relying on button mashing, you draw precise lines to unleash attacks, blocks, and dodges. Every slash and movement counts as you outsmart rivals and fight for ultimate glory.

items.title: 456 Guys
items.description: 456 Guys is a massive multiplayer survival game where up to 456 players compete through unpredictable challenges until only one remains. You’ll race through dangerous obstacle courses, outsmart tricky puzzles, and clash in intense arenas like the Glass Bridges, Honeycomb Maze, and Sumo Ring. With rotating levels and weekly tournaments, every match delivers fresh excitement and global competition.

items.title: 4x4 Chess: Last Man Stand
items.description: 4x4 Chess: Last Man Stand is a fast-paced, tactical twist on the classic game, designed for short, intense matches where only one player can be the last piece standing. On a tight 4x4 board, every move matters and the battle for survival is fierce. With its simple mechanics, fast rounds, and deep strategy, This game offers a fresh and exciting challenge for both chess veterans and newcomers alike. Think smart, play bold, and be the last one standing!

items.title: Find 5 Differences
items.description: Find all the 5 differences in this beautiful spot-the-difference game.

items.title: 99 Balls
items.description: Are you tired of ordinary bubble shooter games? Try 99 Balls, an innovate game that mixes gameplay fromBubble ShooterandBreakout! In this game, you need to destroy numbered balls before they reach the bottom of the screen. Each ball contains a number which indicates the number of hits it requires to be destroyed. Collect circles to increase the number of weapons you can throw at once. Collect stars to unlock new weapons! The further you proceed into the game, the higher the numbers on the balls become.

items.title: ABC Pizza Maker
items.description: ABC Pizza Maker is a fun and educational cooking game that teaches kids how to make pizza. With different themes like Italian, Unicorn, Candy, and Pirates, kids can let their creativity run wild while learning the steps to make delicious and unique pizzas. The game features a variety of toppings to decorate the pizza with, and animated scenes for making, baking, and eating the pizza. Designed for toddlers and children, ABC Pizza Maker is a great way to introduce kids to the fun of cooking.

items.title: Adventure Miner
items.description: Adventure Miner is a casual mining game where you mine and sell ore. Explore zones filled with precious metals and mine them. Sell them at the dock and upgrade your gear to keep going.

items.title: Ages: Build & Craft
items.description: Ages: Build & Craft is a fun simulation game where you start as a primitive person who needs to build your village. Collect resources, hire workers, earn money, and build your village until it becomes big! Explore the eras of world history to the modern world era. Each era has its own unique resources and buildings. Complete your tasks and expand your territory!

items.title: Air Block
items.description: Air Block is a 2D platformer where you must jump, place blocks, and conquer challenging levels! Use quick reflexes and smart block placement to navigate obstacles and defeat enemies, but be mindful that your blocks are limited!

items.title: Airplane Survival
items.description: Pilot your airplane, dodge incoming missiles, and stay alive as long as possible to get the high scores!

items.title: Airport Security
items.description: Airport Security is a casual simulation game that immerses you in the high-stakes world of airport safety, placing you in the role of a vigilant security officer dedicated to safeguarding a bustling terminal. Your mission is to maintain a secure environment by identifying suspicious passengers, spotting fake passports, and uncovering hidden contraband using cutting-edge X-ray machines. With each decision, you ensure that only law-abiding travelers make it to their gates, navigating unique interrogation scenarios and confronting realistic challenges. Will you rise to the occasion and preserve the tranquility of air travel? Your journey begins now!

items.title: Algerian Solitaire
items.description: Algerian Solitaire is a variation on the classic Solitaire (or Patience, as it is also known) card game. It is played using two decks of card, and the rules are quite complex. You can find themon Wikipedia. This game was developed by Ravalmatic.

items.title: Alpha Guns
items.description: Alpha Guns is a 2D arcade shooter game that is inspired by Metal Slug. In the game, you play as a metal soldier. You can use your metal slugs to fight your way across tons of enemies (including bosses and soldier squads) while causing major mayhem!

items.title: American Truck Driver
items.description: American Truck Driver is a simulation game where you take the wheel and become a truck driver. You'll pick up items from places where things are made and take them where they need to go. When you deliver them, you will get money. Start from Washington and unlock new states with new shops and factories. Level up to upgrade your truck's speed and capacity. Look for places of interest in every state to get more experience.

items.title: Animal DNA Run
items.description: Animal DNA Run is a casual game where you can mix animal DNA to create new and unique creatures. Each animal has its own abilities, so make sure you mix animal DNA according to your needs. For example, combine the DNA of a shark and a tiger to create an animal that can swim yet run very fast, or a monkey and an eagle to create an animal that can climb rocks and fly over cliffs!

items.title: Animal Royal
items.description: Animal Royal is a strategic versus game where you command a team of wild animals in fast-paced battles. Each creature has unique strengths and tactics, and your goal is to outwit opponents while defending your meat and stealing theirs. Think fast, act smart, and fight to claim your place as ruler of the animal kingdom.

items.title: Animalon: Epic Monsters Battle
items.description: Animalon: Epic Monsters Battle is a casual battle game where you command a team of adorable creatures in epic arena duels. Train and enhance their fighting abilities to conquer your opponent. Unleash mighty magical skills to ensure victory for your team. Embark on a thrilling journey through the wondrous world of Animalon, where mystical animals engage in fierce combat. Strategize meticulously on each level to assemble an unbeatable squad of legendary warriors. Can you forge the mightiest monsters and lead your team to glory?

items.title: Ants Adventure
items.description: Ants Adventure is a casual game with management elements where you play as the leader of the ants who goes on a journey to colonize the entire universe. Develop your ant colony, gather resources, and buy new assistants, improving their characteristics. Protect your ant colony from aggressive spiders, and eliminate competitors - red ants who steal your resources.

items.title: AOD - Art Of Defense
items.description: AOD - Art of Defence is a casual tower defense game set in a post-apocalyptic world. As Commander of the A.O.D squad, you lead the charge against Mr. Ivil's ruthless thugs, determined to find the lost Inola project. With stunning isometric graphics, build your technological kingdoms and thwart the enemy's destructive ambitions. Will you save mankind or succumb to darkness?

items.title: Apocalypse Reborn
items.description: Apocalypse Reborn is a top-down survival game where you gather resources, build shelters, and fight off zombies. Explore new areas by collecting materials, crafting tools, and unlocking upgrades. Rescue survivors to expand your team and strengthen your defenses. Keep building, keep surviving, and construct a helicopter to make your ultimate escape from the apocalypse!

items.title: Arcade Empire
items.description: Arcade Empire is a game where you build and manage your own gaming haven. Customize your arcade with classic and modern machines, add exciting attractions, and create a vibrant community of gamers. Engage in various activities to keep your visitors entertained and your arcade thriving.

items.title: Arcade Rope
items.description: Arcade Rope is a fun casual game where you play as a stickman with a rope tied around your waist, swinging from structure to structure to demolish them. Demolish obstacles, collect resources, and perform acrobatic feats as you navigate the island. Earn wood resources with each successful swing to exchange for money. Upgrade your rope's length and capacity to overcome challenging levels. Arcade Rope combines precision, strategy, and resource management for an exciting and thrilling gameplay experience. Swing, collect, and conquer the island in this captivating stickman adventure!

items.title: Arkadium's Bubble Shooter
items.description: Arkadium's Bubble Shooter is an exciting casual bubble shooter game. Match three or more bubbles of the same color to clear them and increase your score. Let's get popping!

items.title: Ascent
items.description: Ascent is a casual game about evolution and the circle of life. Begin your journey as a lowly aquatic creature at the bottom of the primordial ocean. Your goal is to survive, evolve, and reach the surface of the sea! Consume food to grow bigger. Once you've matured, find yourself a mate. Collect enough biomaterials from decaying creatures for your baby. Take over the child creature, and congratulations, you've climbed one step up the evolution ladder! And so the cycle repeats: grow, reproduce, evolve, and move up through the ocean. Avoid creatures that are not your species. If you die, don't worry; your soul will get another chance! Slip into another young body to continue your journey. But watch out, the foggy realm between the worlds makes it hard to see enemies—another collision will end the game.

items.title: ASMR Girl: Livestream Mukbang
items.description: ASMR Girl: Livestream Mukbang is a casual food game where you are the star of a mukbang stream. You get to enjoy delicious dishes, interact with your audience, and grow your popularity with every bite, all on camera! Each meal takes you closer to becoming even more popular, so keep eating, keep engaging, and watch your virtual foodie journey unfold.

items.title: Atari Breakout
items.description: Atari Breakout is an updated version of the legendary Breakout game by Atari. The aim of the game is to bat the ball at the colored blocks until there are none left, while making sure the ball does not pass your paddle. Enjoy this classic game with power-ups to boost you to the next level.

items.title: Auto RiskRisk
items.description: Auto RiskRisk is a strategic 2D card battle game. This is an auto battler game where you must manage your fighters by strategically equipping different items and artifacts to assemble the strongest team possible in order to win the battle. Send them off to fight against AI opponents in single-player or against other human players online. By combining certain types of items, you can increase your strength or counter the opponents' strategies. Collect money after each battle and use it to level up and buy new equipment for your fighters. You can also buy multiple of the same items to combine them into stronger versions. Each item belongs to two different sets. If you collect multiples of the same set, you get additional set bonuses. Your fighters will automatically run out and fight for you with the equipment you have assigned to them. The loser of the battle will lose health, and if you go down to 0 health, you are out of the game. The last player standing is the winner!

items.title: Axy Snake 3D
items.description: Axy Snake 3D is a classic Snake arcade game in a brightly colored 3D world! Direct the snake to devour fruit, and avoid the enemies that bother you. With retro charm and modern visuals, it's a nostalgia trip for old-school gamers. Test your reflexes, chase your tail, and conquer enemies to become the ultimate snake master. Get ready to slide into adventure and nostalgia!

items.title: Baby Chicco Adventures
items.description: Baby Chicco Adventures is a platform game in which you will help our little penguin to escape the dangers of the video game world.

items.title: Bacteria
items.description: Bacteria is a casual game that lets you inject bacteria into creatures to create monstrous beings! Unleash your creativity as you experiment with different combinations and see what kind of monstrous results you can achieve. Inject the bacteria strategically to produce powerful and unique creatures, each with its own set of abilities and characteristics. Dive into this addictive game of bacteria manipulation and witness the evolution of your creatures into formidable monsters!

items.title: Bad Cat - Granny's Return
items.description: Bad Cat - Granny's Return is a delightful casual adventure where you embrace the life of a mischievous feline. Explore a sprawling house filled with interactive objects to climb, scratch, and topple. Each room offers surprises, unique challenges, and exciting mini-games. Unleash your inner chaos-maker as you leave your mark, literally and figuratively, on every piece of furniture and decor!

items.title: Bad Dolls
items.description: Bad Dolls is a battle shooter game where you must choose the most sinister doll to face waves of ruthless enemies. Armed with a vast array of weapons and strategies, defeat all challengers to become the ultimate champion. With four unique game modes, including Single, Endless, 2p CO-OP, and 2p VS, players can enjoy hours of adrenaline-pumping action!

items.title: Badland
items.description: In Badland, you control a mysterious creature in a dark forest. Traps and obstacles are waiting along the way, and you must reach the exit pipe to finish the level. Be cautious of your surroundings, and pay attention to the screen as you move, because if the screen hits you, you have to restart. Try to complete challenges in each level.

items.title: Bag Defense
items.description: Bag Defense is an action-packed adventure where strategy and skill are key to survival! Carefully choose and manage your weapons, armor, and supplies to fend off relentless waves of monsters and defend your territory. With limited backpack space, every decision counts as you craft the ultimate gear setup to face increasingly powerful foes. Progress through thrilling chapters, conquer evolving challenges, and prove yourself as the ultimate defender against the monster invasion!

items.title: Bakery Manager: Store Simulator
items.description: Bakery Manager: Store Simulator is a casual simulation game where you manage a bakery on one of the hottest strips in town. You get to serve customers, scan items, handle cash, and manage stock to keep the line moving and shoppers smiling. As your bakery gains popularity, you can unlock new bakery goods, upgrade the store, and expand the business into the town’s go-to destination for sweet treats and more.

items.title: Ball Blast
items.description: Ball Blast is a hypercasual game where you blast cannon balls at numbered shapes until they explode. Move side to side to avoid the balls hitting you! See how long you survive and blast as many balls as you can!

items.title: Ball Blaster
items.description: Ball Blaster is an arcade game where you must defend your base from relentless balls. Take control of a powerful cannon and aim to destroy the incoming balls to protect your base. Upgrade your cannon's strength, power, and speed to become an unstoppable force. Can you withstand the onslaught and emerge victorious? Prepare yourself for an intense arcade experience!

items.title: Ball Guys
items.description: Ball Guys is a fun physics merge game where you drop the ball strategically to merge them together. Watch them bounce and merge together, racking up points with every madcap collision. Try to get big combos and get a high score!

items.title: Ball Hero Adventure: Red Bounce Ball
items.description: Ball Hero Adventure: Red Bounce Ball is a brilliant arcade game in which you must control a red ball. You must use the controls to move the ball through a series of challenges and obstacles.

items.title: Balloon Clash
items.description: Balloon Clash is a casual game where players collect weapons to engage in battles against enemy balloons. This concept combines action, strategy, and perhaps a touch of humor. Players are likely to enjoy the challenge of collecting the right weapons and using them effectively to defeat their opponents.

items.title: Bar Master
items.description: Bar Master is a casual game where you step into the shoes of a bar manager and take charge of your establishment. From serving drinks to expanding your bar empire, this casual simulation game puts you in control of every aspect of running a successful bar business. Manage your staff, upgrade your facilities, and attract more customers to become the ultimate bar master!

items.title: Bar Rumble
items.description: Bar Rumble is a fast-paced arcade game where you run a lively pub packed with action and strategy. You’ll mix signature cocktails, train a stellar team, and handle rowdy patrons as your bar grows from a local joint to a nightlife hotspot. Keep the drinks flowing, the music pumping, and your business booming in this chaotic yet charming experience.

items.title: Bartender The Right Mix
items.description: Bartender the Right Mix is a casual game where you help the bartender mix drinks in the right ratios to make the ultimate cocktail. Choose from a shelf full of drinks, such as Vodka, Whiskey, Vermouth, Tripple-Sec, Gin, etc., and mix them together for the ultimate drink for a good night out.

items.title: Basket-Ball
items.description: Basket-Ball is a 2D arcade basketball game where you must throw the ball in one shot and be able to catch the star and put the ball into the basket. Avoid obstacles that get in the way and use the portal to teleport the ball. Proof your skill and challenge yourself by beating all the levels available. This game is designed for your fun!

items.title: Battle Hamsters
items.description: Battle Hamsters is a funny game in the genre of turn-based firefight. A lot of funny but dangerous hamsters are hungry for war. Blow up, break, crumble, destroy the enemy, compete with friends. And smash the hamster face of the enemy right now!

items.title: Battle Typer
items.description: Battle Typer is a casual typing game that caters to both beginners and seasoned typists. Offering an immersive experience, it combines entertainment with education, making it ideal for those looking to enhance their typing skills. Specially curated difficulties ease beginners into the game, ensuring a user-friendly interface and enjoyable gameplay. Embark on a typing adventure, challenge friends, and witness your words per minute reach new heights. Immerse yourself in the world of words, speed, and excitement with Battle Typer.

items.title: Battleships Pirates
items.description: Battleships Pirates is a strategic turn-based guessing game where you face off against an opponent in a grid-based naval showdown. Carefully place your ships, plan your strikes, and anticipate every move. Whether you rely on logic or chance, your goal is simple—sink all enemy ships before yours go under. Outsmart, outmaneuver, and win the war at sea.

items.title: Beaver Builder
items.description: Beaver Builder is a fun casual simulation game where you play as a beaver who needs to build dams to protect your village. It is flooding, and it's your job to save the day. Gather up the resources and build and upgrade a raft, houses, and dams. Be careful with the other animals that can hurt you, so gather other beavers to help you out!

items.title: Bed Wars
items.description: Bed Wars is an action-packed casual defense game that immerses you in epic gladiatorial battles with your squad of stickmen. Your journey starts solo, and you aim to protect your base territory while defeating enemies and collecting points along the way.

items.title: Bell Madness
items.description: Bell Madness is a fun, casual game in which you test your neighbor's patience with playful antics. Knock on doors, ring doorbells, and tap on windows to witness hilarious reactions from unsuspecting neighbors. The more pranks you pull off, the more coins you earn. Use your hard-earned coins to unlock a variety of quirky doorbells with unique and amusing sounds. Plus, buy hints to uncover even more delightful surprises. It’s a prankster's paradise where laughter and fun are just a doorbell ring away!

items.title: Big Shark
items.description: Big Shark is a fish-eating game where you avoid bigger fish and eat the small ones to make the shark grow. Are you ready to explore the ocean?

items.title: Big Tower Tiny Square 2
items.description: Big Tower Tiny Square 2 is here, packed with more platforming puzzles than its predecessor. Climb your way up the tower once more to save Pineapple. Featuring the original tower and new obstacles!

items.title: Bike Jump
items.description: Bike Jump is an adrenaline-fueled challenge game! Ride your bike down thrilling ramps, then push the limits by launching off and soaring through the air. Show off your skills with jaw-dropping spins and twists. Take it to the next level by making your driver leap off mid-air. Upgrade engines, add boosts, and unlock bonus powers for the ultimate performance. How extreme can your stunts get?

items.title: Biker Street
items.description: Biker Street is a cool biking platform game with a steampunk theme. The aim is simple – to progress along the track as far as possible without crashing. This might sound easy but you have to get past a heap of different obstacles.

items.title: Bio Zone
items.description: Bio Zone is a defense game in which you must place and merge weapons and use them to kill zombies. The game is set on a post-2000 Earth, a planet devastated by pollution and swarming with mutated monstrosities. Amidst this chaos, one lone stronghold stands tall. As the commander of this fortress, you bear the weight of protecting humanity's final bastion of civilization. Defeat zombies to earn coins and use them to purchase basic weapons. Merge low-level weapons into higher-level ones on the fortress core interface to increase attack power. Don't let the zombies destroy your base!

items.title: Biomons Island 3D
items.description: Biomons Island 3D is a funcasual gamewhere you manage your own pet shop. Go catch the fox, penguin, polar bear, and more to expand your mini mart and attract more visitors. Become the best zoo tycoon in the idle animal park! Discover new mystery biomons in your idle animal park and collect them. There is a customer for every biomon!

items.title: Blade Merge
items.description: Blade Merge is a thrilling blend of merging strategy and intense blade battles. Combine your blades to forge mightier weapons and take down enemy bots in action-packed duels. These spinning, razor-sharp blades are your ultimate tools to slice through foes, reduce their health, and protect your own as you conquer levels in this epic showdown.

items.title: Blaster Pranks
items.description: Blaster Pranks is an arcade game to become the best prankster! Use your toy gun to shoot the people around you, but be careful, don't let them catch you! Collect all the toy gun blasters and all the costumes, and don't forget to upgrade your gun.

items.title: Blob Opera
items.description: Blob Opera is an experimentalmusic gamedeveloped by David Li in collaboration with Google Arts & Culture. The game uses a machine learning model trained on real voices to make it easy for anyone to create amazing operatic music!

items.title: Block Climber
items.description: Block Climber is a platformer where your trusty pickaxe helps you conquer challenging blocky landscapes. Navigate tricky obstacles like collapsing platforms and scorching lava as you make your way to the top. Each level rewards your skill and timing, letting you unlock new characters, tools, and skins to personalize your climber for the next ascent!

items.title: Bloons Player Pack 1
items.description: Bloons Player Pack 1 is a fun arcade game where you must help the monkey to pop all the balloons with its darts.

items.title: Bloons Player Pack 2
items.description: Bloons Player Pack 2 is the second episode of a fun balloon-popping arcade game that you can play in your free time.

items.title: Bloons Tower Defense 4
items.description: Bloons Tower Defense 4, aka BTD 4, is a classic tower defense game initially released in Flash. Defend the path by avoiding Bloons from reaching the end.

items.title: Bobb's World
items.description: Bobb's World is an arcade game where you play as Bobb, who is very hungry and wants to eat all the food in the universe! Help him to go from planet to planet to eat all the food. Avoid hazards and jump on enemies to defeat them. Good luck!

items.title: Bobr Turbo: Craft Cars
items.description: Bobr Turbo: Craft Cars is a creative engineering game where you build powerful machines using upgradeable blocks, boosters, and weapons. You’ll design your own vehicles, open chests for enhancements, and take on rivals in explosive battles. Outsmart opponents, climb the rankings, and prove your mastery as the ultimate builder in a world fueled by imagination.

items.title: Boe Wings
items.description: Boe Wings is a thrilling aerial adventure where you pilot your own plane through stunning landscapes. Collect rewards as you fly, and use them to upgrade your aircraft with powerful enhancements, from turbocharged engines to reinforced wings. Explore diverse maps and complete challenging missions. Get ready to soar through vibrant, cartoonish skies and become the ultimate aviator!

items.title: Bomb Head Hot Potato
items.description: Bomb Head Hot Potato is a thrilling survival game where you dodge bomb blasts and outsmart your opponents in a dynamic arena. Toss bombs to take down enemies, but beware of your own explosions! Progress through challenging levels, unlock new skins and items, and show off your style while proving your survival skills and tactical smarts.

items.title: Bomb Roll
items.description: Bomb Roll is an arcade game where you must throw a bomb at your enemies so they are not blocking your way. Collect the coins and blow up buildings by also throwing the bomb at them. Hit the enemies and watch them fly!

items.title: Bonanza Shooter: Bubble Blast
items.description: Bonanza Shooter: Bubble Blast is an exciting ball-bursting game where you need to complete the mission to win the game. Aim to pop groups of many same-colored bubbles and cause them to burst in a satisfying chain reaction. As you progress, you'll face increasingly challenging levels, each with unique obstacles and power-ups to keep you on your toes. With its vibrant visuals, smooth controls, and addictive gameplay, this game is perfect for players of all ages looking for a fun and engaging experience!

items.title: Bone Breaker Tycoon
items.description: Bone Breaker Tycoon is an arcade game where you throw crowds of cartoon people (not real people) off mountains and earn cash for all the injuries they suffer on the way down. Use cash to hire more crowd members, increase insurance payouts, buy enhancements and gain access to bigger and better mountains. You can even customize your crowd by naming and coloring each person in your crowd.

items.title: Boom Cell
items.description: Boom Cell is a strategic game where you grow from a single cell into a powerful cell brigade. Battle other cell armies, but stay vigilant—larger cell groups will overpower you. Navigate this microscopic world with skill and strategy to become the dominant cell force.

items.title: Boomerang Chang
items.description: Standing on top of the famous Little Ninja Hill, Chang has been under attack for decades. But he is getting tired and now, he needs your help to survive... So let's help Chang by throwing boomerangs, a skill he masters like no one else does. But take care, because the biggest threat is... you! Try to take down as many enemies and survive as long as possible.

items.title: Bounce Blocku Golf
items.description: Bounce Blocku Golf is an arcade game to throw the golf ball into the hole. Avoid obstacles to complete each challenging level.

items.title: Bounce Heroes
items.description: Bounce Heroes is a thrilling blend of idle RPG, merge puzzle, and roguelite action where your hero battles fierce monsters, an evil empire, and ancient beasts, all in pursuit of treasure and victory. Armed with a trusty crossbow and magical bouncy balls dropped by fallen foes, you’ll crush enemies wave after wave.

items.title: Bouncy Dunk
items.description: Bouncy Dunk is the arcade basketball game in which you must try to score as many baskets as possible. The ball will come from different directions, use the clicker on your mouse to make the ball bounce and score into the basket. Your timing as key as you must work out the protectory of the ball as it approaches the rim.

items.title: Bouncy Motors
items.description: Bouncy Motors is a fun casual driving game where you drive a jelly car over various obstacles. Bounce, slide, and maneuver your way to the finish line to complete each level while unlocking cool new skins along the way. But watch out—driving on ice requires extra precision, and those red zones are nothing but trouble.

items.title: Bouncy Pickaxe
items.description: Bouncy Pickaxe is a fun, fast-paced game where you buy, merge, and drop tools to smash blocks and earn money and experience. Strategically upgrade your tools and use boosts to reach new levels, unlocking more rewards. Keep refining your strategy to maximize your earnings and push to the next stage.

items.title: Bouncy Ragdoll
items.description: Bouncy Ragdoll is a physics-based puzzle adventure where you guide a cheerful, wobbly companion through wild obstacle courses. You’ll watch your floppy buddy stumble, bounce, and slide across unpredictable environments filled with humor and lighthearted challenges. Embrace the chaos, relax your mind, and enjoy the playful madness of ragdoll parkour.

items.title: Brainrot Merge: Drop Puzzle
items.description: Brainrot Merge: Drop Puzzle is a wildly absurd merge puzzle game where quirky creatures evolve into chaotic meme-powered icons. Drop and combine animals to unlock hilarious AI-generated characters, each more bizarre than the last. With endless levels, unexpected surprises, and brain-zapping humor, every merge brings you one step closer to the ultimate meme monster.

items.title: Break Free
items.description: Break Free is a casual game that puts your stealth and timing to the test as you escape from one guarded cell after another. Strike when the guards aren’t looking, dodge traps and dogs, and collect coins with each successful breakout. Use your earnings to upgrade your escape artist and take on even trickier challenges.

items.title: Breaking Fall: Epic Bone Blast
items.description: Breaking Fall: Epic Bone Blast is a stress-relief game where you hurl a character off various high places to cause maximum damage. Aim for the perfect angle to break as many bones as possible and earn points. Unlock new characters and experience the ultimate satisfaction with each destructive fall.

items.title: Bricks Breaker
items.description: Bricks Breaker is an arcade game to destroy the numbered bricks by shooting a ball at them. Have some fun with this simple ball shooter game.

items.title: Bridge Race
items.description: Bridge Race is a competitive casual collect building game where you gather blocks to construct your bridge while outsmarting rivals. Stay alert as other players may try to steal your progress, adding an exciting twist to the challenge. Strategize and race to complete your bridge first in this thrilling test of skill and speed!

items.title: Bubble Blast
items.description: Bubble Blast is a fun casual bubble shooter game where you pop bubbles and complete quests. This is the classic game you find yourself and those around you playing on your morning commute to work. Progress through the levels, earning coins and perfecting your skills. Use boosters to help you reach three stars and return for daily rewards!

items.title: Bubble Pop Classic
items.description: Bubble Pop Classic is a fascinating bubble shooter game with a stage-based style, each with its challenge!

items.title: Bubble Shooter
items.description: Bubble Shooter is a free casual puzzle game inspired byPuzzle Bobble. Match 3 of the same colored bubble to pop the group!

items.title: Bubble Spinner
items.description: Bubble Spinner is a match-3 bubble shooter game with a twist. The bubbles are attached to a spinner that rotates when you fire bubbles at it. This adds a dimension of creativity to the gameplay that requires a different approach.

items.title: Bubble Woods
items.description: Bubble Woods is an epic bubble shooter game. You have exactly 60 seconds to try and shoot down as many colored bubbles as possible. If you manage to chain 10 bubbles together then you can release a fierce fireball shot!

items.title: Bucket Crusher
items.description: Bucket Crusher is a satisfying casual game where you tear down walls brick by brick using a circular saw. The bricks go into your Bucket Crusher and get converted into cash for various upgrades!

items.title: Build And Run
items.description: Run, build, and conquer! Construct missing parts of the level while running, using ramps, slopes, and horizontal builds. Arm yourself with knives, guns, and TNT to defeat enemies and clear obstacles. Enjoy Level Mode or Endless Mode, and spend earned coins in the shop to customize your character with stylish hats and shoes.

items.title: Build your Rocket
items.description: Build your Rocket is a casual game that challenges you to build and launch your own rocket. Your goal is to fly as high as possible, reaching different planets and unlocking new levels.

items.title: Bum Ben
items.description: Bum Ben is a game where you play as Ben, an office clerk who loses everything after a risky crypto investment. Now, you must help Ben survive by using his instincts to scavenge for food and fight to stay alive. Embrace natural selection and see if you have what it takes to endure.

items.title: Bumbly Bee
items.description: Bumbly Bee is a lighthearted arcade adventure where you buzz around collecting flowers as a charming little bee. Navigate the vibrant and whimsical environments. Enjoy a relaxing vibe as you gather all the honey in your path. With its delightful visuals and engaging gameplay, Bumbly Bee offers fun for players seeking either a challenge or a peaceful escape.

items.title: Burger Boss
items.description: Burger Boss is a restaurant simulation game where you take charge as the boss. Build your fast food empire in this thrilling restaurant management game! Serve up mouthwatering burgers, fries, pizza, drinks, and ice cream to satisfy hungry customers. Manage every aspect of the restaurant, from hiring and training staff to perfecting the menu. Keep customers happy, upgrade your kitchen equipment, and unlock new recipes to expand your offerings. Make strategic decisions to grow your business and become the ultimate Burger Boss! Are you ready to embark on this delicious journey? Play now and show off your management skills!

items.title: Burger Life
items.description: Burger Life is a fun simulation game where you run your own burger restaurant. Sell burgers to clients, collect payments and tips, clean tables, and make sure seats are always available. Upgrade all your grills, counters, and tables, and grow your business as much as you can. Hire employees to handle diverse tasks and support you in your journey!

items.title: Bush Ragdoll
items.description: Bush Ragdoll is a physic ragdoll game to take control of G-Dubya as he bounces and falls into the bubbles forever.

items.title: Calm Them Down
items.description: Calm Them Down is a casual game with a sense of humor and strategy, challenging players to manage a growing army of quirky heads. The game encourages creative thinking as you decide how to combine heads for the best results in the arena battles.

items.title: Candy Bubble
items.description: Candy Bubble is a fun lollipop-based bubble shooter game. Don't be fooled though; the game is as challenging as it is colorful! Have fun and try to beat all the levels.

items.title: Cannon Balls 3D
items.description: Cannon Balls 3D is an exciting casual game that puts your aiming skills to the test. Wield the cannon to demolish all objects in your path, but beware, as you only have a limited number of cannonballs at your disposal. Plan your shots wisely to maximize the impact and clear each level. Can you skillfully bring down all the targets with the available cannonballs? Show off your precision and enjoy the thrilling challenge of Cannon Balls 3D!

items.title: Car Drawing Game
items.description: Car Drawing is a casual game where you are tasked to draw a one-line car and successfully reach the finish line. The Car Drawing Game is all about drawing a car to overcome the obstacles on each level. Draw your goofiest car and see if it passes the test!

items.title: Car Flip!
items.description: Car Flip is a casual driving game that takes you on a wild joy ride with friends with one simple mission -- flip your car as much as possible before heading to the parking lot. Launch your car into the air by picking the perfect jump angle, then go for epic flips to snag coins mid-flight. Rack up your loot to unlock awesome new cars and quirky drivers. Put your driving skills to the test across all the levels and show everyone your flipping finesse!

items.title: Card Scramble: Viola's Diner
items.description: Card Scramble: Viola’s Diner is a heartfelt single-player adventure that blends card play with board game strategy. You’ll help Viola revive her family diner by preparing dishes, unlocking new designs, and customizing the space to reflect her memories. Along the way, meet colorful characters like Uncle Joey and enjoy hundreds of levels filled with warmth, challenge, and discovery.

items.title: Carrom Masti Challenges
items.description: Carrom Masti Challenges is a delightful take on the classic carrom game that offers quick and enjoyable gameplay. Test your speedy carrom skills as you flick the puck, complete challenges, and unlock new levels. With a charming Indian theme, Carrom Masti Challenges is the perfect dose of fun you need to brighten up your day.

items.title: Stickman Crowd Fight
items.description: Cartoon Crowd Clash is an arcade game to build warriors and run through the city smashing the gates to increase the size of your crowd. Use power-ups to speed your run and collect coins to buy new skins and earn extra cash even when not playing!

items.title: Castle Keeper
