items.description: Castle Keeper is a defense game where you fight the enemy and protect the castle. Use your archer skills to shoot at the troops and throw ladders or fire barrels to do more damage. Upgrade your character, unlock new abilities, and become stronger!

items.title: Cat Bakery
items.description: Cat Bakery is a casual simulation where you embody a feline entrepreneur managing a bakery. Serve customers, expand your menu, and style your staff to perfection. With each purr-fectly baked treat, unlock new recipes and outfits to dominate the baking scene. Are you ready to whisk your way to the top of town?

items.title: Cat Burglar & The Magic Museum
items.description: Cat Burglar & The Magic Museum is a mouse-only arcade game to loot as much as you can and avoid getting caught by the security guard.

items.title: Cat House
items.description: Cat House is an adorable casual game where you take charge of a cute cat on a mission to tidy up its toys. Navigate through 27 challenging levels, guiding the cat to collect and store each toy while avoiding obstacles. Experience new surprises and twists on each level, keeping you engaged throughout this delightful adventure.

items.title: Cat Life Simulator: Devil Cat
items.description: Cat Life Simulator: Devil Cat is a quirky first-person simulation game where you become a mischievous feline on a mission to create chaos in Grandma’s house. From knocking over furniture to scratching up the walls, each moment is packed with playful destruction. Step into the paws of trouble and embrace your inner devilish kitty.

items.title: Cat Warrior Parkour
items.description: Cat Warrior Parkour is a thrilling parkour adventure where you guide your feline warrior through 7 challenging levels to unlock a final portal. Hone your jumping skills, find hidden jades to unlock custom looks, and express your style. With multiplayer mode, you can invite friends to join you in climbing the obstacles together!

items.title: Cats and Bees
items.description: Cats and Bees is a casual game where you draw a line to create a wall to protect the cat from bees.

items.title: Caveman Life
items.description: Caveman Life is a simulation game where you play as a stone age chief where you gather, build, hunt, and raise dinos on your way to prehistoric domination!

items.title: Cavern: From the Fog
items.description: Cavern: From the Fog is a tower-defense and mining game at once. You will play as a dwarf who needs to defend his cave. Gather resources to build turrets and upgrade them. Kill all the goblins that want to attack your base. Get some money and use it to upgrade your base, weapon, lantern, etc. Ensure the survival of your clan!

items.title: Checkers Deluxe Edition
items.description: Checkers Deluxe Edition is a casual classic game reimagined! Engage in tactical battles, challenge friends, or face our intelligent AI. Experience timeless fun with sleek graphics and user-friendly controls. Hone your strategic prowess in online matches and become a master of the art of strategy. Ready for an exhilarating Checkers experience like never before?

items.title: Chess Master
items.description: Chess Master is a casual 3D chess game where you need logic and smart strategies to challenge your friends or AI bots and become a true Chess Master!

items.title: Chess Online Multiplayer
items.description: Chess Online Multiplayer is a casual free chess game you can play online with a friend or against an AI opponent. Earn gold to buy stylish new chess boards and pieces!

items.title: Chibi Unicorn Games for Girls
items.description: Chibi Unicorn Games for Girls is a dress-up unicorn game that combines the charm of chibi dolls and magical unicorns. It involves customizing and dressing up your chibi unicorn characters. You can create unique and magical unicorns by selecting different elements like skin color, horns, and animated features. The game encourages creativity in mixing and matching clothing, accessories, wings, and more to design your ideal unicorn. The ability to save screenshots of your creations adds an extra layer of enjoyment as you can use these images as wallpapers on your device!

items.title: Chicken Scream
items.description: Chicken Scream is a laugh-out-loud casual arcade platform game where your voice takes control! Unleash your inner chicken and scream your way to victory in this hilarious voice-controlled adventure. Searching for a quirky game that gets you talking (or yelling)? Look no further: Chicken Scream is the perfect game for you!

items.title: CircloO
items.description: CircloO is an arcade platformer game in which you control a circle that must collect other circles to expand the level and continues the game. The game uses a physics engine that you must manipulate as you cannot jump, build momentum up to successfully travel around the map.

items.title: CircloO 2
items.description: This is the second installment of this fun and exciting puzzle game,circloO. The aim of the game remains the same – to collect all the circles in every level. In this second title, you are confronted with a whole host of new challenges and levels.

items.title: City Takeover
items.description: City Takeover is an addictive casual strategy game where your ultimate goal is to dominate the entire city by building your buildings as you occupy enemy buildings with your community. Strategically connect buildings to expand your influence, build the largest and most powerful army, and outmaneuver your opponents. Every decision counts as you grow your forces and launch tactical assaults to crush enemy strongholds.

items.title: World Conqueror
items.description: Enter an epic battlefield in World Conqueror, a casual yet strategic game where you lead your army through the ages to conquer the world! Build and evolve your army, moving through historical eras to unlock elite units such as archers, swordsmen, snipers, and infantrymen. React quickly, think strategically, and use your tactics to outwit the enemy. Victory lies in mastering the art of evolution and warfare!

items.title: Clash of Warriors
items.description: Clash of Warriors is a tower defense game where strategy is key. Command and control an army of fighters from three warrior classes of each era. Your mission is to defeat enemy hordes and destroy their base. With each victory, upgrade and strengthen your army, unlock new eras, and engage in epic battles!

items.title: Backgammon Online
items.description: Backgammon Online is a casual game adapted from the original board game for online players. This is a game of logic that allows you to play the classic and ancient board game of backgammon against other players worldwide. This game has been around for years, almost 5000 to be exact, and this classic title has all of the standard gameplay and rules.

items.title: Classic Bowling
items.description: Enjoy yourself with this classic bowling game. Try to hit as many pins as you can!

items.title: Classic Card Games Collection
items.description: Classic Card Games Collection is a collection of over 150 solitaire card games, including favorites like Klondike, Spider, and Freecell. Explore new games with clear rules for every variation. Customize your gaming experience with unique card designs, backgrounds, and animated win effects. Dive into the classics or try something new while enjoying the personalized feel of each game.

items.title: Classic Labyrinth 3D
items.description: Classic Labyrinth 3D is a casual arcade game with a physics mechanism where you must control the steel ball to reach the finish. With handcrafted levels from various creators, things get trickier as you go. Balance that ball through the maze, but watch out for those sneaky holes!

items.title: Climbing Block
items.description: Climbing Block is a colorful climbing challenge where timing is everything. Click to leap from block to block, aiming for perfect landings to reach new heights and earn more coins. Unlock 30 adorable characters—from grumpy cats to magical unicorns—and chase high scores in this fun, vibrant stacking adventure.

items.title: Coffee Idle
items.description: Coffee Idle is a casual clicker game where you start a small coffee business and transform it into a thriving hot spot, becoming the ultimate coffee mogul. Watch it flourish into a bustling empire as you upgrade your equipment and enhance your brewing techniques. Train your baristas to perfection while crafting a delightful menu of beverages, including frothy cappuccinos and rich Irish coffee. Maximize your profits by optimizing production speeds and expanding your customer base, ensuring that every cup is served with excellence. With strategic planning and a passion for coffee, you'll build a caffeinated kingdom that dominates the market.

items.title: Colojon
items.description: Colojon is a casual game where you can color many collections of pixelated images to increase your good mood. You can also use your imagination and create your own image! This game is soothing and relaxing. It can develop your concentration, patience, and color-matching skills. It's an easy activity for people of all ages!

items.title: Color Fill 3D
items.description: Color Fill 3D is a casual color game where you move a block to spread color across an entire grid. Navigate carefully to avoid obstacles and enemies while planning each move strategically. As levels progress, the challenges grow more intricate, requiring precision and timing. Test your skills in this vibrant, brain-teasing adventure filled with engaging puzzles!

items.title: Color Hole
items.description: Color Hole is a fun casual game where you control a hole that sucks in objects. Your task is to guide the hole to eat all the white objects while avoiding the colorful ones. As you progress through the levels, the game gets more challenging with more complex obstacles to avoid. Use your strategy and quick reflexes to become the ultimate Color Hole master!

items.title: Color Line
items.description: Now control the color cube and go to the destination, but be careful of the obstacles along the way.

items.title: Color Music Hop Ball Games
items.description: Color Music Hop Ball Games is a rhythm-based game where you guide a bouncing ball along a vibrant track in sync with energetic EDM beats. You’ll time each move to the music, hit glowing tiles, and keep the momentum alive. Let the rhythm lead you as you turn each level into a colorful, pulse-pounding dance journey.

items.title: Color Page ASMR
items.description: Color Page ASMR is a casual art coloring game where you draw and color hundreds of beautiful pictures. It is fun, easy, and relaxing, perfect for players of all ages. Dive into a serene world filled with hundreds of captivating illustrations, from whimsical animals and lush botanicals to everyday objects and scenes from around the globe.

items.title: Color Pixel Art Classic
items.description: Color Pixel Art Classic is a cool pixel-based casual art drawing game where precision and creativity meet. Choose from a wide selection of images to fill them in to become colorful masterpieces! Select the right hues, and aim to recreate each image with perfect accuracy. Whether you're working on a beginner-friendly design with just a few colors or tackling a more advanced piece with a wide range of shades, Color Pixel Art Classic is a perfect way to hone in on your digital art skills, perfect for all levels.

items.title: Color Tap: Coloring by Numbers
items.description: Color Tap: Coloring by Numbers is a relaxation game for a serene world of creativity. Immerse yourself in the soothing art of coloring, one piece at a time, as you destress with each gentle tap. Whether you're a coloring novice or a seasoned pro, this mindful journey invites you to unwind, focus, and express your creativity. Dive into meticulously detailed pictures, choosing your colors and creating your masterpiece, one tap at a time. Will you follow the numbers or embrace your inner artist and forge your unique path? Start your calming coloring adventure today with Color Tap: Coloring by Numbers!

items.title: Color Zone
items.description: Color Zone is a vibrant strategy game where card-based combat meets territory control. Build powerful decks, deploy clever unit combos, and paint the arena in your faction’s color to seize dominance. With a mix of tower defense mechanics, upgrades, and customization, every match is a fast-paced battle of brains and bold moves.

items.title: Coloring by Numbers: Pixel House
items.description: Coloring by Numbers: Pixel House is a soothing puzzle game that transforms the act of coloring into a calming and creative experience. Whether you're looking to unwind after a long day or simply indulge your creative side, this game provides the perfect escape into a world of color and design.

items.title: Coloring by Numbers: Pixel Room
items.description: Coloring by Numbers: Pixel Room is a relaxing coloring game that combines creativity with design. Transform empty rooms into stunning spaces by coloring furniture and decor, then placing them to build your dream interiors. Match colors to numbers with simple taps, letting the meditative process melt away stress. Bring your vision to life as a designer while soothing music enhances the experience.

items.title: Computer Repair
items.description: Computer Repair is a funcasual gamewhere you follow various instructions to fix computers. Complete each task successfully and earn money for the repairs!

items.title: Connect idle
items.description: Connect idle is a casual game where you have to create your own road system. There will be different buildings in each block, draw roads between buildings to get profit in different currencies. Complete buildings to increase the number of cars. Improve the system with other currencies and expand your boundaries!

items.title: Connect People: State Control
items.description: Connect People: State Control is a casual game where you craft intricate communication networks, linking points on the map to fortify global connections. Seamlessly blend traffic control with relaxation as you weave through countries and regions, amplifying the power of emojis to heal and enhance earnings. Uncover breathtaking locales as you expand your influence across the world.

items.title: Construction Ramp Jumping
items.description: Construction Ramp Jumping is a stunt car game that defies the laws of gravity. Experience the thrill as you launch 12 tons of metal into buildings, creating a breathtaking spectacle of destruction. With a variety of exciting locations and heavy vehicles at your disposal, indulge in the art of chaos and unleash your inner daredevil. Get ready for heart-pounding action and mind-blowing jumps!

items.title: Cooking Festival
items.description: Cooking Festival is a casual cooking game where you embark on a Global Culinary Adventure! Unleash your inner master chef as you travel the world, creating mouthwatering dishes that will tantalize taste buds. From fluffy pancakes to sizzling ribs, authentic Italian pizzas to delightful ice cream, indulge in the art of cooking with just a tap. Explore vibrant cities like San Francisco, Naples, and Berlin, and marvel at iconic landmarks along the way. Join food festivals, compete in thrilling tournaments, and unlock a plethora of ingredients to elevate your culinary creations. Impress special guests like the Festival Dragon, Geisha, and Fluffy Bear to receive exclusive rewards. Upgrade your restaurants with over 250 delectable dishes and mesmerizing decorations. With over 900+ stages to conquer, the Cooking Festival awaits your culinary expertise!

items.title: Cooking Live
items.description: Cooking Live is a casual game where you take on the role of Jane, a globetrotting food blogger who is passionate about promoting local restaurants and talented chefs. The game's objective is to empower and support these local cooks and their eateries while showcasing their culinary skills and unique dishes to the world!

items.title: Cool Kingdom
items.description: Cool Kingdom is a strategic decision-making game that places you in the role of a king tasked with guiding your realm through perilous times. As the ruler, every decision you make matters, whether it's a simple "yes" or "no." It has profound effects on critical resources like population, happiness, wealth, and authority. Interact with a vibrant cast of characters, including wizards, advisors, and enigmatic beings, who will present you with tough choices and unforeseen challenges. Will you forge a legacy as a wise and just king, or will your choices plunge the kingdom into chaos?

items.title: Copter
items.description: Copter is the game that the current generation of youngsters know asFlappy Bird. Avoid the obstacles and get as far as possible. Hard but addictive!

items.title: Count Masters: Stickman Games
items.description: Count Masters: Stickman Games is a fast-paced running game where you gather a growing army of stickmen to clash against rival crowds. Navigate through obstacles, choose the best paths to multiply your numbers, and lead your team to victory. Battle fierce opponents, defeat the King-stickman, and claim the castle in an action-packed race filled with strategy and excitement!

items.title: Crazy Ball 3D
items.description: Crazy Ball 3D is an endless game in which you must try to guide a ball through a never-ending series of road. The speeds are incredible, and you must have excellent reactions to gain a high score.

items.title: Crazy Colors
items.description: Crazy Colors is a lively multiplayer battle where strategy and chaos collide. Move across the arena to paint the ground in your color while competing to cover 50% of the map first. Use bombs, charges, and traps to gain the upper hand, dodge obstacles, and defend against rivals. Outsmart opponents and dominate the battlefield in this fast-paced challenge!

items.title: Crazy Dummy Swing Multiplayer
items.description: Crazy Dummy Swing Multiplayer is a fast-paced multiplayer game where you swing, launch, and fling your custom-built dummy across wild obstacle maps. You’ll race to escape the factory, grab onto anchor points, and chase the top of the daily leaderboard. With new maps each day, your timing and creativity decide how far you’ll go.

items.title: Crazy Jump Jump Multiplayer
items.description: Crazy Jump Jump Multiplayer is a high-energy game where you leap between walls, avoiding missiles, traps, and spinning saws at every turn. Customize your character’s look and compete against other players in a wild vertical race. Test your reflexes, outmaneuver rivals, and climb as high as you can in this thrilling challenge.

items.title: Crazy Office: Slap and Smash!
items.description: Crazy Office: Slap and Smash! is a slapstick beat-em-up that turns a dull office into a hilarious battlefield. You’ll throw chairs, swing golf clubs, and cause ragdoll mayhem as you fight your way past coworkers and unhinged bosses. Rise through the floors, unleash chaos, and deliver your final smackdown to the CEO in true cubicle-conquering style.

items.title: Crazy Roll 3D
items.description: Crazyroll 3D is an addictive endless running game inspired by Slope. Control a ball that’s thrust down a series of slanted and sloped platforms. Avoid all the obstacles, collect diamonds, and roll as far you can!

items.title: Crazy Sheep
items.description: Crazy Sheep is a challenging and fun casual game where you help a clumsy sheep get safely to the other side by building a bridge from moving blocks. The game tests your reflexes and patience, as you'll need to stop the moving blocks at just the right moment to create a smooth path for the sheep to cross. Can you time your moves perfectly and help the sheep reach the other side?

items.title: Crazy Walk
items.description: Crazy Walk is a fun-filled casual game that puts your skills to the test as you navigate through various obstacles with ragdoll movement. Take control of one of seven charming characters who hilariously struggle to maintain balance. Guide them toward the finish line while overcoming challenges and maintaining their stability. Prepare for an entertaining and wobbly adventure in this game!

items.title: Create-A-Ride
items.description: Create-a-Ride is just like a dress up game, but this time, its for your car - and there's nothing more awesome that that! Give your car your dream paint job, add decals, soup it up with different parts, you can even make custom plates! When you're done, take it out in different scenarios to see your creation in action. This ride is yours to customize, so let your creativity run wild in Create-a-Ride.

items.title: Create Your Beach
items.description: Create Your Beach is a casual game where you manage the operations of a beach and grow the business. Earn money by fulfilling the visitors’ needs. Use the money to increase and improve the beach facilities and attract more customers!

items.title: Cross Stitch
items.description: Cross Stitch is a casual embroidery art game where you fill the labeled cells with the correct colors, a sort of "stitch by color" on a digital fabric and hoop. There are 50 beautiful drawings to color, sorted from easiest to hardest. Cross Stitch is a fun and relaxing game for people of all ages.

items.title: Cross Stitch 2
items.description: Cross Stitch is a coloring game where you need to fill in the cells of a picture by following a numbered pattern, similar to a coloring-by-numbers game. The game features beautiful drawings that are sorted by difficulty level, with easier ones first and more challenging ones later. This game is suitable for people of all ages who want to pass the time in a fun and useful way.

items.title: Crowd Lumberjack Stickman
items.description: Crowd of Lumberjacks Stickman is a casual game where you must grab an ax and start working! Gather as many lazy lumberjacks into your team as possible and start building houses and buildings on the island! Control the crowd and cut trees. Build an amazing city and explore the island. Start the game solo and gather a horde of lumberjacks as you progress through the levels. Become an energetic mob of lumberjacks on the island. Only the strongest and most assembled team can cut down a large forest and build a city. Unite all lumberjacks on the island and improve their skills. The stronger and faster lumberjacks, the more work they have on the island.

items.title: Cube Island 3D
items.description: Cube Island 3D is a game where you, as brave Steve, transform a mysterious uninhabited island into a thriving paradise. Start from scratch, gather resources, complete tasks, and discover new islands. Engage in construction, development, and crafting to survive and prosper in this exciting journey of creativity and strategic decision-making.

items.title: CubeCraft: Merge & Battle
items.description: CubeCraft: Merge & Battle is a casual merge game where you step into the world of CubeCraft, where battles, strategy, and powerful merges await! Your mission? Defend the Noob village by merging mobs into unstoppable monsters and crushing invading enemies!

items.title: Cubic Frontier: Zombie Robby
items.description: Cubic Frontier: Zombie Robby is an engaging casual defense game where you become humanity's last hope against an apocalyptic horde of zombies! Build your fortress, train soldiers, and fight waves of terrifying undead, including massive Zombie Titans. With strategic gameplay and exciting features, this game challenges you to defend humanity at all costs.

items.title: Cubie Adventure World
items.description: Cubie Adventure World is an exciting platformer where you join Cubie and Cupet friends in a vibrant world. With simple one-touch gameplay, navigate through engaging terrains, dodge obstacles, and outrun foes. Challenge your skills in thrilling races against friends, and take on intense boss battles. Unleash special effects with adorable characters as you strive for victory!

items.title: Cubie Jump
items.description: Cubie Jump is an arcade game where you embark on a journey with your adorable Cubie & Cupet friends. Navigate changing landscapes, collect fruit to slow down, and employ double jumps strategically to progress further. With charming low-poly visuals and over 70 unique characters to unlock, the game offers immersive one-touch controls and endless excitement.

items.title: Cucumber Man
items.description: Cucumber Man is a funny casual arcade game where you must control this weird-looking cucumber with a long tongue. Drag your body to the finish line using your tongue since you don't have feet and hands. Collect coins along the way and use them to unlock new skins. Get ready and show off your tongue skills!

items.title: Cursed Treasure
items.description: Cursed Treasure Game - epic tower defense! This is the first episode of Cursed Treasure. Place towers strategically and don't let the looters steal your gems! The main aim of the game is to build towers and keep your gems safe from the invading armies. This is an addictive tower defense game that has a great selection of good heroes and tower types.

items.title: Cut In Half
items.description: Cut In Half is a fast-paced game where you slice through obstacles using sharp timing and precision. You’ll dodge red blocks, avoid falling into valleys, and aim to collect goods with every clean cut. Each successful run brings you closer to unlocking new characters and mastering the rhythm of this thrilling slicing challenge.

items.title: Cut in Half, Please!
items.description: Cut in Half, Please! is a precision-based puzzle game that tests your accuracy. Your goal is simple—slice various things exactly in half. Success depends on keeping the volume difference under 5%, so steady hands and sharp focus are key. Challenge yourself with each cut and see if you can master the perfect slice!

items.title: Cut the Rope: Experiments
items.description: Cut the Rope: Experiments is the newest game in this wildly popular series! A professor wants to study Om-Nom's eating behavior and he needs the Om-Nom to eat candy in each level as usual. Enjoy the funny professor's voice as you progress throughout the levels. Can you help feeding Om-Nom with delicious candy while collecting three stars? Good luck!

items.title: Cute Kitchen
items.description: Cute Kitchen is a casual restaurant game where you enjoy culinary delights with adorable characters and delicious challenges! Start on a kitchen adventure where you match ingredients to serve hungry customers. Earn coins to open new restaurants and customize your chef with stylish clothes and accessories. With hundreds of levels and colorful graphics, cooking will be a blast. Get ready to smile!

items.title: Cuttie Pet Shop
items.description: Cuttie Pet Shop is a casual game where you need to run the animal shop business. Get the animals and put them in the exhibit so people can adopt them. Take care of your cute little pets and make your establishment the best in the world!

items.title: Daily Emoji Hunt
items.description: Daily Emoji Hunt is a zany visual puzzle where you dive into a chaotic swirl of bouncing emoji to track down ten elusive targets. Each day brings a fresh brain-teasing challenge that sharpens your reflexes and clue-cracking skills. It’s a quick, lighthearted hunt packed with color, clues, and pure emoji energy—perfect for daily fun bursts.

items.title: Dalgona Candy Honeycomb Cookie
items.description: Dalgona Candy Honeycomb Cookie is a fun, shape-carving challenge where you’ll carefully cut out designs from honeycomb cookies. With levels that feature classic dalgona, American cookies, and more, you’ll have plenty of shapes to carve from hearts to animals using a variety of cookie carver tools. Embrace the challenge and create delightful cookie masterpieces!

items.title: Dalgona Game
items.description: Dalgona Game is a delicate test of skill where you carefully carve shapes from a nostalgic dalgona treat. With steady hands and patience, cut along the outline without breaking the shape. Success depends on your precision master the art, and you’ll be rewarded with a perfectly preserved treat!

items.title: Dandan Slime
items.description: Dandan Slime is an action-packed horde survival arcade game where you play as a heroic slime tasked with defending the dungeon.

items.title: Dash Hero
items.description: Dash Hero is a casual game where you become a courageous hero on a quest to rescue the princess. Navigate through challenging levels, confront enemies, and showcase your skills in epic battles. Embark on an exciting journey filled with danger and excitement, where every move counts towards your ultimate goal of saving the kingdom. Are you ready to embrace your destiny and become the hero you were meant to be?

items.title: Day D Tower Rush
items.description: Day D Tower Rush is a tower defense game where you must build towers to attack the dinosaur! Meet a combination between the power of technology and ancient creatures in this game. Set up your strategy to defeat the dinosaurs.

items.title: DayCare Tycoon
items.description: DayCare Tycoon is a fun and casual business simulation game where you take charge of running and expanding a daycare facility. As the manager, your goal is to grow your business, attract more clients, and create a successful childcare empire. Handle the needs of children, upgrade your daycare with new facilities, and strategically manage resources to maximize earnings.

items.title: Death Ball
items.description: Death Ball is a casual game where you take a ball and throw it to your opponent until you become the last one standing. Swing hard, throw the ball, and let the people fly!

items.title: Deep Miners Idle
items.description: Deep Miners Idle is an idlemining gamewhere you mine resources and dig deeper underground. Assemble a team of miners and go hunting for rarities lodged in the Earth’s crust! Keep upgrading to speed up the money-making process.

items.title: Deep Miners Idle 2
items.description: Deep Miners Idle 2 is another sequel to the mining game Deep Miners Idle. Get ready to assemble a team of miners and fulfill the goals to reach the bowel of the earth! Collect materials as you mine and bring them to the base after your bag is full. Don't forget to upgrade and hire a new team member to help you.

items.title: Deep Sea Duel
items.description: Deep Sea Duel is a casual underwater game where you'll pilot your submarine into the deep sea for epic battles and thrilling quests. Your mission is to claim the title of the ocean's top fish hunter. Compete against other players, showcasing your submarine skills and precision in hunting fish. Can you rise to the challenge and dominate the depths?

items.title: Deez Balls
items.description: Deez Balls is a chaotic physics-based battle where you fight to knock rival spheres out of the ring. Each victory levels you up, unlocking stronger upgrades as enemies grow smarter and tougher. With nonstop action, rising difficulty, and addictive gameplay, every round pushes your skills to the limit—will you dominate or be thrown off the edge?

items.title: Defenders of the Realm: An Epic War
items.description: Defenders of the Realm: An Epic War is a tower defense game to not let your enemies surpass your base. Try to put your troop, which has different skills, in the right place to win the war.

items.title: Desert Riders: Car Battle Game
items.description: Desert Riders: Car Battle Game is a casual destroy game where you fight intense battles from a weapon-fitted vehicle. Fight various enemies with an array of weapons, cars, and upgrades. Tear other cars to shreds and battle tricky bosses. Dive into the desert and start shooting!

items.title: Designville: Merge & Design
items.description: Designville: Merge & Design is a casual game that takes you on a creative adventure to renovate and decorate various spaces. Tackle unique design challenges, craft stunning interiors, and turn your studio into the best in town. Unleash your creativity to bring your dream designs to life and grow your decorating empire!

items.title: Dessert Maker
items.description: Dessert Maker is a fun-filled dessert creation game where you can craft the sweetest treats! Make creamy ice cream, colorful popsicles, fluffy waffles, refreshing bingsu, and even rolled ice cream. Mix flavors, experiment with toppings, and design your perfect masterpiece. Unleash your creativity and become a true dessert artist!

items.title: Destiny King
items.description: Destiny King is a medieval strategy adventure where you guide a young king as he rebuilds a fallen realm. Grow your barren land into a thriving kingdom by making wise decisions, leading soldiers into battle, and investing gold into upgrades. Hunt boars, rescue hostages, collect taxes, and take on mini challenges—your choices shape the fate of the realm.

items.title: Diamond Drawing by Numbers
items.description: Diamond Drawing by Numbers is a coloring game that allows you to fill the images with beautiful diamond pixels. Diamond pixels can be pressed all over the canvas to bring gorgeous images to life. There are plenty of image collections you can choose from. Pick your favorite pen and gem shape. Start placing the colored gems on your favorite image to make it shine!

items.title: Dice Roll: Protect the Relic
items.description: Dice Roll: Protect the Relic is a tower defense game that combines strategic dice-rolling with magical combat. You’ll defend an ancient relic from enemy waves by rolling dice with unique powers like fireballs, ice barriers, and healing spells. Each roll activates different abilities, making every move crucial to your survival.

items.title: Digital Circus: Obby
items.description: Digital Circus: Obby is an adventure game where you traverse intricate parkour levels crafted by the mysterious Caine. Immerse yourself in a virtual circus world, aiding Pomni's escape by conquering challenging Obby tracks. Test your skills as you navigate the mesmerizing digital circus, facing a captivating challenge at every turn.

items.title: Digital Circus: Parkour Game
items.description: Digital Circus: Parkour Game is a casual parkour game where you navigate unique parkour levels created by the enigmatic Caine. Dive into the virtual circus world, help Pomni escape, and conquer challenging tracks to find the exit. Your skills will be put to the test as you guide Pomni through the digital circus – a captivating challenge awaits!

items.title: Dino Crowd
items.description: Dino Crowd is an exciting casual game where your objective is to gather a massive army of dinosaurs and create the largest crowd to defeat your opponents. Recruit various dinosaur species and strategically expand your crowd to overpower your rivals. Prove your dominance in this epic dinosaur showdown!

items.title: Dino Defense
items.description: Dino Defense is a casual game where you survive, make money, recruit workers, and build a bigger base to defeat the dinosaurs and survive. Let's drive these dinosaurs back to extinction to ensure our survival in this hostile world.

items.title: Dino's Farm Shop
items.description: Dino's Farm Shop is a prehistorical simulation game where you can run your own shop in a vibrant dinosaur world. Become a friendly dinosaur farmer and immerse yourself in the joys and challenges of managing a bustling farm market. Grow and sell crops, catch and sell fish, and even cook delicious pizzas to satisfy your customers. Expand your market, attract more visitors, and establish yourself as the ultimate destination for farm-fresh products

items.title: Discover the City
items.description: Discover the City is a casual game about earning and automation. Build your town, start production, and buy cars for distribution. Gather resources from buildings and start exploring the amazing map. How far will you expand?

items.title: Disk Strike: Carrom Challenge
items.description: Disk Strike: Carrom Challenge is a simple yet exciting board game where your goal is to pocket all the pucks before your opponent. With smooth controls, realistic physics, and a variety of unlockable items, you can travel the world, compete in stunning arenas, and face worthy opponents.

items.title: DIY Phone Case Shop
items.description: DIY Phone Case Shop is a creative and engaging game where you run your very own phone case store. Design and decorate phone cases to suit your clients' unique styles and requests. From cute patterns to bold themes, use a variety of customization options to craft the perfect look. Attract new customers by decorating your shop with eye-catching items, and earn rewards as you successfully meet each order. As your reputation grows, unlock upgrades to become the ultimate phone case design master. Let your creativity shine and build the most popular phone case shop in town!

items.title: Doctor Teeth
items.description: Doctor Teeth is a fun and educational game in which you must become a dental surgeon and treat a variety of patients! You will have to treat many different ailments such as broken teeth and fillings. As you see each patient you must review their case and check what tools you require to complete the operation.

items.title: Dodge the Walls
items.description: Dodge the Walls is a wall-dodging game where you pose by the wall's hole. To achieve a perfect combo, you must avoid multiple obstacles in a row. Competing with each other for the highest score is both easy to learn and enjoyable for the whole family.

items.title: Dogs vs Aliens
items.description: Dogs vs Aliens is a casual cute simulation game where your beloved pets have been kidnapped by evil aliens. It's time to rescue them and fight back! Evolve your dogs to defeat stronger enemies, free new companions, and collect unique resources to power up your furry defenders. To win the game, you need to save all the pets and send the aliens back to the Moon! Can you save all the dogs and defeat the alien invaders?

items.title: Domino Battle
items.description: Domino Master is a revamped classic offering versatile gameplay where Draw or Block styles deliver equal excitement. Enjoy endless fun without worrying about game mode preferences. Dive into strategic tile-placing action and relish the thrill of outsmarting your opponents. Discover the joy of dominoes anew with this enhanced gaming experience.

items.title: Doodieman Voodoo
items.description: Doodieman Voodoo is an awesome and hilarious arcade game in which you must help the Doodieman (yes there is a character called this) shoot poop at a voodoo doll... Yes this is a real game! If this hasn't peaked your interest yet, we don't know what will.

items.title: Doodle Road
items.description: Doodle Road is an imaginative and captivating 2D casual game that combines creativity with problem-solving. In this fun browser game, your primary objective is to draw a path that will successfully guide a car from the starting point to the finish line. With a multitude of levels to explore, each one introduces new challenges and exciting obstacles that test your creativity and strategic thinking. Draw your way to victory and see how far your creativity can take you!

items.title: DOP Puzzle: Displace One Part
items.description: DOP Puzzle: Displace One Part is a funny casual game for you to have fun while testing your IQ. Each level is a funny story. Enjoy the charming design in a bright cartoon style and charming animation. The game might look simple, however, there are several challenging puzzles among puzzles. Good luck solving them!

items.title: Dragon Merge
items.description: Dragon Merge is a casual game where you can merge and discover new dragons. Discover new and stronger dragons by merging the identical dragons. With your dragon collections, beat the monsters in the battle arena. Your goal is to get the last dragon! This is an addictive, easy-to-go, and neverending play!

items.title: Draw and Break
items.description: Draw and Break is a casual puzzle game where you put your strategic thinking to the test! Your goal is simple: draw lines to guide bouncing balls and hit the delicious donuts! Plan your moves carefully, create the perfect path, and watch the balls bounce their way to victory.

items.title: Draw Bridges
items.description: Draw Bridges is acasualarcade game where you make bridges to carry the ball to the finish line. Aim to the soda cans for strikes and break structures for a satisfying bonus. You can buy new balls with different advantages using the gold you earn!

items.title: Draw Climber
items.description: Draw Climber is a quirky racing casual game where you control your characters by sketching their legs. Create any shape to keep moving, and if you get stuck, simply redraw to overcome obstacles. Experiment with different designs to find the fastest way to the finish line. Can you outdraw and outrun the competition?

items.title: Draw Crash Race
items.description: Draw Crash Race is a casual art game where you not only get to race a car in 3D, but you get to design it beforehand! Show off your drawing skills to build a fast vehicle with a sturdy body to withstand even the most challenging tracks. The races are filled with all kinds of obstacles to avoid, so the drawing challenge is on!

items.title: Draw Defense
items.description: Draw Defense is a casual game to defend your castle by drawing lines with the mouse to crush waves of advancing enemies. Each line drops down to eliminate foes, challenging you to place them strategically before your defenses are breached. The simple controls and fast-paced gameplay make every move crucial as the onslaught intensifies. Combos add excitement, rewarding quick kills of three or more enemies with an ink refill to keep up the momentum. Upgrading your abilities is essential to survival—boost your ink bar's capacity and refill rate for more frequent attacks. These upgrades allow you to keep up with the growing enemy waves, adding depth to the action. As a final line of defense, your archer automatically fires arrows when enemies get close to the castle. Each enemy that reaches the castle costs you one of your three hearts, and losing them all means game over. Draw Defense tests your skill in balancing rapid drawing, timely upgrades, and last-ditch defenses in a thrilling fight for survival.

items.title: Draw Line
items.description: Draw Line is an addicting puzzle game where you need to draw a path for your hero to reach the castle. It may seem easy at first, but watch out for upcoming obstacles. You can pass the level if your hero still holds the bar and touches the castle's flag, even if you touch obstacles. You can try again if you want a perfect pass with three stars! Drawing speed is also important, so plan well!

items.title: Draw Tattoo
items.description: Pay attention to the customers' tattoo requests and carefully make the arts!

items.title: Drift Boss
items.description: Drift Boss is a casual one-click driving game where you drive your car around very tricky corners and over bumps, aiming to reach what seems like an infinite end! The race track has no guardrails, so you will fall off the platform and into an abyss if you make one false move. Keep playing to earn rewards and unlock better cars!

items.title: Drill Quest
items.description: Drill Quest is a casual game combining the excitement of crushing blocks, upgrading your drill, and building your city. Explore diverse locations, progressively upgrade your equipment, and choose from machines. Enjoy addictive and meditative ASMR gameplay as you create and expand your city!

items.title: Dumb Ways to Die 2
items.description: Dumb Ways to Die 2 is the first sequel to the iconic Dumb Ways to Die game. Take part in various tricky challenges and try not to die! These random tasks will test your reflexes, so be alert at all times.

items.title: Dungeon Master - Cult & Craft
items.description: Dungeon Master – Cult & Craft is a darkly captivating 3D dungeon management simulator where you reign as the master of an underground empire. Convert simple stickmen into loyal followers, mine precious resources, and grow a powerful cult beneath the surface. Keep faith high or risk losing control of your dominion. The goal of the game is to manage the dungeon, develop your Cult, and maintain power over your followers.

items.title: Egg Farm
items.description: Egg Farm is an arcade game where you play as a fox who needs to catch all the delicious chicken eggs inside your mouth! It's time to become an egg-cellent egg-catching maestro, but you need to be careful and not eat rotten eggs. Focus on the types of eggs because they can be either helpful or harmful to you. In the process, you’ll also get the chance to customize your character with skins. Explore the egg-citing adventure of Egg Farm world now!

items.title: Eggy Car
items.description: Eggy Car is a casual game where you drive a car containing a loose egg over hilly roads. When the egg falls out of your vehicle, it breaks and the game ends. RIP! Collect power-ups to help you get further. Good luck and godspeed egg soldier.

items.title: Elemental Gloves - Magic Power
items.description: Elemental Gloves - Magic Power is a casual arcade game where you must beat all your enemies with your powerful gloves. Be the element master that can control various superpowers. You can even turn the bad guys into stone or glass. Shoot with fire, splash with water, or simply hit the enemies. Combine elements in the gloves to create a new superpower. For example, you can try to merge lightning and air to turn the bad guys into balloons.

items.title: Elemental Merge
items.description: Elemental Merge is a colorful arcade game where you collect and merge elementals to build a powerful army. Strategically combine your elementals to strengthen and defeat your enemies in exciting battles.

items.title: Ellie's Recipe: Dubai Chocolate Bar
items.description: Ellie’s Recipe: Dubai Chocolate Bar is a stylish cooking game where you help Ellie craft luxurious chocolate creations with a touch of Dubai elegance. Mix ingredients, mold gourmet fillings, and design decadent treats step by step. Explore fashionable outfits, enjoy interactive kitchen fun, and turn every moment into a sweet, chocolate-filled experience that you'll love.

items.title: Emerland Solitaire Endless Journey
items.description: Emerland Solitaire Endless Journey is a puzzle game where you become the hero the world needs! Embark on an incredible journey through a magical land filled with dwarfs, elves, mermaids, and other amazing creatures. Traverse colorful locations, solve mystical card puzzles, and earn stars for your skill as you explore enchanted forests and majestic bluffs with helpful companions.

items.title: Emoji Archer - Shooting Emoji
items.description: Emoji Archer - Shooting Emoji is a lighthearted archery game where your aim meets emoji chaos. You’ll fire arrows at bouncing emoticons, timing each shot with precision to trigger vibrant bursts of color. Tackle moving targets, unlock special arrows, and test your skills across fun, animated levels. Stay sharp, take your shot, and master the emoji battlefield.

items.title: Emoji Ball Blast
items.description: Emoji Ball Blast is a game where you use Hand Cannon Shooters to defeat evil Emoji Balls. The virus-infected balls shrink with each shot until they burst. Upgrade your cannons and call for reinforcements to overcome tougher enemies, including the formidable Big Bad Emoji Boss Ball. Enhance your skills and save the world from chaos.

items.title: Empire City
items.description: Empire City is a casual management game where you strategically construct and govern a thriving empire from nothing. Build magnificent cities, develop resources, and create a unique culture while engaging in trade and diplomacy. Expand your influence, make historic discoveries, and craft wonders that will be remembered for centuries. Your choices shape the future of your empire: lead wisely!

items.title: End of War
items.description: End of War is a simulation game where you must help people and rebuild the cities that were destroyed because of the war. The war passed, and thousands of bombs destroyed cities, forests, and fields. Everything was burned and only ruins remained. The world needs a hero who will unite disparate people of all ages and rebuild cities, someone who will re-grow forests, a person who can rekindle hope for a peaceful existence in the hearts of people and revive life after the era of war. And that person is you! It is you who are able to unite people and rebuild houses, and factories. Rescue people from the rubble and restore forests. Revive the cities and lead the country to prosperity!

items.title: Epic Army Clash
items.description: Epic Army Clash is a merge battle game where you strategically merge and position your army for war. Combine your minions to upgrade them and conquer enemy fortifications. Track your world conquest progress on the map, gain influence, and become the ultimate army!

items.title: Epic Battles
items.description: Epic Battle is a chaotic party game packed with a variety of fast and funny mini-games. You’ll put your timing, strategy, and quick thinking to the test in lighthearted competitions. Whether you’re dodging, racing, or outsmarting others, every round gives you a fresh chance to shine and enjoy endless laughs.

items.title: Eraze That!
items.description: Eraze That! is a unique platform game with a hand-drawn experience in it. Draw a platform for you to run on it and wipe out all the dangerous ink stains that block you ahead. Overcome obstacles and increasingly tougher enemies. You have to act directly on the environment with your trusty pencil and the inseparable eraser.

items.title: Escape the Dog
items.description: Escape the Dog is anarcade gamewhere a big dog chases whoever has its bone. Be fast to get rid of the bone before the dog eats you! It's like a Hot Potato game, but with bigger stakes.

items.title: Exo Observation
items.description: Exo Observation is a space exploration incremental game where you uncover alien worlds and study mysterious lifeforms. You’ll collect resources, build advanced orbital science facilities, and manage them efficiently to progress. Each discovery pushes you closer to unlocking warp gates, letting you expand across the galaxy and continue your quest for knowledge among distant stars.

items.title: Fabby Golf!
items.description: Fabby Golf! is an arcade-style golf 3D game to test your golf skills. Pass all the levels by making perfect shots and hitting the golf hole.

items.title: Falling Art Ragdoll Simulator
items.description: Falling Art Ragdoll Simulator is a game where the more spectacular the fall, the higher the score! Dive into the hilariously absurd world of falling artistry, where watching ragdoll models tumble in ridiculous ways is oddly satisfying. Discover new characters, insane locations, and creative ways to break bones without consequences. Embrace your inner mischief-maker and revel in the chaos of this wild, safe-for-fun game!

items.title: Falling Ball
items.description: Falling Ball is a frantic arcade game in which you need to shoot balls down the screen to take health off of the static circles below. When you shoot, the ball's gravity will make them cascade down the screen, every time they come into contact with the circles it will subtract from the circle's value.

items.title: Farm Family
items.description: Farm Family is a captivating farm simulator game that allows you to build and manage your very own farm. You can cultivate crops, raise animals, and sell your products at the market to make money. With the money you earn, you can expand your farm, buy new resources, and improve your buildings. There are various tasks in the game that let you earn more money and progress to higher levels. If you love farm simulators and want to explore this world, then Farm Family is the perfect game for you!

items.title: Farm Merge
items.description: Farm Merge is a simple farm management game. Plant crops, evolve your cows, upgrade your farm, and unlock new locations in this funfarming sim!

items.title: Farming Life
items.description: Farming Life is a refreshing game where you begin anew in a quaint town with a small farm. Cultivate your land, sell your harvest at the local market, and strive to become the beloved local farmer with the most thriving farm. Nurture your crops and animals to yield bountiful produce, unlocking new seeds, buildings, and equipment for a flourishing farmstead.

items.title: Fast Ball Jump
items.description: Fast Ball Jump is a thrilling adventure game where you roll, spin, and jump through challenging obstacles. Test your focus and speed in this epic ball race across diverse environments. With each level presenting new challenges, only the most skilled players will conquer the journey. Prepare for excitement and relaxation as you immerse yourself in the world of Sphere Sprint.

items.title: Feed Me Monsters!
items.description: Feed Me Monsters! is an action-packed adventure set in a post-apocalyptic world. You play as a courageous hero defending humanity from waves of monstrous creatures and mutants. Fight to survive and protect the last remnants of civilization in this thrilling battle for survival.

items.title: Feeling Arrow
items.description: Feeling Arrow is a casual game where you control people with arrows of feelings. You can use angry, love, sad, crazy arrows, and more! Can you complete each level?

items.title: FG Factory 2
items.description: FG Factory 2 is an incremental idle factory game where you must gather resources and craft items to complete the mission. Drawing inspiration from acclaimed titles like Factorio, Satisfactory, and Dyson Sphere Program, this game offers multiple scenarios to challenge your industrial prowess. Build, automate, and optimize your factories to maximize production and conquer new frontiers. Are you ready to become the ultimate factory tycoon?

items.title: Find Brainrot
items.description: Find Brainrot is a calming 3D hidden object adventure where you hunt for cleverly concealed items in detailed scenes. Peek behind furniture, open drawers, and zoom in to uncover surprises tucked in plain sight. Take your time exploring each environment and enjoy a soothing, satisfying search that sharpens your eye for detail.

items.title: Find The Alien
items.description: Find the Alien is a casual game that challenges you to search your surroundings for hidden alien impostors and zap them before they can complete their invasion. Aliens have infiltrated Earth, and it’s up to you to track them down and eliminate them. Armed with fun and imaginative blaster guns, you must scan every corner of the screen to spot the disguised extraterrestrials. As you progress, the game becomes more intense, with more cunning aliens trying to blend in and avoid detection. Prepare for a thrilling and interactive experience as you protect Earth from an alien takeover! Not too much pressure, right?

items.title: Find The Pets
items.description: Find The Pets is an exciting 3D adventure game where your mission is to track down 150 adorable, hilarious, and sometimes elusive pets hiding across imaginative maps. From meme-famous cats like Floppa to other quirky and delightful creatures, every discovery adds fun and charm to your journey. Explore diverse worlds, overcome tricky obstacles, and make the most of powerful boosts to complete your collection. Are you ready for the ultimate pet-finding challenge?

items.title: Find the Vampire
items.description: Find the Vampire is a fun, casual game where you act as a hunter to stop a vampire uprising. Your mission is to identify bloodsuckers hiding among ordinary people, animals, and even objects, then eliminate them to free the city from danger. Use special exterminator kits and detectors to expose hidden vampires. Unlock new locations, complete challenging levels, and defeat the Vampire Lord to save the citizens.

items.title: FireBlob
items.description: FireBlob is a Platform-Puzzle game in which you command a small fireball in order to reach and ignite a wood fire; use the ball heat abilities to melt the ice or use some level objects to help her to complete his task. Inspired in some NES style games the game has a colorful graphics style and retro-like sounds and calm music in order to be a relaxing experience, although some skill is needed to complete the game goal. The game has 28 levels and a new twist every certain amount of levels.

items.title: FireBlob Winter
items.description: This is a winter edition and sequel ofFireBlob, now with 80 levels, a final boss battle, and enhanced graphics.

items.title: First Colony
items.description: First Colony is an idlesimulation gamewhere you'll be in charge of the inaugural human settlement on Mars. Construct essential structures, gather valuable resources, and tactfully manage the well-being of your colonists. Your strategic choices hold the key to their survival. Prepare for an exhilarating journey beyond Earth's bounds!

items.title: Fish Merge - Under Water
items.description: Fish Merge - Under Water is a soothing puzzle adventure where you combine colorful fish to create surprising new forms and boost your score. Relax with calming ocean effects and tranquil visuals while planning smart merges for maximum rewards. Blending strategy and charm, it’s an addictive underwater experience perfect for casual players of all ages.

items.title: Fish Orbit
items.description: Fish Orbit is a casual fishing game where you cast your hook into the depths of the ocean and even beyond! Explore the underwater world and its legendary fish to unlock a variety of unique characters. Your goal is to become the most excellent fisher on the planet. Get ready for surprises in every layer of the deep, as they get bigger and bigger.

items.title: Fisherman Life
items.description: Fisherman life is a casual fishing simulation game. Explore the waters for various fish species and sell them to expand your island paradise!

items.title: Fishing.io
items.description: Fishing.io is a fun fishing game in which you collect as many fish as possible at the deepest of the sea.

items.title: Fishland
items.description: Fishland is a casual simulation game where you will play as a fisherman who must catch fish and sell them to earn money. Upgrade your boat, fishing equipment, and your fishing skills to catch bigger and more valuable fish. But be careful not to overfish, or you could deplete the ocean's resources. Can you become the top fisherman?

items.title: Fitness Club 3D
items.description: Fitness Club 3D is a casual game where you plunge into the world of fitness and make every workout count as you strive to build an empire. Help your clients achieve their dream bodies and fitness aspirations while transforming your studio into the ultimate gym. Jump into the aerobics class, making a splash to rake in the cash. Pay close attention to your clients' forms, ensuring proper training techniques. Upgrade your gym with top-notch equipment, add a pool, and even a steam room to attract more customers and watch the money flow in. With realistic workout simulations, captivating aqua environments, and engaging mechanics, Fitness Club 3D promises an immersive fitness experience!

items.title: Fix The Hoof
items.description: Fix The Hoof is a relaxing simulation game where you step into the role of a hoof specialist, cleaning and restoring the hooves of animals like horses, cows, and goats. Experience the most satisfying ASMR moments as you clean, polish, and paint hooves in this immersive 3D game. Collect money from your services to upgrade your farm and buy new animals to care for. Whether you're a fan of ASMR videos or simply seeking a stress-relieving activity, Fix The Hoof offers a therapeutic and enjoyable experience, letting you indulge in the oddly satisfying art of hoof care!

items.title: Flag Defender!
items.description: Flag Defender! is a defense game that puts you in charge of protecting the flag against relentless enemy invasions. Utilize your unique skills and deploy helpful allies to fend off waves of increasingly powerful foes. After each victorious wave, enhance your skills through upgrades to prepare yourself for the upcoming challenges. Get ready to defend the flag and prove your strategic prowess!

items.title: Flames & Fortune
items.description: Flames & Fortune is a collectible card game inspired by Card Crawl. Play as a knight wielding powerful fire spells to conquer dungeons. Strategically clear all cards to escape each level, collecting gold and using your deck to overcome challenges and adversaries. Engage in tactical gameplay as you navigate through treacherous dungeons, ensuring your survival and victory.

items.title: Flappy Dunk
items.description: Flappy Dunk is a casual basketball game where you tap to propel the ball through hoops, earning points and unlocking new balls along the way. The game seamlessly blends simple one-touch controls with a challenging gameplay that's easy to grasp but hard to master. Perfect for basketball enthusiasts of all ages, Flappy Dunk keeps the excitement alive with its unique theme and a continuous stream of fresh challenges as you progress.

items.title: Fleet Battle
items.description: Fleet Battle is a dynamic naval combat game that brings the classic Sea Battle to life with a modern twist. Challenge the computer, random opponents, or your friends as you rise through the ranks from Seaman Recruit to Admiral. Prove your strategic prowess and dominate the seas in this fast-paced, exciting game.

items.title: Flipper Dunk 3D
items.description: Flipper Dunk 3D is a challenging single-tap pinball-basketball game. You'll need the patience of a monk and the precision of a master to dunk. See if you have what it takes to be a master dunker. The game is simple to learn but difficult to master, but it will be highly satisfying when you finally dunk that ball! Check outTap Tap Shotsfor a similar game.

items.title: Flying Road
items.description: Flying Road is a thrilling driving challenge where you draw the road to deliver packages without losing any. With simple controls, impressive graphics, and hundreds of unique levels, your mission is to navigate through increasingly difficult obstacles. Stay focused, think fast, and enjoy the satisfaction of completing each delivery perfectly.

items.title: Food Truck Chef™: A Fun Cooking Game
items.description: Food Truck Chef is a thrilling casual food game where you travel the globe, cooking iconic dishes from tacos to sushi. Manage your time, upgrade your kitchen, and serve customers to build your food truck empire. With hundreds of levels and vibrant locations, you’ll face exciting challenges that test your skills as a master chef!

items.title: Food Tycoon FRVR
items.description: Become a good server and serve delicious foods and drinks to the customers.

items.title: Foot Chinko: Russia 2018
items.description: Foot Chinko: Russia 2018 is the virtual version of the family favorite soccer game – Foot Chinko! This is the 2018 world cup version and you get to play with your favorite nations. If you have never played foot chinko before, firstly where have you been! Secondly you are in for a treat!

items.title: Forest Dump
items.description: Forest Dump is a casual roguelike game that takes you on a unique adventure through a quirky and polluted woodland. As a clever and resourceful fox, your mission is to clean up your corrupted forest home by flipping cards to uncover mysteries, face off against trash monsters, and collect powerful weapons to aid in your journey. Combining card-flipping mechanics with deckbuilding elements, this game offers a strategic adventure full of surprises. Will you be able to clean up the pollution and restore the forest to its former glory? Jump into Forest Dump and find out!

items.title: Fork N Sausage
items.description: Fork N Sausage is a casual food game where you navigate a jumpy little sausage through a series of wacky obstacles to reach its final destination - a fork. This game offers the perfect amount of quirk to keep you curious about what new obstacle you will meet or what household item will help get you to the end of each level.

items.title: Fruit Balls: Juicy Fusion
items.description: Fruit Balls: Juicy Fusion is a casual game where you connect identical fruits and veggies to form larger, tastier combinations, aiming for the ultimate watermelon. Perfect for unwinding, this game helps you relax while slightly training your attention and thinking. Click on the field, merge fruits and veggies, and enjoy creating ever-bigger combinations. Earn money to unlock a new set of skins, including adorable animals, and enhance your delightful adventure!

items.title: Fruit Cube Blast
items.description: Fruit Cube Blast is a casual game that involves matching and exploding colorful blocks to solve puzzles. You simply need to match the colored fruit blocks and create bigger matches to make power-ups that can help them clear the screen. You can unlock insane gifts, defeat weird-looking worm enemies, and meet friendly characters on your adventure!

items.title: Fruit Masters Online
items.description: Fruit Masters Online is a casual merge game that offers an engaging and colorful experience, combining the fun of merging mechanics with the excitement of online multiplayer gameplay. Whether you enjoy playing solo or competing against others, this game delivers a juicy, fruit-filled adventure that will keep you entertained!

items.title: Fruit Merge: Juicy Drop Game
items.description: Fruit Merge: Juicy Drop Game is a vibrant fruit-matching puzzle that challenges your strategic skills. Combine identical fruits to create larger ones, but beware—space is limited! With every merge, unlock exciting new fruits and keep the container from overflowing. Test your wit and enjoy a colorful journey of clever moves and thrilling transformations!

items.title: Fruit Party
items.description: Fruit Party is the ultimate basket-dropping challenge! Merge and grow your fruits by dropping them into a basket, combining identical ones to create bigger, juicier fruits, and earning high scores. Every successful merge grants coins for upgrades, but be careful, if your basket overflows, it’s game over! Use power-ups like free upgrades and basket shakes to keep the game going. Grow your fruit empire and reach a high score!

items.title: Fruit Stab Challenge
items.description: Fruit Stab Challenge is an ultimate knife-throwing game where you must prove your accuracy skills. Precision is key as you stab the fruits. Complete levels by hitting each fruit the required number of times, showcasing your quickness and precision. Unlock special knives to enhance your performance and climb the leaderboard. Brace yourself for a frenzy of fruity mayhem and see how far you can go in conquering levels. Get ready to unleash your inner fruit-stabbing champion and let the chaos unfold!

items.title: Fun Colors
items.description: Fun Colors is a creative art game that brings your ideas to life. Dive into various coloring categories and draw freely. With endless color choices and diverse brushes, you can even import personal images. Ease strain with the night mode interface. Print your masterpiece directly from the game. Features include custom uploads, diverse categories, drawing mode, saving, adjustable brushes, zoom, undo, and a calming night theme.

items.title: Funny Animal Cafe
items.description: Funny Animal Cafe is a simulation game where you'll run a small cafe and strive for success. You'll begin with a modest cafe that you can personalize with your own decoration and furnishings. From menus to pricing, kitchen upgrades to interior design, attract more customers and manage your business to meet their needs. Boost productivity and service quality by hiring new employees. Every day, your cafe will welcome new animals eager to sample your cuisine. Quickly and efficiently serve them to ensure their satisfaction and encourage repeat visits. Keep track of new visitors on your profile. Will you rise to the top as the best cafe owner and win over the hearts of your customers? Dive into the game and find out!

items.title: Funny Cooking Camp
items.description: Funny Cooking Camp is a cute and funny arcade game to prepare foods in the mice camp. Help the mice build their own clay oven, prepare the grill, and collect all the items they needed. Make some delicious pizza with various toppings and grill the BBQ satay to enjoy the picnic!

items.title: Funny Food Duel
items.description: Funny Food Duel is an entertaining game in which the two pets will face each other in a fight to catch food. Choose the pets and pick up the food coming from the cloche plate faster than the rival, but avoid frozen or rotted food. Unlock more characters every time you win the duel.

items.title: Gadget Universe
items.description: Gadget Universe is an immersive simulation game where you step into the role of a visionary tech mogul. Make strategic business decisions, design the perfect store layout, and keep customers returning for the latest and greatest electronics. As your reputation grows, upgrade and expand your store, unlocking new opportunities to increase profits and outshine the competition. With each move, your goal is clear: dominate the market and build a tech empire in this dynamic and engaging business simulation experience.

items.title: Garden Tile
items.description: Garden Tile is a casual game where you play as a new gardener who is trying to enlarge your garden. By playing the tile scenes and completing them, you will gain the resources that your garden needs. Grow more plants and sell them to the customers. Get money and buy new tools and items for your garden!

items.title: Geometry Dash Meltdown
items.description: Geometry Dash Meltdown is a casual, fast-paced cube racing game where your objective is to avoid all obstacles along your path as you side-scroll your way to victory. This one-click game packs an adrenaline punch from graphics to speed to music. Yet another episode of the fast-paced cube racing game in the Geometry Dash series!

items.title: Geometry Game
items.description: Geometry Dash Online is a free side-scrollingplatformerplayed in sync withmusical rhythms. Groove your way over and under obstacles to keep the musical momentum alive. If you slip up, it’s back to the beginning!

items.title: Geometry Dash Subzero
items.description: Geometry Dash Subzero is a side-scrolling avoid game, another excellent title from theGeometry Dashseries. Your task is to take control of your small yet speedy geometric cube and try to make your way through a series of (significantly) challenging levels!

items.title: Getting Over It
items.description: Getting Over It is a challenging casual arcade climbing game that puts your patience—and skill—to the ultimate test. Armed with only a hammer, you’ll tackle a steep, obstacle-laden mountain, relying on precise physics to swing, push, and propel yourself upward. Every inch you gain will make you sweat but will be well worth it, and one small mistake can send you tumbling back to the start.

items.title: Giant Rush Arena
items.description: Giant Rush Arena is a fun casual game where you can be a giant and destroy the city and your enemies. Become bigger as you destroy things such as houses, public buildings, transport, and even people. Don't let the other giants become bigger than you or they will become a serious threat to you. Win the game by being the last giant in the arena!

items.title: Giant Sushi
items.description: Giant Sushi is a relaxing puzzle game where your goal is to merge sushi pieces. Challenge yourself to combine sushi and climb the ranks to become a sushi master. Enjoy the delightful and engaging gameplay as you strategize and merge your way to victory.

items.title: Ginormo Sword
items.description: Ginormo Sword is an arcade game to fight the monsters to get enough gold and make your sword as big as it can be.

items.title: Girlfriend from Hell
items.description: Girlfriend From Hell is a 2D arcade puzzle game where you help Miya unleash her fury on Haruto after a heartbreaking rejection. Set up traps using various objects, like toy balls or a sawed-through chair, to make Haruto's life miserable. Your goal is to creatively sabotage his every move in this chaotic revenge quest.

items.title: Glitch
items.description: Glitch is a 2D platformer game where you must solve challenging puzzles to overcome the glitching platform and reach the finish door. Get ready for a gaming experience like no other, whether you’re a fan of puzzles, action, or platformers. Start your adventure!

items.title: Global City
items.description: Global City is a city-building simulator casual game with intricate graphics and innovative designs. You're the town's mayor and have been mandated to manage resource production, complete quests for rewards, and interact with enthusiastic residents to make this town as thriving as possible.

items.title: Glove Power
items.description: Glove Power is acasual gamewhere you run through an obstacle course collecting gems and dodging obstacles. Use as many powers as possible and reach the end to receive a bonus!

items.title: Glowit - Two Players
items.description: Glowit – Two Players is an awesome and challenging game for you and a friend. You can play together and compete against each other in over 10 different fun mini-games.

items.title: Go Escape
items.description: Go Escape is a fast-paced one-button arcade game where reflexes and timing are your best allies. Control a rolling ball and guide it through a maze of spikes, moving platforms, and deadly traps. One wrong move, and it's game over! Your goal is to escape each level by jumping at just the right moment and avoiding everything that can destroy you. The game starts off simple but quickly becomes a real test of precision and skill.

items.title: Gods Playing Field
items.description: God's Playing Field is a point and click game that' played exactly as it sounds. You're a god that's probably bored of your day job, and now it's time to destroy everything! You'll have different tools available to you as you destroy more things, so there's only one way to play this - destroy anything that moves.

items.title: Gold Digger FRVR
items.description: Gold Digger FRVR is 2D mining game from the FRVR developers. In the game, you must dig underground and attempt to find hidden gems and precious metals.

items.title: Gold Miner: Special Edition
items.description: Gold Miner Special Edition is a mining game where you must get the gold to achieve your goal. You can also buy things to make your mining easier.

items.title: Gold Rush
items.description: Gold Rush is a simulation game where you must find gem nuggets that are hidden in the sand. Vacuum the sand fields, separate the gems from the sand, and sell the gems to earn money. Make new upgrades for your vehicle to improve your vacuuming power, capacity, and moving speed. Evolve your vehicle to become bigger! Explore many islands to get all the gems and build your own Gold Empire!

items.title: Golf Quest
items.description: Golf Quest is a 2D top-down golf game where you must reach the hole by avoiding obstacles on your way. The game has 25 unique levels with growing difficulty and also a Speedrun mode to challenge yourself to finish the tracks in the smallest amount of time.

items.title: Good Doggo
items.description: Good Doggo is a fun game that is perfect for animal lovers and those who own a cute dog! Every dog deserves treats if they are well behaved and our cute doggo is no exception! You must help our dog balance treats on his nose – try to balance as many as possible in the given time-frame. Once you have balanced as many as possible, the dog will then throw the treats and attempt to catch them all in his mouth.

items.title: Google Feud
items.description: Google Feud is a casual game where you must guess part of a Google query. There are 10 answers for each question, presented in a quiz format similar to Family Feud. Like the hit quiz show, you have 3 guesses, so use them wisely!

items.title: Grab and Run
items.description: Grab and Run is a funny casual game where you must grab the most expensive things and carry them to the truck. Your time is limited, so choose what to take wisely. Use boosts and traps to slow down your opponents. Earn money to customize your hero.

items.title: Grab Them All
items.description: Grab Them All is your ticket to thrilling fun as you take down robbers by putting them in the trap! Explore diverse traps on each level and get rid of all the robbers. It is suitable for all ages! Get ready for a blast of excitement and endless entertainment!

items.title: Graffiti Time
items.description: Graffiti Time is a platform game where Mr. Fat Cap travels the universe to paint graffiti. Sneak through the streets and make art under the cover of night. Avoid robots who are trying to catch you and make the streets look beautiful again. Ride the mini cruiser skateboard and perform kickflips for extra money.

items.title: Grass Land
items.description: Grass Land is a vibrant exploration game that drops you into a sprawling world of thick greenery and hidden surprises. Take control of your grass cutter, uncover valuable resources beneath the overgrowth, and build up your base as you roam the fields. Stay sharp, move fast, and make the most of every patch of grass you find.

items.title: Gravity Crowd
items.description: Gravity Crowd is a thrilling platformer where you guide a stickman that transforms into a growing crowd. Flip gravity with a tap to dodge tricky obstacles, navigate challenging paths, and strategically pass through gates. Every decision shapes the size of your crowd, keeping you on your toes in this fast-paced, dynamic adventure!

items.title: Grow Home
items.description: Grow Home is a relaxing gardening simulator where you nurture plants from seed to harvest. Choose from limited seed types, plant them in empty plots, and care for them with water, fertilizer, and grow lights. Earn coins from healthy harvests to unlock new seeds and tools, removing wilted plants as you build your perfect garden.

items.title: Guess Their Answer
items.description: Guess Their Answer is a casual quiz game where your goal is to outsmart opponents by predicting the most popular answers. Tackle three head-scratching questions per round across diverse topics, earn rewards, and unlock unique skins to personalize your experience. With daily quizzes and competitive matches, every game is a chance to prove you know your trivia.

items.title: Gumball Drop
items.description: Gumball Drop is a 3D casual game that will have you hooked from the very first drop! Take control of a delightful gumball as it rolls forward on an exciting adventure through a whimsical world filled with colorful balls, tubes, and endless fun. Your objective is simple: collect as many balls as possible along the way and create the most impressive gumball chain imaginable!

items.title: Gun Strike Runner
items.description: Gun Strike Runner is an action-packed game that blends fast-paced shooting with weapon evolution. Dash through levels, eliminate obstacles, and take down enemies using a growing arsenal of guns. Merge gun pieces to enhance your firepower, allowing you to tackle increasingly difficult challenges. Test your aim and reflexes in this nonstop shooting adventure.

items.title: Hack and Climb
