items.description: Hack and Climb is a physics-based skill game where you’ll throw, chop, and climb your way to the top! Explore stunning, untamed landscapes as you unlock new weapons and master your movement. Wield your axe with precision, overcome challenging obstacles, and push your climbing skills to the limit. Master the axe and conquer the climb!

items.title: Hammer Master－Craft & Destroy!
items.description: Hammer Master－Craft & Destroy! is a casual game where you plunge into a world of adventure and destruction. Smash everything in your path to earn coins and collect crystals to craft new solar hammers for even more effective demolition. Become the ultimate hammer master!

items.title: Hammer Worker
items.description: Hammer Worker is an arcade game where you must break the rocks to find the money, diamonds, and power-ups! Upgrade your hammer with the money you earn and smash more rocks with an awesome powerful hammer. Break all the stones to relieve your stress. Earn more as you get stronger. You may not want to let go of this game. We wish you pleasant and relaxing games.

items.title: Hand Over Hand
items.description: Hand Over Hand is a casual climbing game featuring amusing ragdoll mechanics. Your goal is straightforward: reach the red flag to progress through each level. Collect stars along the way to unlock a variety of clothing and grooming items from the shop, adding a fun customization element to your climbing adventure!

items.title: Happy Burger
items.description: Happy Burger is a lighthearted simulation where you join a quirky new company and master the art of burger-making. Step into the kitchen, work with your team, and turn simple ingredients into tasty creations. With each order, you’ll discover that flipping patties and serving customers can be unexpectedly fun and full of charm.

items.title: Doggy Tricks
items.description: Doggy Tricks is a mischievous casual game where you step into the paws of a naughty dog adopted from a shelter. Each level offers a new chaotic adventure as you explore the house, set clever traps, and unleash pranks to keep your unsuspecting owner on his toes. Your mission: stir up as much mayhem as possible and enjoy the priceless reactions of your frustrated yet lovable owner. Are you ready to cause some mayhem?

items.title: Happy Town
items.description: Happy Town invites you to step into the role of mayor and create a bustling, joyful city through the magic of merging! Combine items to unlock new objects, upgrade buildings, and fulfill tasks for residents as you expand your city and make everyone happy. With a bright visual style, an upbeat soundtrack, and lively citizens to meet, Happy Town offers a cheerful, engaging gameplay experience.

items.title: Happy Wheels
items.description: Happy Wheels is a side-scrolling ragdoll physics game. Navigate through the levels using one of several unique characters without being torn limb from limb. Sound easy? Think again. Happy Wheels was one of the earliest browser games to utilize wacky ragdoll physics as a key element of the game.

items.title: HappyVille Merge Farm
items.description: HappyVille Merge Farm is a cozy casual game where you grow a magical village by hiring masters, producing items, and merging them into advanced creations. Fulfill orders to earn coins and unlock new upgrades for your peaceful kingdom. With gentle pacing and satisfying progress, it's the perfect escape for building, merging, and creating your dream village at your own rhythm.

items.title: Hardware Tycoon
items.description: Hardware Tycoon is a cool management game that takes inspiration fromthe extensive genre of tycoon games. In this particular tycoon game, you are the owner of a company that creates computer processors. You must manage your business and your product line and try to create a diverse portfolio. Before you start you can choose your company name and the difficulty level

items.title: Haru Pandas Slide
items.description: Haru Pandas Slide is a casual game sliding featuring a plethora of adorable pandas. Show off your prowess in puzzle-solving and gather all the different panda varieties. Utilize special skills and power-ups strategically to simplify challenges. Can you encounter and collect every single panda? Embark on this delightful journey and discover the answer!

items.title: Harvest Kings
items.description: Harvest Kings is a farming game where you compete to collect the most crops. You’ll drive your tractor across crop-filled fields, collecting fruits, vegetables, grains, and more. Outpace your rivals in real-time as you harvest everything in sight. The more you gather, the bigger your haul becomes.

items.title: Haunted Heroes
items.description: Haunted Heroes is an arcade game where you take on the role of a ghost. Your objective is to haunt heroes and possess their bodies, utilizing their unique powers to dominate the race. With your supernatural abilities, you can influence the outcome and secure victory. Challenge yourself to strategize and outwit the heroes as you navigate through thrilling levels. Unleash your spectral prowess and become the ultimate haunted hero!

items.title: Healing Driver
items.description: Healing Driver is a hospital simulator where you must drive the ambulance, take the patients to the hospital, and be their doctor. Place patients on the bed and give them care based on their symptoms. Get money after the patient is healed and use the money to upgrade your hospital, staff, and yourself.

items.title: Helix Jump
items.description: Helix Jump is a casual game with simple and addictively fun mechanics. In the game, you guide a bouncing ball continuously down a series of circular platforms until you crash. Fall through the cracks and avoid landing in the forbidden zones!

items.title: Helix Snake
items.description: Helix Snake is a captivating blend of spiral and snake gameplay, challenging you to guide your powered-up snake past obstacles within a twisting helix. Use boosts along the way to aid your journey, but aim carefully to hit the lowest numbers possible. Prepare for a tricky, skill-testing adventure!

items.title: Herobrine vs Monster School
items.description: Herobrine vs Monster School is an archery game where you play as Herobrine who finally gets angry at all of the students of the Monster School who behaved terribly. Therefore, Herobrine decided to destroy Monster School and everything connected with it with his crossbow, wooden arrows, and TNT! Shoot zombies, slugs, skeletons, and bosses!

items.title: Heroes of Tiny Kingdom
items.description: Heroes of Tiny Kingdom is a captivating idle simulation game that puts you in the shoes of a knight tasked with building a bustling settlement from scratch. With the guidance of a herald, you'll gather resources, create tools, and prepare for battle. As you progress through the game, you'll face increasingly complex challenges, from trimming sheep to crafting weapons. Earn coins and expand your island, building a castle, blacksmith, and storage facility. This game offers a peaceful yet engaging experience, perfect for unwinding after a long day.

items.title: Hexo Land
items.description: Hexo Land is a game where you create and expand your own island in the vast ocean. Use trade ships to acquire unique hexagon blocks, strategically growing and enhancing your island’s features. Every shipment brings new possibilities, challenging you to craft a thriving and beautifully designed paradise.

items.title: Hextris
items.description: Hextris is a challenging and intriguing puzzle game in which you must try and stack a series of different colored blocks in a hexagonal formation. To make the blocks disappear, you must match three together of the same color – once you have matched three together, they will disappear. Continue to match the shapes together to prevent them from stacking up and blocking the screen.

items.title: Hide N Seek
items.description: Hide N Seek is a fun 3D simulation game where you play the classic hide and seek game with your kids. Run around the house until you find them cheeky wee little ones!

items.title: HK Cafe
items.description: HK Cafe is a simple arcade game to cook and serve food to the customers. Be the fastest and organized cafe worker to make all the customers happy.

items.title: Home Builder 3D
items.description: Home Builder 3D is a strategic building simulator where you can demolish old structures and create new ones, like farms, pools, and parking lots. Master the art of resource management as you tackle various projects and sell your completed works for profit. Plan each move carefully to rise as the ultimate property tycoon.

items.title: Home Flip
items.description: Home Flip is a casual arcade game where you are too tired to walk but you need to get to your comfy bed. Leap and somersault through your house, dodging obstacles like tables, chairs, and lamps on your way to bed. Remember the golden rule: DON'T TOUCH THE FLOOR! Master the art of backflips with easy clicks/taps, and enjoy dozens of fun levels, addictive gameplay, and quirky ragdoll physics. Turn your home into a flipping playground!

items.title: Homesteads: Dream Farm
items.description: Homesteads: Dream Farm is a simulation game that puts you in charge of a growing frontier town. You’ll manage resources, meet colorful characters, and explore the untamed Wild West. As you build your homestead, forge friendships, and shape your community, every decision you make helps turn the frontier into a thriving settlement full of life.

items.title: Hook King Runner
items.description: Hook King Runner is a physics-based runner where you tap, swing, and time your jumps to master wild obstacle courses. Use ropes and hooks with precision to dodge traps, collect coins, and outmaneuver enemies. With ragdoll physics and varied levels, your agility and timing are the keys to conquering every thrilling challenge that awaits.

items.title: Horror Room: Scary Hotel Tycoon
items.description: Horror Room: Scary Hotel Tycoon is a simulation game where you manage a spine-chilling theme park. You’ll design terrifying rooms, hire creepy actors, and come up with creative ways to scare visitors. Keep your attractions running smoothly by cleaning, repairing, and maintaining equipment. Track guest feedback to make improvements and aim to become the top fright master in the business!

items.title: Hostage Negotiator
items.description: Hostage Negotiator is a casual quiz game where you step into the intense and high-stakes world of hostage negotiation. The fate of innocent lives rests in your hands as you navigate complex scenarios, make crucial decisions, and try to save everyone caught in a terrible situation.

items.title: House Flip
items.description: House Flip is a simulation game where you navigate property listings, buy houses, and turn them into profits. Host an open house to gauge buyer interest and needs. Dive into mini-games to take charge of cleaning, repairing, and upgrading the house. Make strategic choices and meet buyers' demands to satisfy them and raise house prices. Time is ticking, so make sure to renovate the house wisely! Get ready to enter the exciting world of House Flip!

items.title: HTML5 Lemmings
items.description: HTML5 Lemmings is the up to date version of this classic retro arcade game that so many people loved. Lemmings are cute and lovable animals that unfortunately have suicidal tendencies! You must help these adorable creatures avoid an early grave and direct them safely through each level - stop them from falling to their doom and create a safe path for them.

items.title: Hula Hoop Race
items.description: Hula Hoop Race offers an exhilarating challenge for Hula Hoop enthusiasts! Dodge obstacles and race to the finish line with as many Hoops as you can. The more Hoops you collect, the bigger the celebration! Rollerskate and collect Hula Hoops as your character in this action-packed adventure. Conquer difficult obstacles, complete exciting challenges, and make it to the epic party at the end of each level. Customize your experience with new characters, unique Hula Hoops, and rollers. Stand out from the crowd with your personalized character. Best of luck on your Hoop-filled journey!

items.title: Human Mech
items.description: Human Mech is a game where you reconstruct wrecked buildings by earning trophies in mech battles. Combine stickmen to design powerful mechs, upgrading stats to enhance strength and speed. Join battles, earn rewards, and conquer arenas to become an unstoppable force in your journey to rebuild and dominate.

items.title: Hungry Frog
items.description: Hungry Frog is a tongue-twisting 2D adventure where you play as a fearless frog snapping up flies with skill shots and clever tricks. Use your sticky tongue to ricochet hits, trigger TNT crates, move blocks, and unlock doors as you clear each stage. With dozens of levels plus a tougher New Game Plus mode, it’s a fun, fast-paced challenge for anyone ready to gobble their way to mastery.

items.title: Hungry Ocean:  Eat, Feed and Grow Fish
items.description: Hungry Ocean: Eat, Feed, and Grow Fish is an underwater IO casual game where you explore the ocean, encountering sea creatures of all sizes like sharks and jellyfish. The question is, which predator is a predator, and which is the prey? Your goal is to grow bigger and become a top predator but you can only do this by eating all the fish possible that are safe for you to eat. Save fish, collect bonuses, and improve your abilities as you evolve from a small fish to the ocean's king.

items.title: Hydraulic Press 2D ASMR
items.description: Hydraulic Press 2D ASMR is a casual game where you can destroy objects using your hydraulic press machine. This incredibly effective stress reliever lets you grind dozens of items. Earn coins while you crushing items and use the coins to buy new items. Try out your personal hydraulic press now and start smashing all sorts of objects. Let's crush and break!

items.title: HypeMaster
items.description: Hype Master is a dynamic social simulation where you star in a high-stakes reality TV show. Navigate gossip, form alliances, and tackle challenges to outshine rivals and win viewers' hearts. Manage relationships, use rumors wisely, and adapt to public perception to secure victory. Your choices shape multiple possible endings in this thrilling game.

items.title: Hyper Evolution
items.description: Hyper Evolution is a casual simulation game where you must gather resources, craft tools, take a rest, hunt, and eat so you can survive on the islands. Evolve yourself from a primitive to a modern human being. Do the best and see what you can become!

items.title: Ice Cream Cafe
items.description: Ice Cream Cafe is an ice cream cafe simulation game where you design, build, and manage your dream dessert haven. Craft endless frozen delights, experimenting with flavors, toppings, and cones to satisfy every craving. Navigate challenging levels, hone your culinary skills, and elevate your cafe with upgrades and rewards. With customizable design options, this sweet adventure promises a scoop-tacular journey for ice cream enthusiasts. Start scooping your way to success and create a buzz with your own Ice Cream Delight!

items.title: Ice Cream Fever: Cooking Game
items.description: Ice Cream Fever: Cooking Game is a casual simulation game in which you play as a restaurant owner. Serve customers with many variations of food and beverages. Decorate your restaurant to attract more customers. Upgrade kitchen items, cook fast, and try to serve your customers efficiently. Use boosters to get more benefits like no burn, easy preparation, and auto-serve to customers. Make customers happy and be the best chef!

items.title: Idle Airport Tycoon
items.description: Idle Airport Tycoon is a casual simulation game that puts you in charge of building and managing your very own bustling airport. Start with a humble airstrip and turn it into a world-class travel hub—move over Atlanta airport; we're looking to be the busiest airport in the world now! Upgrade everything from planes to terminals, unlock new revenue streams, and watch your profits soar! Are you ready to take on the challenge and become the ultimate airport tycoon?

items.title: Idle Bee: Swarm Simulator
items.description: Idle Bee: Swarm Simulator is a casual idle game, where you'll take charge of a vibrant bee colony and embark on an epic journey to dominate the hive kingdom! In this casual idle game, you'll dive deep into the exciting life of bees, managing your hive, recruiting worker bees, and training powerful warrior bees to protect your precious honey reserves.

items.title: Idle Bouncy Ball
items.description: Idle Bouncy Ball is a unique idle game where you can buy and merge balls to boost your income. Observe balls bouncing in 3D within a container by rotating and moving the camera for a dynamic view. Enhance earnings by adding pads. Experience high-energy gameplay as you watch balls move around in 3D, earning more by exploring various enclosures. Get ready for a thrilling idle gaming experience!

items.title: Idle Cannon
items.description: Idle Cannon is an incremental idle game that mixes strategic upgrades with brick-busting action for nonstop fun. Watch your cannons fire automatically as you invest smartly in power boosts, speed, and new abilities to push further. Whether you’re a casual player or chasing the perfect setup, this game delivers addictive progression with every upgrade and explosion.

items.title: Idle Cinema Tycoon
items.description: Idle Cinema Tycoon is a casual business simulation game where you are in charge of your very own movie theater with the aim of slowly managing an empire of theaters. Purchase cinema halls, schedule screenings, and upgrade interiors to boost profits. Curate and collect films of various genres, liaise with guests in VIP rooms, and squeeze out as much profit as you can from ticket sales and more. Strategically expand your theater and complete missions to unlock valuable rewards!

items.title: Craft Drill
items.description: Craft Drill is a casual arcade game where you command a powerful drill to uncover coal, iron, gold, and diamonds. Upgrade your drill and switch between specialized tools like shovels and pickaxes to maximize your haul. Strategize your resource extraction and adapt to extract hidden treasures efficiently as you delve deeper into the rich underground.

items.title: Idle Dino Farm Tycoon 3D
items.description: Idle Dino Farm Tycoon 3D is a casual tycoon game where you helm a prehistoric spectacle, nurturing dinosaurs from hatchlings to colossal wonders. As the park's new manager, your goal is to expand, enthrall visitors, and unveil unique hybrid dinosaurs. Construct habitats, amass funds from intrigued spectators, and elevate your park's status. With each decision, you shape the ultimate Jurassic World experience, featuring awe-inspiring reptiles that capture the imagination of all who visit!

items.title: Idle Fishing
items.description: Idle Fishing is a casual game where you command your boat, reel in fish, and rack up coins even when you're away. Upgrade your boat's speed, capacity, and more. Discover new fishing spots, construct facilities, and personalize your boat's appearance for endless fun on the waves!

items.title: Idle Hypermart Empire
items.description: Idle Hypermart Empire is an idlesimulation gamewhere your workers start producing goods to sell. You can transport the profits to the cash counter office using the elevator and finally to your account. Use the earnings to upgrade your Hypermart, elevator, and warehouse. Automate tasks by hiring managers at each facility to save time and boost your earnings.

items.title: My Makeup Store
items.description: My Makeup Store is a management game to run a store. Restock, make sales, clean your store, and help your customers to choose the best makeup for them! Expand your store and add new products. Buy new shelves and add mirrors for your customers. Get some cash and create the biggest makeup store in town!

items.title: Idle Medieval Tower Defense
items.description: Idle Medieval Tower Defense is a casual strategy game where you defend, upgrade, and survive the Onslaught! Step into a world of knights, magic, and endless waves of enemies — the ultimate blend of tower defense strategy and idle progression! Are you ready to stand tall against the darkness and craft your ultimate medieval defense?

items.title: Idle Mining Empire
items.description: Idle Mining Empire puts you at the helm of a mining business. Start from scratch and work up to running a fully automated mining empire that generates huge profits!

items.title: Idle Noob Lumberjack
items.description: Idle Noob Lumberjack is an arcade game where you can collect and sell resources, build houses, and discover new lands. The more land you discover, the more resources you can collect. Hire small minions who can help you to collect resources while you are resting.

items.title: Idle Planet: Gym Tycoon
items.description: Idle Planet: Gym Tycoon is a vibrant simulation game where you build a fitness empire on a small planet. Begin with a modest gym and expand by adding and upgrading equipment to attract more visitors. Manage dozens of exercise machines and accessories, from treadmills to weights, to meet your customers' needs and grow your network.

items.title: Idle Restaurant Tycoon
items.description: Idle Restaurant Tycoon is an exciting idle game where you can open and become the owner of your own restaurant! Be an effective manager and turn your establishment into the best restaurant in the city! Develop your restaurant and attract more visitors. Earn money and reinvest it in your establishment by buying new furniture and decorations, hiring new employees, and opening additional sectors and rooms. Unlock new dishes, upgrade your kitchen, and earn even more money! Buy new parking spaces so more customers can park their cars and bring you more money. Open an outdoor terrace to earn more stars for your establishment, or open a family room to attract entire families.

items.title: Idle Sand Castle
items.description: Idle Sand Castle is a casual clicker game where you have to mine to collect coins, hire miners to earn passive income, build beautiful sandcastles to attract lots of tourists, and hire securities to protect the sandcastles from bad guys! Collect money from your business and become rich!

items.title: Idle Startup Tycoon
items.description: Idle Startup Tycoon is an idle simulation game to grow your startup corporate.

items.title: Idle Supermarket Tycoon
items.description: Idle Supermarket Tycoon is a casual clicker game where you manage a shopping mall, developing it by acquiring new shops and enhancing both the exterior and interior. Serve customers to earn money and reputation, then reinvest your profits to expand the mall. Assign priority customers to maximize profits and purchase delivery vehicles for additional income. Monitor the corridors for maintenance needs and complete missions for valuable rewards. Build your grand supermarket empire!

items.title: Idle Train Empire Tycoon
items.description: Idle Train Empire Tycoon is a casual strategic simulation game where you manage and grow your railway station. Hoorah! You get to manage an entire railway station on your own. There is a bit of training at the beginning of the game, but you are mostly learning on the job.

items.title: Idle Zoo
items.description: Idle Zoo Tycoon provides an entertaining blend of zoo management, animal collection, and idle gameplay. Build, upgrade, and attract visitors to create the ultimate animal park. Whether you're a fan of idle games or simulation, Idle Zoo Tycoon offers a captivating experience in the world of zoo management.

items.title: Zoo Builder
items.description: Zoo Builder is a simulation game where you design, build, and expand your very own zoo. Choose animals, create enclosures, and customize every aspect to attract more visitors and boost your profits. Upgrade your zoo manager to speed up development and enhance your zoo’s operations. Can you build the most impressive zoo and maximize your earnings?

items.title: Infinite Asteroids
items.description: Infinite Asteroids is a thrilling fusion of classic arcade action and roguelike elements. Dive into intense space battles, customizing your ship with 22 distinct weapons, 12 powerful secondary abilities, and 8 unique ship types. Adapt to procedurally generated challenges as you test your reflexes and strategy in a dynamic galaxy filled with endless possibilities for adventure.

items.title: The Ink Studio
items.description: The Ink Studio is a creative and relaxing simulation that transforms you into a master tattoo artist. Each session challenges you to bring your customers' unique stories and designs to life with precision and care. Dive into the intricate world of tattooing, where your artistic skills and attention to detail truly shine.

items.title: Interior Designer: Unpacking House
items.description: Interior Designer: Unpacking House is a delightful and relaxing casual game that allows you to explore your creativity through interior design. Whether you’re tackling specific challenges or letting your imagination run wild, this game offers an immersive experience where you can design beautiful spaces and create captivating aesthetics.

items.title: Island Builder
items.description: Island Builder is a building game that offers both relaxing and fun gameplay that challenges you to strategically place various buildings to get maximum points. Use your logic to achieve objectives to progress through levels successfully. This game is ideal for you to enjoy in your free time. Explore new islands, and aim for a high score!

items.title: Brainrot Merge
items.description: Italian Brainrot Merge is a chaotic merge challenge where viral internet creatures collide in fast-paced puzzle mayhem. Stack and match meme-inspired animals like Tralalero Tralala and Capuccino Assasino to evolve new forms before the board fills up. With bright visuals, hilarious animations, and brainrot humor, it’s a quirky test of your merging reflexes.

items.title: Jailbreak: Hide or Attack!
items.description: Jailbreak: Hide or Shoot! is a casual escape game that combines the intensity of a shooter, the strategy of hide and seek, and mind-bending puzzles. Dive into a world of prison romance and challenge your wits and reflexes across numerous unique levels. With straightforward controls, this game offers addictive gameplay to help you unwind. Are you tough enough to make a prison break? Find out now!

items.title: Jamjam
items.description: Jamjam is a precision-based platformer where you control a bouncy jelly character, leaping through tricky levels filled with obstacles. Carefully aim each jump, collect coins and stars, and take on challenging boss stages. Unlock fun cosmetic upgrades to customize your jelly hero and test your skills in a game that blends strategy, timing, and creativity.

items.title: Jelly Bear's Farm
items.description: Jelly Bear's Farm is a simulator game where you help Jelly Bear manage a fun and bustling farm. Assist him in taking care of cute rabbits that lay chocolate eggs, complete various tasks, and upgrade the farm. Compete with friends to become the richest and most hardworking farmer. Can you complete all the tasks and upgrade the factory to its maximum potential?

items.title: Jelly Restaurant
items.description: Jelly Restaurant combines simple casual arcade gameplay with a restaurant management game. Enjoy the satisfactory jelly movement. Fit the bottom color of the jelly with the surface color to make the jelly grow bigger. Pay attention to any obstacles and sharp knives. The bigger jelly you get, the more jellies you can produce. Manage your restaurant by hiring helpers, expanding your restaurant, and serving colorful jellies to your customers. Have a great business!

items.title: Jelly Snake
items.description: Jelly Snake is a unique snake game where only 1% of the super hand can go above level 100! From cute & simple levels to very difficult levels that developers have retried hundreds of times! Collect all the candies with Jelly Snakes that rotate left and right each time you touch them. Be careful not to hit wall, obstacles, and even monsters! You can reach higher levels only with your skills. Exchange the candies for cute snake decorations. Earn new jelly snakes with coins which you gain every time you clear a stage. Make the longest jelly snake in the world in challenge mode that will unlock at level 10. Win medals in challenge mode and get special exclusive Jelly Snakes. Try out various bizarre stages with brilliant ideas!

items.title: Jet Rush
items.description: Jet Rush is an awesome platform game with superb arcade-style gameplay. You control a high-tech jet plane and you must pilot it through a series of challenging courses and obstacles. The controls to drive your jet are straightforward. The gameplay, however, is anything but simple! The speed of your plane is fast and you must work hard to avoid the obstacles and conquer each level.

items.title: Jetpack Joyride
items.description: Jetpack Joyride is a fast-paced endless runner where you join Barry Steakfries in an action-packed adventure through a high-tech lab. Dodge lasers, ride wild vehicles, and equip jetpacks to outsmart scientists. Customize your character, complete daring missions, and collect coins while navigating thrilling challenges. It’s a high-flying quest filled with gadgets, power-ups, and nonstop excitement.

items.title: Jetpack Jump
items.description: Jetpack Jump is a fun and simple casual jumping game that lets you perform Olympic-style jumps with a little help from a jet pack strapped onto your back. Your aim is to jump as many meters as possible, constantly beating your best score. Your athlete will be rewarded generously in coins, which will help you upgrade and fly to even greater heights.

items.title: Johnny n Tommy - Prank Masters
items.description: Johnny n Tommy - Prank Masters is a casual game where you step into the wild and wacky world of Johnny and Tommy, the ultimate prankster duo! Get ready for laugh-out-loud moments as you set up sneaky tricks, hilarious traps, and epic sibling battles! Are you ready to become the ultimate Prank Master? Start plotting, tricking, and laughing now in Johnny n Tommy - Prank Masters!

items.title: Jump Guys
items.description: Jump Guys is a casual 3D multiplayer platformer where you navigate vibrant obstacle courses filled with traps, power-ups, and collectibles. Jump, climb, and race to the finish while dodging hazards. Activate power-ups for temporary boosts and collect coins to customize your character. Conquer increasingly difficult worlds with thrilling physics-defying stunts. Only one way forward: only up!

items.title: Jump Into The Plane
items.description: Jump Into The Plane is a casual game that lets you perform mind-blowing stunts as you jump from a car into a plane, channeling your inner super agent. Who needs conventional parking when you can drive straight into a cargo hold? Brace yourself for an insanely fun experience that defies logic. With a wide array of cars, planes, and thrilling locations, prepare for heart-pounding excitement. But remember, timing is everything. Don't miss your chance to catch that plane!

items.title: Jumping Clones
items.description: Jumping Clones is an arcade platform game where you control more than one character at the same time. Use your logic to make them reach the exit.

items.title: Junkyard Sim
items.description: Junkyard Sim is a hands-on simulator where you develop a junkyard using powerful machinery. Drive garbage trucks, operate shredders, and smashers to transform the junkyard. Each job brings new challenges and excitement as you expand and upgrade your equipment. Dive into the world of heavy machinery and junkyard management!

items.title: Kick Loser
items.description: Kick Loser is a creative ragdoll puzzle game where your goal is simple: cause maximum chaos to the stickman hero using clever strategy and a mix of wild objects. Drag, aim, and launch with precision as you bounce him through hilarious, unpredictable impacts. With physics-based fun and endless ways to experiment, every level is a new opportunity for destruction.

items.title: Kick the Noobik 3D
items.description: Kick the Noobik 3D is a casual game where you unleash your creativity by smashing, slicing, blowing up, and incinerating a character named Noobik. Use an endless arsenal, from rockets and swords to machine guns and torture devices. With vibrant Minecraft-inspired visuals, a realistic physics engine, and dynamic sound effects, relieve your stress in style!

items.title: King of Thieves
items.description: King of Thieves is a casual platform game where the objective is to navigate through levels, avoiding spikes and enemies, in order to reach the treasure chest. The game emphasizes stealth and careful movement to succeed.

items.title: King Survivors
items.description: King Survivors is a roguelike game where you, as the valiant king, must form a skilled team of heroes to battle fearsome enemies. In this epic adventure, lead your heroes strategically and make critical decisions to save the kingdom. Hire powerful wizards, skilled hunters, and fearless knights with unique abilities. Control the King as heroes follow like a snake, avoiding collisions with enemies. The more kills, the more heroes join your ranks, ensuring a thrilling and action-packed experience!

items.title: Kingdom Rush
items.description: Kingdom Rush is a superb castle defense game and one of the most popular and challenging available! This title features weird and wonderful enemies such as orcs, trolls, wizards and monster – each enemy is highly detailed and has a cool animation. You own realm is defended by warriors and mages – these mighty combatants defend your castle and city from their mighty towers.

items.title: Kingmaker Academy: Warrior's Duels
items.description: Kingmaker Academy: Warrior's Duels is a card battle game where you must use your strategy to beat your opponent. Strategize and outsmart your opponents as you compete against talented rivals in the school's prestigious tournament. Hone your skills with each duel and aim to become the ultimate warrior and ruler of the academy. Can you rise to the top and claim victory?

items.title: Kings and Queens Solitaire TriPeaks
items.description: Kings and Queens Solitaire TriPeaks is a casual puzzle solitaire game whose objective is to stack all cards on the game table in sequence. This game is ideal for card players, especially solitaire fans, as it is intuitive to pick up quickly with similar solitaire gameplay but with a slight twist—cards are not in laid out the same way, suits don't matter and rank order can go from high to low to high again!

items.title: Knight of Chess
items.description: Knight of Chess is a battle game where you can place your army strategically to defeat your enemy. Instead of usual chess pieces, there are many selections of units with unique characteristics you can choose from, such as tank, warrior, marksman, mage, assassin, etc. Synergies will help increase the strength of your army. Become king on the epic chessboard battle!

items.title: Knock and Run: 100 Doors Escape
items.description: Knock and Run: 100 Doors Escape is a fast-paced, casual arcade game where you race through hotel corridors, ringing doorbells and pulling off hilarious pranks. But be careful: residents react unpredictably, and trouble is always around the corner. Outsmart everyone, stay on the move, and see if you can become the ultimate trickster without getting caught!

items.title: Knockout
items.description: Knockout is a casual yet competitive game where only the sharpest and most focused players survive! Test your reflexes, timing, and strategy as you aim to knock out everyone and become the last player standing. But beware—any slip-up or hesitation could lead to permanent elimination!

items.title: Kogarashi: Ninja's Adventure
items.description: Kogarashi is a thrilling adventure where you guide a fearless ninja through dangerous obstacles and ancient landscapes. With precise jumps and quick reflexes, you must help the ninja navigate perilous platforms on the journey to reach Mount Fuji’s sacred peak. Test your skills in this intense, action-packed challenge for ultimate victory.

items.title: Krazy Kitchen
items.description: Krazy Kitchen is an arcade simulation game where you must run your fast food takeaway restaurant. Cook and serve customers' orders accurately, upgrade your restaurant by adding new dishes, ingredients, and equipment, manage your budget to stay afloat, and be the ultimate 5-star takeaway restaurant!

items.title: Landfill Simulator
items.description: Landfill Simulator is a game where you become the ultimate cleaning manager. Use your powerful vacuum to suck up as much trash as you can, leaving areas spotless. Convert trash into cash to unlock new zones! Sell special trash for extra money or transform it into toys to maximize your profits.

items.title: Larry World
items.description: Larry World is a classic-inspired platformer that takes you on a nostalgic adventure across five vibrant worlds. Guiding Larry, you’ll jump, dodge, and conquer tricky obstacles while uncovering surprises in every stage. With its blend of fun challenges and retro charm, the game invites you to test your skills and enjoy timeless platforming excitement

items.title: Laser Lizard
items.description: Laser Lizard is an arcade game to spread panic through the street, smash buildings, burn everything with laser, and destroy everything you see including the army who sent to kill you. Raise the rampage bar as much to the maximum to enter Shin mode where you will become dangerously powerful for a while.

items.title: Last Archer
items.description: Idle Archery Defense is a strategic survival game where arrows fire automatically, leaving you in charge of upgrades and resources. Earn interest on saved gold at the end of each stage, balancing patience with power. Build devastating synergies from 200+ elemental skill cards, forge legendary gear from 100+ items, and uncover rare artifacts to boost your strength. How far can your timing and tactics carry you?

items.title: Last Plant On Earth
items.description: Last Plant On Earth is a sci-fi game where you play as a robot controlled by the last living plant. The robot uprising brought about the downfall of all life on Earth, leaving behind a desolate wasteland. Your mission is to plant and protect as many trees as possible and breathe life back into the barren land. But be warned as the shadows are teeming with robot enemies, ready to strike at any moment.

items.title: Laundry Rush
items.description: Laundry Rush is a business simulation game where you must run your laundry business so it can be successful. Clean and deliver the dirty laundry from clothes to shoes. Make sure everything is dry and clean before you deliver it to the customers. Earn money and expand your laundry to become a big business!

items.title: Layers Roll
items.description: Layers Roll is a fun casual game where you roll over strips the same color as your wheel. Add more layers and achieve your highest score while dodging obstacles. Collect coins along the way!

items.title: Lazy Jumper
items.description: Lazy Jumper is an arcade game to make the lazy guy jump around and enter the swimming pool. Destroy everything in front of your way to get stars.

items.title: Let Me Eat 2: Feeding Madness
items.description: Let Me Eat 2: Feeding Madness is an arcade game where you have to control several fast-growing marine predators who are out to uncover a mystery lurking in the ocean. The aim of the game is to avoid predators and obstacles while eating other smaller fish and creatures, eventually reaching the top of the food chain. There are 60 new levels that feature scenery such as new underwater worlds, coral reefs, deep sea caves, and sunken ships, as well as above-water challenges. The story mode has the player control a small butterflyfish named Bufi. Bufi eats his way to the top of the food chain. Along the way, the player encounters new prey and predators, both friendly and unfriendly, and must stop a secret fish, "The Who," from destroying the ocean.

items.title: Limited Defense
items.description: Limited Defense is a strategic tower defense game where you command bandits, archers, and explosive towers to hold back relentless waves of enemies. Face off against mischievous Green Slimes, fearsome Orcs, and towering bosses like the Boss King Slime. Upgrade your defenses, unlock legendary warriors, and test your tactical skills in intense, fast-paced battles!

items.title: Limited Kaboom
items.description: Limited Kaboom is the ultimate physics-based destruction game! Use your buddies as living projectiles to take down enemy structures and eliminate foes in creative ways. But beware—your hero must survive the chaos!

items.title: Line Rider
items.description: Draw a line and ride on it. That's the premise of Line Rider. An all-time favorite flash game that you can play here (now in HTML5 and can be played on mobile)!

items.title: Little Alchemy
items.description: Little Alchemy is a fun and educational game where you mix basic elements like air, earth, fire, and water to craft new and increasingly complex items.

items.title: Little Alchemy 2
items.description: Little Alchemy 2 is an intuitive online crafting game developed by Recloak. The aim is to combine elements to create new ones. Start by mixing Earth, air, fire, and water to produce new elements. Discover over 700 items and unlock the recipes to time, matter, and the Universe!

items.title: Little Shop
items.description: Little Shop is a casual management game where you run your bustling store, handling everything from stocking shelves to serving customers. Grow your business by upgrading interiors, expanding space, and adapting to demand. Visit friends’ shops, trade resources, and discover winning strategies. With full control and creative freedom, you're on the path to building a shopping paradise.

items.title: Living Cannon DX
items.description: Living Cannon DX is a platformer game where you take on the role of a small living cannon adventurer on a quest to uncover treasures and navigate through over 90 challenging levels filled with obstacles and surprises.

items.title: Load Up and Kill
items.description: Load Up and Kill is a killing simulation game in which your only goal is to kill a prisoner with whatever weapon you desire. You will be shown some weapons, and after choosing one, you have to load it up (if it needs ammo). Each weapon is filled differently, so you have to find out what you need to do to load them (like first releasing the magazine on a handgun, or pressing the on switch on a chainsaw). Once you're done with loading your weapon, you're taken to the prisoner's cell to do the job. You can keep doing this until you've had your fill, so try out all the different weapons available and see how each of them works!

items.title: Loaders Inc
items.description: Loaders Inc. is a fast-paced home-moving adventure where you race against the clock to collect items from an old house and decorate them beautifully in a new one. Upgrade with extra workers, boost speed, and manage time wisely to improve efficiency. Delight customers with your careful decorating skills and watch your moving business thrive.

items.title: Looping Monsters
items.description: Looping Monsters is an idle game where you train your monsters by making them run around a training area. Each lap earns experience and coins. Merge identical monsters to level them up instantly. Engage in quick battles and face stronger foes as your monsters grow. Train them all to their final forms to become the best!

items.title: Loot Challenge
items.description: Loot Challenge is a casual arcade game that challenges you to collect as many balls as possible and put them in the shredder for cash. Use the cash to upgrade yourself. Clear each level's platforms to progress to the next and continue the ball-collecting adventure.

items.title: Loot Island - Treasure Digger
items.description: Loot Island - Treasure Digger is a strategic casual game where you hunt for buried treasure across mysterious landscapes. Follow the map, dig at marked spots, and unearth gems, coins, and artifacts. Carefully stack your loot in a Tetris-style backpack to maximize space and profit. Upgrade your tools, unlock new areas, and turn each dig into a rewarding adventure.

items.title: Love Tester
items.description: Love Tester is an online game that analyses how compatible you and your crush are. Just fill out your name and your crush's name and get your score. Will you and your crush match 100%? There is only one way to find out.

items.title: Ludo Club
items.description: Ludo Club - Fun Dice Game is a fun board game that brings the classic Ludo game to the online multiplayer world! Join a prestigious club of skilled players in this premium dice game. Aim to be the ultimate player, ascend the leaderboards, and claim the title of the Ludo King! Compete with friends and players worldwide in exciting matches of strategy and luck. Roll the dice, move your tokens, and strategize your way to victory in this thrilling and social gaming experience.

items.title: Lulu Run
items.description: Lulu Run is a casual arcade game where you must run, jump, and roll! Enjoy spectacular Lulu action with just 2 button combinations for jumping and rolling! Can you collect all the scattered pieces of Cubistone? Let's go on an adventure with charming, adorable, and cute Lulu!

items.title: Lumber Harvest: Tree Cutting Game
items.description: Lumber Harvest: Tree Cutting Game is a relaxing progression game where you drive a powerful tractor to clear forests and collect timber. You’ll upgrade your saw, expand your truck’s capacity, and unlock new areas as you turn trees into profit. With smooth mechanics and satisfying progress, you’re set to grow your own wood-cutting empire, one tree at a time.

items.title: Madness Deathwish
items.description: Madness Deathwish is an animation killing game where you can choose any possible mad ways to die.

items.title: Mafia Business Empire: Stickman Escape
items.description: Mafia Business Empire: Stickman Escape 3D is a casual game where you will become a real thief. Get into the banks, museums, and other rich places. Steal everything you see and then get away from the security guard and CCTV. Upgrade your character to increase skills and unlock new skins to make your hero unique. Open new locations to steal as much money as you can and be the most skillful thief in this game!

items.title: Mage vs Monsters
items.description: Mage vs Monsters is a casual game where you step into the shoes of a powerful mage who must fend off hordes of menacing monsters! Use a variety of spells to battle these creatures and collect valuable resources like mushrooms and plants. These resources can be used to craft potions that will aid you in your fight. With every wave of monsters, sharpen your magical skills, experiment with different spell combinations, and concoct potent potions to ensure your victory. Get ready for an enchanting adventure full of magic and mayhem!

items.title: Magic Finger 3D
items.description: Magic Finger 3D is a casual physics game where you use your magical powers to defeat alien foes creatively. Use your magic touch to throw enemies at each other, utilize explosive barrels for big impacts, and send adversaries off platforms. Control your surroundings by picking up and manipulating objects, becoming the ultimate magic user.

items.title: Magic Merge: Tower Defense 3D
items.description: Magic Merge: Tower Defense 3D is a captivating casual tower defense game. Your kingdom is under threat from an evil army, and you must protect it. Expand your castle, unlock powerful towers, engage in strategic merges, and upgrade your defenses to thwart dragons, trolls, goblins, and other dangerous enemies. In this magical world, you have the opportunity to hire formidable units such as swordsmen and archers to aid in the defense of your castle. Prepare for an epic battle where your decision-making skills and strategic prowess will determine the fate of your kingdom.

items.title: Mahjong Pet Quest
items.description: Mahjong Pet Quest is a charming puzzle adventure where classic Mahjong gets a cute twist with adorable animal-themed tiles. Match pairs of animal tiles to clear the board. You can only match tiles that are free and have no other tiles blocking them! Clear all the tiles to complete the level and move on to the next.

items.title: Maid Heroes
items.description: Maid Heroes: Idle RPG is a casual game where you lead your Maid to victory, unlock powerful upgrades, and conquer endless levels of fun and excitement. The game features simple yet engaging mechanics and is sure to become your new favorite. Embark on an epic journey of discovery and conquest!

items.title: Man Runner 2048
items.description: Man Runner 2048 is a casual arcade game where your objective is to run and merge men till you reach 2048. Your goal is to get the highest score on each round, because at the end of the level, you will get a chance to shoot a giant monster. The higher your score, the more power you gain.

items.title: Mancala Classic
items.description: Mancala Classic is a timeless strategic board game that pits players against each other or a cunning computer opponent. Its rich history and intuitive gameplay offer a captivating experience for strategic thinkers. Are you prepared to outwit your opponents, conquer the board, and claim victory?

items.title: Mancala Online
items.description: Mancala is a casual board game where strategic prowess meets thrilling competition. Unlock new boards and pebbles, challenging friends or global enthusiasts. Sharpen your skills against intelligent AI, climb the leaderboard, and enjoy the excitement of capturing stones in this classic game. Dive into the world of Mancala today, customize your gameplay, and become the ultimate champion in this captivating pebble adventure!

items.title: Marina Fever Tycoon
items.description: Marina Fever Tycoon is a casual game where you manage a bustling marina clubhouse. This captivating blend of tycoon, adventure, and idle gaming lets you transform a modest establishment into a thriving empire. Build, upgrade, and strategically manage facilities to attract visitors, all while tapping to earn money. With stunning visuals, immersive sound effects, and innovative idle mechanics, create your dream marina empire and embrace the life of a tycoon!

items.title: Market Boss
items.description: Market Boss is a casual simulation game where you manage a supermarket. Keep the shelves stocked and expand your retail business!

items.title: Master Chess
items.description: Master Chess is an online casual chess game with single and multiplayer options. If you want to show off your chess skills, try out this digital tabletop online browser version. In this title, you can play three different game modes and test your skills against other chess players.

items.title: Master Hit: Boss Hunter
items.description: Master Hit: Boss Hunter is a casual game that puts your aim and reflexes to the ultimate test as you face a new, inventive boss in every level. Navigate through wild locations—from sizzling kitchens to orbiting satellites—and strike with precision to claim victory. With simple controls and thrilling challenges, your journey to become the ultimate boss hunter begins now!

items.title: Math Duck
items.description: Math Duck is a unique and addicting math-puzzle platformer game where you must help the duck to answer the math quiz correctly in the right order. Take the key to the exit door that appears after you answer all the math quizzes, and go to the exit door fast! You only got 10 seconds on each level, so take the quickest route possible.

items.title: Max Mixed Cocktails
items.description: Max Mixed Cocktails is a casual game in which you can become a master mixologist and perfect your cocktail-making skills. The game has simple dynamics and straightforward rules, making it perfect for a leisurely gameplay session.

items.title: Mecha Run
items.description: Mecha Run is a casual game where you control a mecha robot through a series of obstacles to the finish line. You can control your character using a keyboard or change the control mode to use your mouse instead. The game features simple and easy-to-learn gameplay mechanics. Use your mecha's fantastic features, such as the fire gun and drill. Good luck!

items.title: Mega Factory
items.description: Mega Factory is a casualbusiness gamewhere you run a factory and process raw materials to create products. Process, pack, and send the products using delivery vans to fulfill orders. Build more machines, unlock new items, upgrade your workers, and expand your delivery team. Take this factory to another level!

items.title: Mega Fall Ragdoll Simulator
items.description: Mega Fall Ragdoll Simulator is a casual game where you unleash chaos by dropping a ragdoll from towering structures to maximize bone-crunching impact. Experience realistic physics as you strategize your way through intricate levels, earning coins to unlock skins and enhance your ragdoll's appearance. Brace yourself for an ultimate destruction experience like no other!

items.title: Mega Parkour: Obby Escape Run
items.description: Mega Parkour: Obby Escape Run is a fast-paced obstacle course adventure that throws you into high-stakes jumps, tricky climbs, and daring escapes. You’ll race through wild maps—from rooftops to prison towers—testing your reflexes and timing at every turn. Stay sharp, move fast, and prove you’ve got what it takes to conquer each course!

items.title: MemeBattle: What's That Meme?
items.description: MemeBattle: What's That Meme? is a hilarious card game where you collect legendary memes, tackle funny scenarios, and compete for laughs. Respond with the perfect meme to win votes and climb the ranks. Build your collection by unlocking epic meme packs and enjoy endless humor with every match. Prove your comedic genius and become the ultimate Meme Master!

items.title: Meow Market
items.description: Meow Market is a casual game where you run a lively vegetable shop as an adorable white tabby cat. Harvest fresh produce by matching grouped veggies in a clever click-based puzzle system. Sell to lovable animal customers, upgrade your shop, unlock powerful tools, and customize your feline merchant. With daily rewards and charming challenges, every harvest is a step toward market mastery.

items.title: Merge Academy
items.description: Merge Academy is a magical online game where you merge items to collect magic crystals and complete mystical tasks. Fulfill requests from fellow students by creating magical and powerful items. Train your magic skills, explore the map, and experience what it truly means to be a magician!

items.title: Merge and Fight
items.description: Merge and Fight is a casual merge game where you buy warriors and merge them to create a powerful army. Engage in intense battles, conquering enemies, castles, and structures to win the battle.

items.title: Merge Babies
items.description: Merge Babies is a fun arcade game with a simple objective, merge all of the cute merge babies and nurture them until they grow into teenagers. Babies will drop from the sky and fall into the play area, make sure to allow enough room to collect all of the babies that you need to nurture.

items.title: Merge Battle Car
items.description: Merge Battle Car is an exciting casual merge game where you can create mighty war machines by merging battle cars and robots. Engage in intense battles against enemy teams in a futuristic arena, using your tactical skills to defeat steel robots and earn money for army upgrades. With stunning 3D graphics and addictive gameplay, unlock the ultimate max-level cars and robots as you strive to become the ultimate merge master. Enjoy easy and intuitive gameplay, merge units to strengthen your forces, and unlock super-powerful robots and battle cars!

items.title: Merge Battle Tactics
items.description: Merge Battle Tactics is a thrilling merge battle game where you command an army of unique monsters. Merge identical creatures to unleash their full potential and strategically position them for combat against your foes. Master the art of merging and tactical placement to dominate the battlefield and emerge victorious in every clash!

items.title: Merge & Construct
items.description: Merge & Construct is an arcade game where you can be creative to build the ultimate vehicle for driving, flying, and smashing! Show off your imagination as you construct a vehicle capable of crossing the finish line in action-packed car trials. Put your skills to the test in thrilling obstacle races and ensure your car passes the crash test with flying colors. Unleash your creativity and prepare for an exhilarating gaming experience!

items.title: Merge & Dig!
items.description: Merge & Dig! is a casual game where you'll delve deep into the earth, merge pickaxes, and conquer challenging levels filled with various ores and blocks. With each dig, upgrade your pickaxes, merge them to improve their efficiency, and dominate the underground world!

items.title: Merge Fruits
items.description: Merge Fruits is a casual merging game that lets you drop fruits and combine identical ones to whip up new and exciting blends. It's a fruity blast for everyone. Think you've got what it takes to master the art of fruit fusion and cultivate the ultimate orchard? Dive in and find out!

items.title: Merge Galaxy
items.description: Merge Galaxy is a casual merge game where you aim, shoot, and stack planets to create cosmic wonders. Combine smaller planets into larger ones, launching them into orbit with precision. Harness gravity’s pull and strategize each shot to build the ultimate celestial masterpiece, transforming planets into a radiant sun.

items.title: Merge Happy Planets
items.description: Merge Happy Planets is a merge game where you drop the planets and let them merge! Be careful when it comes to meteor showers and some mad planets! Use Big Bang Bombs, Rainbow Planets, and Black Holes to achieve victory! Try your best to beat your high scores. How long can you survive?

items.title: Hotel Rush: Merge Story
items.description: Hotel Rush: Merge Story is a casual merge game where you join Ted on a journey to uncover his grandfather’s hidden past. As you explore the hotel’s forgotten corners, you’ll merge humble tools into powerful tools, uncover hidden treasures, and piece together family secrets that have been buried for years. Each renovated floor unlocks new challenges, puzzles, and surprises, taking you deeper into a story filled with twists and heartfelt discoveries. With every merge and decoration, you’ll breathe new life into the hotel, transforming it into a masterpiece.

items.title: Merge Knights!
items.description: Merge Knights! is a casual merge game where you strategically combine archers and knights on your battlefield to fight against enemies. Use your merging skills to strengthen your army and become an unstoppable force. Aim to become the ultimate merge master and lead your army to victory!

items.title: Merge Magnat - Ideal Store
items.description: Merge Magnat - IdeaI Store is a merge-and-idle game where you create and manage your own shopping district. Combine small stores to unlock upgraded businesses and attract more customers. Expand your area, improve your premises, and maximize profits. Watch your bustling shopping center grow as you strategically place stores and discover new combinations to dominate the retail world!

items.title: Halloween Merge
items.description: Halloween Merge is a spooky-themed casual merge game where you dive into the secrets of the Spelton Estate! Join Chloe on a thrilling Halloween adventure to uncover the mystery of her family’s past and restore the mansion to its former glory. Solve the witch’s disappearance, fend off goblins, and prepare the estate for a haunting Halloween celebration! Uncover hidden mysteries and decorate for the spookiest time of the year in Halloween Merge!

items.title: Merge Pirates Caribbean Battle
items.description: Merge Pirates Caribbean Battle is an exhilarating merge battle game experience, placing you in command of a fleet of diverse battleships. Merge identical ships to unlock their full power, then strategically deploy them in combat against adversaries. Hone your merging skills and tactical acumen to secure victory against the formidable Kraken and dominate the high seas!

items.title: Merge Pool 2048
items.description: Merge Pool 2048 is a casual game that challenges you to merge pucks with the same number to achieve a bigger one until you reach the ultimate goal of 2048. With progressive level design and fantastic elements, each level presents a unique challenge. Some groups may help you, while others make it more difficult to achieve your goal. With various playing boards and puck formations, Merge Pool 2048 is an excellent time killer that keeps you entertained for hours.

items.title: Merge Racers
items.description: Merge Racers is an idle game in which you have to cover the entire planet with expensive cars. Buy and merge identical cars to create better ones. Bring your cars to the race track and earn idle money every time they cross the finish line!

items.title: Merge Restaurant
items.description: Merge Restaurant is a casual food game in which you are responsible for preparing a restaurant that’s not in the best shape for opening. Redesign and transform it from a neglected space to the hottest spot in town.

items.title: Merge Run
items.description: Merge Run is a battle arcade game where you must choose your monsters and make them stronger to battle with the villain monsters. Evolve your monsters while you run by entering the right gate. Be a legendary monster trainer, lead powerful monsters, and win the battle. Get ready to join the monster war!

items.title: Merge: Siege Ship
items.description: Merge: Siege Ship is an action-packed naval combat game where you build, upgrade, and battle to dominate the seas. Merge powerful siege weapons, outmaneuver enemies, and hunt for hidden treasures as you forge your path to victory!

items.title: Merge To Battle
items.description: Merge to Battle is a strategy game where the goal is to capture all the castles in your way. Unite your warriors and archers on the battlefield and fight against enemies. Build and upgrade your castle and troops. Explore the entire evolution of warriors by combining two units into an even stronger one. React quickly and use strategy and tactics to win the battle and advance to the next level.

items.title: Metro Connect
items.description: Metro Connect is a simulation clicker game where you manage subway stations and operate trains. Construct, link, and upgrade your metro network to transform stations into hubs. Test strategy by optimizing routes, improving stations, and ensuring smooth train operations. Design intricate subway lines, strategically connecting stations in New York City for efficient passenger flow. Thrilling city-building and transportation management await in this journey!

items.title: Microbe Mania - Cannon Strike
items.description: Microbe Mania Cannon Strike is a delightful casual game that combines precision and strategy with vibrant visuals. Catapult colorful microbes into floating bubbles, aim for accuracy, and progress through levels filled with charming music and fun!

items.title: Microlife
items.description: Microlife is an arcade game where you need to feed the little Micro to grow. You need money to buy them food, do not let them starve! If you run out of funds click on the eggs to collect and exchange them for coins.

items.title: Milky Way Idle
items.description: Milky Way Idle is a multiplayer RPG inspired by Runescape. It features gathering and crafting skills, a flexible combat system, a player-driven marketplace, in-game chat, and leaderboards. The game minimizes active clicking, allowing the automatic repeating of actions until changed. Skills include gathering (milking, foraging, woodcutting), production (cheese-smithing, crafting, tailoring, cooking, brewing), enhancing equipment, and combat (stamina, intelligence, attack, power, defense, magic, ranged). Community features include a marketplace, chat, and leaderboard. Offline progress of up to 10 hours is supported, with upcoming features including tasks/quests, group combat, bosses, and dungeons.

items.title: Millionaire Quiz
items.description: Millionaire Quiz is a virtual twist on the classic TV game show, challenging you to answer 15 increasingly tough questions for a shot at the million-dollar prize. To win, you must correctly navigate through questions from various categories, each more challenging than the last. If you find yourself stumped, use lifelines to increase your chances. Miss a question, and it's game over—good luck!

items.title: Mind Controller
items.description: Control your enemy's mind in Mind Controller. Use the controller to dictate the behavior of your enemy and kill all your foes to complete the level. Find creative ways to kill them all!

items.title: Mine Keeper
items.description: Mine Keeper is a simulation game where you play as a dwarf lord and create one of those great kingdoms of yours. Build your own town, and take care of your nation. Collect fruits and sell them to provide food for your people. Provide better houses for a living and build new facilities or direct your money to create your military forces from an army of dwarves. Mine into deep mines to get valuable stones and gems. Don't forget to take your troops with you because there are monsters in the mine! As your kingdom becomes known, more people will move in to live and work, and you will be able to hire farmers and soldiers. Build new facilities for crafting, and get new resources. Create the greatest kingdoms of all time!

items.title: Mine Runner
items.description: Mine Runne is an endless runner game that takes you on an ultimate running adventure through the mine. Collect gems, avoid obstacles, and choose your character from a variety of options such as humans, robots, zombies, and cats. Use special power-ups like magnets and fast runs to boost your speed and survive longer. Upgrade power-ups and unlock rewards as you run faster and faster through the mine tunnel. Can you survive this thrilling 3D mine run adventure?

items.title: Mine Slingshot
items.description: In Mine Slingshot, you wield a colossal slingshot to hurl Minecraft mobs at relentless zombies. Strategize to topple structures and eliminate multiple foes by targeting their footholds. Merge mobs for stronger allies by colliding them. Your mission? Clear each level by vanquishing all zombies in this explosive and inventive twist on the classic slingshot game.

items.title: Miner Tycoon Big Dynamite
items.description: Miner Tycoon Big Dynamite is a casual tycoon game that takes you on a journey into wealth and adventure. Strategically blast through the earth to unearth rare gems, then showcase your riches in a dazzling museum. Craft exquisite jewelry to attract high-paying customers and complete daring challenges to become the ultimate mining tycoon. Get ready for explosive riches in Miner Tycoon Big Dynamite!

items.title: Mini Blocks
items.description: Switch blocks cleverly and make your way to the goal portal.

items.title: Mini Flips
items.description: Mini Flips is an arcade game to collect all the coins in the arena by jumping, flipping sides, and avoiding obstacles. Complete over 160 levels in this challenging game!

items.title: Mini Golf 18
items.description: Mini Golf 18 is a casual golf game where you avoid obstacles and find the shortest and easiest path to the hole. Can you complete all 18 holes and get the best score?

items.title: MiniBattles
items.description: MiniBattles (2, 3, 4, 5, and 6 player games) is an interesting local multiplayer one-button battle game that supports up to 6 players simultaneously in various mini games, such as soccer, cars, tanks, archers, and many more!

items.title: MiniMissions
items.description: MiniMissions - epic battles of skill. MiniMissions is a 1 player version of12 MiniBattles. In this game, you need to complete a set of challenges. Players must complete 80 different missions in a variety of different disciplines.

items.title: Mirror Wizard
items.description: Mirror Wizard is a platform game where you must jump, avoid obstacles, and use your magic to flip sides in order to collect all the blue balls.

items.title: Mobile Run
items.description: Mobile Run is an arcade 3D running game that challenges you to collect different apps and use their powers to overcome obstacles. Run through a variety of obstacles and put your skills to the test as you collect more apps and gain new abilities. Unleash the true potential of these apps and conquer every hurdle in your path!

items.title: Mojo Match 3D
items.description: Mojo Match 3D is a vibrant puzzle adventure where color and fun collide! Step into a world full of dazzling visuals and 3D match challenges that will keep you entertained for hours.

items.title: Mom's Diary 2
items.description: Mom's Diary 2 is a cooking adventure where you travel the globe, mastering kitchens in iconic cities like London, Vienna, and Tokyo. With over 1000 unique levels and 800+ delectable dishes, upgrade your kitchen, boost your skills, and become a culinary superstar. Spin for rewards, earn extra cash, and use power-ups for ultimate success!

items.title: Mom's Diary: Cooking Games
items.description: Mom's Diary: Cooking Games is a cooking game that brings you to the ultimate kitchen madness time management fever experience! Become a culinary master in Kitchen City, conquering challenging targets across 1000+ unique levels in locations worldwide. Unleash your creativity with 800+ dishes, upgrade kitchen items, and master the art of cooking with ease. Serve dishes like a star and win over customers with your fast-paced skills! Be a top chef now!

items.title: Money Ping Pong
items.description: Money Ping Pong is a casual clicker game where you strategically place money blocks to shrink the space for bouncing balls and maximize your earnings. With various maps and dozens of functional blocks, enjoy a relaxing yet engaging gameplay experience.

items.title: Mono Move
items.description: Mono Move is a casual platformer that combines gravity-switching mechanics with a challenging obstacle course designed to test your skills and patience! This rage-inducing game requires precise timing and strategic moves to beat all 9 levels while minimizing collisions. Are you ready to take on the challenge and master all 9 levels?

items.title: Monster Adventure
items.description: Monster Adventure is a casual game where you explore the world and capture various monsters. As you explore different areas, you'll come across a wide variety of monsters with unique characteristics and abilities. Your task is to capture these monsters, adding them to your collection. Each monster may have its own strengths, weaknesses, and special abilities that can be used strategically.

items.title: Monster Bash FRVR
items.description: Monster Bash is a simple arcade baseball game that's all about hitting a baseball to get a good distance. Your goal is to go as far as you can, but you're going to have to put in a bit of work before you get to that sweet high score. Each time you hit the ball, it'll hit a few different things that'll help you long the way, this includes gold-filled mushrooms which will give you gold, some monsters that'll push the ball further, and some other monsters that open up whole new stages. As you gain more distance and collect more gold, you'll be able to upgrade your equipment to get even better scores! Some stuff are only cosmetic (the hat and the shades), but getting a good score is better when you're all dressed up, right?

items.title: Monster Battle
items.description: Monster Battle is a casual game where you can capture various monsters and start dueling with your opponent. Merge your identical monsters so they are upgraded and become more powerful monster! Find and collect new types of monsters around you. Kill the boss opponent in the area and be the ultimate duelist!

items.title: Monster School 3
items.description: Monster School 3 is a continuation of the Monster School series. Teacher Herobrine gave the school students a new challenge, this time they will have to draw with blocks to survive on the floor is a lava challenge! Play as Monster School students which are Zombies, Craftsman, Noob, Pro, Hacker, God, Noob Digger, and Girl. Good luck students!

items.title: Monster Trainer: Catching Game
items.description: Monster Trainer: Catching Game is a fun battle game where you can catch and tame a variety of monsters. Go hunt to get a new monster, evolve them so they can grow and become more powerful, win any battle, and become a monster legend! You can support the developer's social media channels onTwitterandYouTube.

items.title: Monster Truck Rampage
items.description: Monster Truck Rampage is a driving game that lets you crush any cars and earn rewards. Use your money to build your garage and upgrade your monster truck. Unleash chaos as you go on a rampage, destroy any cars in your path and become the ultimate monster truck driver!

items.title: Monster World: Fight Arena
items.description: Monster World: Fight Arena delivers heart-pounding action and thrilling battles in a voxel-apocalyptic setting. The game's challenging and strategic gameplay makes every battle engaging. The need to continuously attack and develop your character creates a sense of progression and achievement.

items.title: More Bloons
items.description: More Bloons is an arcade game where you must help this little monkey to pop all the balloons to finish the level.

items.title: Motocross Arena
items.description: Motocross Arena is an idle game that lets you experience the excitement of motocross racing.. Select from a range of high-powered bikes, explore four challenging arenas, and meet diverse characters. Execute jaw-dropping stunts, engage in thrilling multiplayer races, and personalize your rider and bike for unmatched adrenaline rushes. Prepare to unleash your engine's power and dominate the track in this heart-pounding motocross adventure!

items.title: Move Match AR
items.description: Move your body to collect identical items and meet the goals in this one-of-a-kind AR Match 3D game. Challenge your puzzle-solving skills and agility as you collect and match objects until every goal is met. It’s not just a puzzle; it’s a test of your strategy and speed!

items.title: Mr. Dude: Online Multiverse Challenge
items.description: Mr. Dude: Online Multiverse Challenge is a casual multiplayer game where pretty much anything can happen. Play with other people from around the world, or with your friends in one of the many challenging yet wacky game modes.

items.title: Multiplayer Quick Tag
items.description: Multiplayer Quick Tag is a casual game tag where the last one out loses a life! With fast-paced platformer action, this casual game promises hours of fun and excitement for players of all ages. Are you ready to sprint, jump, and tag your way to victory in Multiplayer Quick Tag? Whether you're playing against the computer or competing with friends, the adrenaline-pumping excitement of this fast-paced platformer will keep you coming back for more. So, gather your friends, choose your control scheme, and let the tag games begin!

items.title: Muscle Shift
items.description: Muscle Shift is an exciting racing game that enables you to switch your superpower to overcome obstacles. With super-sized muscular hands, you can smash through any barriers obstructing your path. Alternatively, you can inflate your leg muscles to achieve faster speeds and gain an edge over your competitors. Transform into a ball shape to bounce and accelerate when falling down. Compete against others to showcase your superior muscle shape and leave them in your dust. Get ready to rush and assert your dominance in the ultimate showdown of muscular prowess!

items.title: Mussoumano Game
items.description: Mussoumano is an arcade game where you must control the Brazilian rapper Mussoumano in an endless running adventure to save latifas. Choose between different transports and millions of possible visual customization, unlock achievements, and discover different game scenarios and challenges.

items.title: Must Escape the Wizards Castle
items.description: Must Escape the Wizard's Castle is a puzzle-escape game where you must carefully explore your surroundings and interact with various objects by clicking on them. By investigating and collecting items, you can add them to your inventory for later use.

items.title: My Crystal Underwater
items.description: My Crystal Underwater is a delightful casual game where you can dive into the depths of the sea and gather precious crystals. Explore the beautiful underwater world, collect gold, and be the wealthiest diver!

items.title: My Dinoland
items.description: My Dinoland is a simulation game where you manage your own dinosaur zoo! Breed and care for prehistoric creatures, upgrade their enclosures and create exciting attractions to draw in visitors. Discover new dinosaur species, design exotic environments, and ensure your dinosaurs are happy to keep your park thriving. Bring the Jurassic era to life and build the ultimate dinosaur zoo today!

items.title: My Imperfect Cult
items.description: My Imperfect Cult is a casual simulation game where you play as the head of the cult and must lead it to greatness! Persuade people to join your cult, perform the rituals, and make their faith grow stronger! When they have full faith in your cult, they will also be your loyal servants! Don't forget to upgrade yourself so it is easier to persuade people and to make them more loyal to you. The game will be more difficult as you go because you'll also have a competitor. Try to recruit as many people as you can and make your church bigger!

items.title: My Island
items.description: My Island is a casual simulation game where you gotta survive on the island all by yourself. The good news is, you've got a pickaxe and axe stashed in your bag to snag resources. Upgrade your tools to speed up your resource hunt. Explore new areas and find a boat so you can sail to a new island.

items.title: My Jelly Bear Pet
items.description: My Jelly Bear Pet is your adorable new virtual pet who brings a unique twist to the classic tamagotchi experience. This cute, jiggly companion loves to eat, nap in the fridge, and play mini-games. Keep Jelly Bear happy by feeding him sweets, washing him, and dressing him up. He thrives on your daily care and attention, so make sure he never gets bored, hungry, or sleepy. Jelly Bear is not your typical virtual pet—his charm will win you over, even if animal games aren't usually your thing!

items.title: My Mart
items.description: My Mart is a casual simulation game in which you manage and run your own supermarket!
