Grow and sell crops, produce goods, hire employees, and manage the business to run a successful supermarket. Keep up with customer demand by regularly expanding and restocking shelves. Become the ultimate retail manager!

items.title: My Monster Pet: Train & Fight
items.description: My Monster Pet: Train & Fight is a casual game with a blend of monster care, training, and epic battles in a vibrant village setting. With dozens of unique monsters, exciting gameplay, challenging levels, and the thrill of evolving your monsters, the game provides a captivating experience for players. Whether you're a fan of pet simulation or strategic monster battles, this game offers a delightful combination of both. Download now and embark on a monster-filled journey to become the ultimate monster trainer and legend of the village! You can support the developer's social media channels onTwitterandYouTube.

items.title: My Monsters Zoo
items.description: My Monster Zoo is a playful simulation game where you build and manage a zoo filled with quirky, evolving monsters. Hatch eggs, care for your creatures, and unlock helpers to handle daily tasks. Expand your zoo, walk your monsters, and sell grown ones to earn coins for upgrades. With charming animation and tons of rare monsters to collect, your dream zoo awaits!

items.title: My Pet Care Salon
items.description: My Pet Care Salon is a casual, cute game that lets you manage your very own pet spa, where you can groom, pamper, and style an adorable array of pets. Relax to a variety of engaging, interactive activities, from luxurious bath times to precise nail trimming and trendy haircuts, ensuring each furry client receives top-notch care and attention. As you manage your bustling salon, you'll get to show off your style skills with fashionable accessories while earning rewards for outstanding service. Create a warm and welcoming atmosphere for pets and their owners.

items.title: My Sweet World
items.description: My Sweet World is an exciting casual adventure game where you embark on a heroic journey to Candy Land, offering assistance to those in need. The princess and locals rely on your skills as you enhance the land and collect keys to unlock hidden areas. Explore the vibrant world, gather resources like cotton from trees and icing from sugar planks, and use your creativity to craft a variety of delicious cakes.

items.title: My Town Home: Family Playhouse
items.description: My Town Home: Family Playhouse is a vibrant dollhouse game where you explore six different rooms and create imaginative family stories. You can role-play as a parent or child, interact with various objects, and enjoy fun activities like cooking, gardening, or watching TV. The game encourages creativity, letting you shape your virtual family life in any way you choose.

items.title: MyDream Universe
items.description: myDream Universe is a 3D sandbox space simulation game that allows you to create and shape a beautiful galaxy.

items.title: MySolar: Build Your Planets
items.description: mySolar: Build Your Planets is a great game that allows you to effectively play god – you can build different planets and shape the universe as you see fit! Move around the universe and collect points so that you can build your planets.

items.title: Neon Rider
items.description: Neon Rider is an electrifying 2D game where you navigate a bike through a neon obstacle course full of twists, turns, and surprises. Neon Rider retro graphics and simple gameplay will take you back to when arcade games ruled the world.

items.title: Neon Stars
items.description: Neon Stars is a casual game where every attack on your ship is a sudden test of reflexes. Amidst the endless expanse of shimmering stars, you must swiftly prepare your weapons for battle. Repel wave after wave of enemy assaults to prolong your survival, earn new ships, and achieve heroic status. Compete with friends for the top spot on the leaderboard.

items.title: Neon Swing
items.description: Neon Swing is an arcade game where you must swing as fast as you can to avoid the red wall which is slowly moving toward you. Swing from point to point and try to get as far as you can while using trampolins to get even further. The trampolins in your way can also make your life a bit more difficult, so use them to your advantage. Make clever use of the game mechanics and be the best neon swing player out there!

items.title: Night Club Security
items.description: Night Club Security is a casual simulator game where you step into the boots of an all-powerful nightclub bouncer. Check guests for banned items, choose who gets in, and decide who leaves empty-handed—or with a bruise or two. With full control, unpredictable interactions, and no rules holding you back, you run the door… and the night.

items.title: Ninja: Bamboo Assassin
items.description: Ninja: Bamboo Assassin is a casual ninja game that plunges you into the perilous world of ninja arts, where every move counts and could be the difference between life and death.

items.title: No Pain No Gain - Ragdoll Sandbox
items.description: No Pain No Gain - Ragdoll Sandbox is a chaotic and hilarious game where pain equals profit. Create wild obstacle courses filled with saw blades, springs, bombs, and more. The more your ragdoll crashes, tumbles, and smashes into these traps, the more coins you earn. Strategize and embrace the madness—each choice leads to unique and entertaining outcomes.

items.title: Noob Archer vs Stickman Zombie
items.description: Noob Archer vs Stickman Zombie is a hilarious archery game that puts you in the shoes of Noob, who must take down all those dancing Stickmen Zombies. Noob's just chilling at home and trying to get some nap when the Stickmen start causing a ruckus by playing some loud music and dancing around. Time to show off those archery skills and put a stop to their party! Get ready to aim, shoot, and have a blast!

items.title: Noob Gigachad: Parkour Tricks Challenge
items.description: Noob Gigachad: Parkour Tricks Challenge is a fun 2D casual parkour game in the Noob universe! After getting expelled from Monster School, Noob is transformed into Gigachad by Herobrine, giving him new powers and challenges. Your mission is simple—you need to run, leap, and pull off impressive parkour tricks as you race toward victory. Collect diamonds along the way to unlock a variety of cool new skins, and carefully navigate through tricky obstacles to reach the portal without falling into the holes.

items.title: Noob MineFactory
items.description: Noob MineFactory is a fun and unique idle game that plunges you into the mining world. You will play as Nubik, an eager young hero. Start to build a factory to craft ingots, weapons, and armor for your settlement's success. Dig, forge, and create your path to prosperity!

items.title: Noob Miner: Escape From Prison
items.description: Noob Miner: Escape From Prison is a casual game where you play as a prisoner and mine for resources. Get resources, buy new picks, eat cakes, blow up everything with dynamite, and find a way to escape prison. How soon will you be able to escape?

items.title: Noob VS Monsters
items.description: Noob VS Monsters is an arcade game where you have to defend your house by killing all the monsters using a bow and arrow. Defend your house by building various blocks in front of your door. Buy different types of arrows to help you kill monsters and zombies. Survive for 12 nights, where there will be more enemies every night, and the nights will get longer. Prepare yourself to fight a very dangerous boss on night 12. Also, try playing Endless mode for a more challenging difficulty. Let the night begin!

items.title: Noob: Wall Crusher
items.description: Noob: Wall Crusher is an entertaining arcade game that requires you to demolish pixelated monsters to save the world. You'll come across a variety of beasts in various locations. Be courageous and take aim at these monsters to defeat them. Upgrade yourself to become more powerful. Enjoy the straightforward and enjoyable gameplay of this casual game.

items.title: NoobWars
items.description: NoobWars is a casual game that you can play with your friend locally. Pay attention to the wind direction and throw a crate at your opponent. May the best player win the battle!

items.title: Northern Merge
items.description: Northern Merge is an enchanting casual merge game where you can create new items while exploring a magical forest. The clever Scientist Cat has hidden objects throughout the forest, waiting for you to discover and merge them into valuable treasures. As you merge and unlock new items, you'll earn emeralds to boost your progress. The friendly cat welcomes new guests and invites you to dive into this mysterious world of surprises. With relaxing gameplay and endless merging possibilities, this game is perfect for those who love exploration and creativity!

items.title: Nubik vs Herobrin's Army
items.description: Nubik vs Herobrin's Army is an arcade game where you hordes of monsters. Craft weapons, upgrade them, and use them to defeat enemies. Become a hero and save your brother!

items.title: Number Digger
items.description: Number Digger is a casual game in which you merge numbers and hit the right path to get your reward! Buy and upgrade your numbers and do the calculation or just use your luck to complete the level. Allocate resources wisely to reach the treasure chests. Beat the monster at the boss level, and don't forget to count the damage!

items.title: Number Shoot
items.description: Number Shoot is a casual puzzle game that offers a devising strategy to merge blocks effectively and reach the target numbers, such as 2048. The game's boosters, combo bonuses, and collectible themes enhance the overall gaming experience and provide players with opportunities to improve their puzzle-solving skills.

items.title: Numbers Arena
items.description: Numbers Arena is a math, snake, and merge game altogether in one game. The green number means pluses, the red number means minus, and the yellow x2 is to multiply your number. If your number is higher than your enemies, then you can run up to it to break it. Collect gray numbers enemies drop to grow even more! You will win when you reach the right number. Collect numbers to be the biggest in the arena and smash the rest of your enemies!

items.title: O-VOID
items.description: Jump into the spinning circle of O-VOID, a one-button arcade game. In this super minimal action runner, you’ll be jumping over obstacles with the tap of a finger. But this is not a regular platformer! The entire level can change direction or flip upside down to throw you off. Are you skilled enough to survive every challenge?

items.title: Obby: Boxer
items.description: Obby: Boxer is a casual idle game where you help Obby punch through walls and escape confinement with sheer force. Strengthen his abilities, collect pets, unlock over 30 powerful gauntlets, and explore vibrant new locations. Customize Obby with unique skins and effects, spin for rewards, and rise through the ranks as you smash every barrier.

items.title: Obby Cards: The Legend Hunt
items.description: Obby Cards: The Legend Hunt is a battle game where you collect powerful fighter cards, build an unbeatable team, and dominate epic PvP battles and boss arenas. Perfect for fans of Roblox-style gameplay and anime action, this game lets you dive into fast-paced card collecting and strategic combat.

items.title: Obby Parkour Race: Multiplayer
items.description: Obby Parkour Race: Multiplayer is a thrilling parkour competition where you race against others to conquer challenging obstacle courses. Leap, climb, and balance your way through tricky paths while mastering clever tricks to outpace your rivals. Stay focused and agile as you race toward victory in this fast-paced test of skill and speed!

items.title: Obby With Friends: Draw and Jump
items.description: Obby With Friends: Draw and Jump is a multiplayer casual art drawing game where players team up in an exciting parkour platformer inspired by Roblox’s Obby. Solve puzzles, create platforms, and navigate traps with your friends to conquer various challenges. Collect Robux, show off your parkour skills, and reach the finish.

items.title: Obby World: Squid Escape
items.description: Obby World: Squid Escape is a casual parkour game where you jump your way through a whirlwind of obstacles and surprising challenges. Anything is possible in the variety of games offered. You will find yourself leaping across deadly gaps, racing through winding tracks on a speedy bike, and making daring escapes from high-security prisons. Each mode offers new thrills, so get ready to test your reflexes.

items.title: Obstacle Race: Destroying Simulator!
items.description: Obstacle Race: Destroying Simulator is a casual game where precision is key. Maneuver through a maze of obstacles while rival racers unleash chaos to impede your progress. The twist? Collide with obstacles, and your car shatters into fragments. Your mission: navigate the wreckage and skillfully reach the dealership. Outsmart competitors, dodge obstacles, and prove you're the ultimate racer in this intense, debris-strewn challenge.

items.title: Ocean Miner
items.description: Ocean Miner is an adventurous exploration game set in the depths of the ocean. Collect resources, build powerful machines, and face dangerous sea creatures. Unlock potent machines, new powerups, and impressive enemies as you dive deeper. Experience endless fun with beautiful 3D visuals and challenging moments, including battles against big bosses.

items.title: OctopusRun
items.description: Octopus Run is an underwater runner game where you control a powerful octopus navigating the ocean's depths. Hunt divers and fish, dodge obstacles, and collect money to upgrade your abilities and attacks. Dive into this thrilling aquatic adventure and become the ultimate predator of the sea!

items.title: Office Fight
items.description: Office Fight is a casual action game where you must beat everyone in the office. Use your powerful baseball bat to hit the enemies! Get other weapons such as baguette, frying pan, and else! You can throw your enemies in any different direction you want! Show who's boss in the office!

items.title: Offroad Climb 4x4
items.description: Offroad Climb 4x4 is a driving off-road adventure where you'll conquer rugged terrains and daunting obstacles. Choose from a lineup of powerful off-road vehicles and navigate through challenging landscapes, earning coins to upgrade your ride. Whether you're a seasoned off-road enthusiast or just seeking thrilling hill-climbing action, this game offers endless excitement and challenges for every player. Gear up and embark on your off-road journey today!

items.title: Crazy Hills
items.description: Crazy Hills is an arcade racing game where you face intense challenges and push your car to its limits. Navigate through treacherous obstacles, destroy everything in your way, and avoid wrecking your vehicle. Each level tests your driving skills and reflexes as you strive to survive the chaos on the road.

items.title: Oh, flip!
items.description: Oh, flip! is a fun game about doing backflips.

items.title: Oiligarchy
items.description: Oiligraphy is a strategy game where you explore and drill around the world, corrupt politicians, stop alternative energies, and increase oil addiction. It's all about the profits and not about the people and animals you may hurt along the way. Start drilling resources now!

items.title: Om Nom: Bubbles
items.description: Om Nom: Bubbles is a 60-seconds bubble shooter game featuring the iconic Om Nom.

items.title: Om Nom: Run
items.description: Om Nom: Run is a running game set on the mean streets of Nomville. Complete the set challenges on each level to succeed. There are various power-ups and bonuses to help. The game features the characters Om Nom and Om Nelle from theCut The Ropeuniverse.

items.title: One Line
items.description: One Line is a casual art drawing game where your mission is to use a single line to protect an innocent man from a series of unfortunate events. From shielding him against heavy rain to fending off aggressive bees and even angry giants, each level presents a new challenge. Get creative and use the power of One Line to ensure he stays safe, all while enjoying the simple yet satisfying drawing mechanics. The more you play, the more you'll need to think outside the box to keep him protected!

items.title: Only Up Balls
items.description: Only Up Balls is an exciting casual physics-based game where your primary objective is to guide a ball through various platform challenges, defying gravity and skillfully jumping from track to track. The goal is to reach the top of each platform while avoiding falling and mastering the game’s mechanics.

items.title: OpenGuessr - Geo Guessing
items.description: OpenGuessr - Geo Guessing is an expansive geography-guessing game designed to challenge your knowledge of the world. Players are dropped into random locations from street view images and must use environmental clues, such as road signs or landmarks, to pinpoint their exact location.

items.title: Orbit
items.description: Orbit is a fun arcade game about gravitation. Launch a comet into space. Once it's in space it will move based on gravity. Make sure that it doesn't hit any planets before the timer runs out. The gravity around planets is higher, so your comet may turn differently when near them. There is a blue bar and an orange bar. If you manage to not hit any planets until the orange bar runs out, you can advance by 2 levels. Rearrange the planets' positions if you face a difficult level. Good luck!

items.title: OvO
items.description: OvO is a fast-paced platformer where you use precise parkour and free running skills to complete each level. The levels feature increasingly tricky obstacles and you’ll need to do various jumps, slides, and dives to avoid them.

items.title: Pacman
items.description: Pacman is of the most iconic arcade games ever. It was created in 1980 by Namco, and is still very popular today.

items.title: Paintball King
items.description: Paintball King is a casual first-person shooter (FPS) game with a twist. In this game, you can wield a variety of unusual weapons like pistols, the KA 74, an automatic turret, or even a banana! Your objective is to compete in different arenas with the goal of being the first to finish the game, and maybe even earning the title of Queen or King. This quirky and fun-filled game offers a unique take on the FPS genre, where unconventional weapons and fast-paced action lead to hours of entertainment. Get ready to dive into a paintball battle like no other!

items.title: Panda Shop Simulator
items.description: Panda Shop Simulator is a charming simulation game where you manage your very own store as an adorable panda owner. Start small and expand into a thriving retail empire. Earn profits to hire helpful assistants and upgrade your facilities. The delightful panda characters add a playful twist, making every moment of running your shop fun and exciting!

items.title: Papa's Burgeria
items.description: Papa's Burgeria is a casual game in which you work at a burger shop and are in charge! You must take orders, fry the burgers, and build the burgers! Be a good burger flipper and make Papa Louie proud.

items.title: Papa's Scooperia
items.description: Papa's Scooperia is a casual time management game where you embark on a journey to run your ice cream shop by taking, making, and serving orders. The restaurant can be slow but gets increasingly crowded as the days go by. The more crowded it gets, the greater the pressure becomes. Do a good job, and you won’t only earn the satisfaction of a hard day’s work, but you will also earn a winning in tips!

items.title: Papa's Cheeseria
items.description: Papa’s Cheeseria is arestaurant gamewhere you build grilled cheese sandwiches for customers. Keep up your requests and deliver the perfect cheesy creations. Upgrade your shop and play minigames between shifts!

items.title: Papas Cupcakeria
items.description: Papa’s Cupcakeria is a casual restaurant game in which you work for Papa Louie, making tasty cupcakes for customers. Impress customers with your decorative cake-making skills and stay on top of orders as they increase daily. Help Papa turn this place into the hottest cupcake establishment in town!

items.title: Papa's Donuteria
items.description: Papa’s Donuteria is a casual restaurant game in which you build delicious donuts for customers. Learn how to roll and cut the dough, fry it, and serve the donuts with a variety of sweet and tasty toppings. The days only get busier, so learn to work fast without sacrificing quality!

items.title: Papa's Freezeria
items.description: Manage an ice cream shop in Papa’s Freezeria! Make the perfect sundaes for customers enjoying summer vacation in this classic restaurant management game.

items.title: Papa's Hot Doggeria
items.description: Papa’s Hot Doggeria is a casual restaurant game in which you serve hotdogs to baseball game spectators. Does that sound exciting? We thought so. Keep up with your customers' orders and deliver delicious dogs on time with various extras and toppings. Upgrade your doghouse to get higher scores.

items.title: Papa's Pancakeria
items.description: Papa’s Pancakeria is a casualrestaurant gamein which you grill pancakes and serve them with delicious toppings to customers. As you progress, you play minigames and upgrade the shop. Learn to create perfect pancakes while juggling multiple orders at once!

items.title: Papa's Pastaria
items.description: Papa's Pastaria is a casual restaurant game where you take charge of an Italian restaurant and serve delectable pasta dishes. Indulge in the culinary delights and experience the joy of running your Papa’s pasta haven.

items.title: Papa's Pizzeria
items.description: Papa's Pizzeria is back! Thanks to Ruffle you can now play Papa's Pizzeria for free in your web browser once again. Papa has spontaneously left town, leaving you in charge of the pizzeria. It's on you to take orders, add pizza toppings, put them in the oven, and cut the pizzas! Work fast and make Papa Louie proud.

items.title: Papa's Taco Mia
items.description: Build tasty tacos in Papa’s Taco Mia!, a casual restaurant game in thePapa Louie series. You have been given a job as a reward for winning a taco-eating contest. Build perfect tacos for a range of hungry customers and provide outstanding service to make Papa Louie proud.

items.title: Papa's Wingeria
items.description: Papa’s Wingeria is a casual restaurant game where you cook delicious wings for customers. Learn to serve the perfect plate of wings and purchase upgrades to improve the customer experience. The days only get busier at Papa’s Wingeria, so work fast to deliver all the orders on time!

items.title: Paper Boy Race: Running Game
items.description: Paper Boy Race: Running Game is a thrilling 3D runner where you speed through bustling city streets on a mission to master the art of newspaper delivery. Dodge traffic, leap over roadblocks, and nail your throws into mailboxes with perfect timing. Upgrade your ride, unlock cool gear, and race to become a true delivery legend.

items.title: Paper Delivery Boy
items.description: Paper Delivery Boy: Bike Delivery Drive Game is a thrilling adventure where you navigate bustling neighborhoods on your bicycle, deliver newspapers, and handle special requests. Your mission is to toss papers to customers while skillfully avoiding obstacles. Ride through various districts, helping as many people as possible in this exciting delivery challenge!

items.title: Parking Line
items.description: Parking Line is a casual puzzle game that puts your driving skills to the test. Your task is to draw the perfect line and park the car in the designated spot. With various levels offering unique parking setups, each challenge will demand precision and strategy. Sharpen your parking prowess as you progress through the game, conquering one parking spot after another. Can you master the art of precise parking? Take on the challenge and find out!

items.title: Paws & Pals Diner
items.description: Paws & Pals Diner is a casual restaurant management game where you step into the paws of a diner manager, catering to adorable animal customers and staff. In this charming and whimsical world, you'll manage a bustling diner filled with furry friends, unlock delicious foods, and attract a variety of cute customers.

items.title: Peckin' Pixels
items.description: Peckin' Pixels is a casual farming game where you manage a chicken farm. Take care of your chickens and grow the business!

items.title: Pegball FRVR
items.description: Pegball FRVR is a 1 player soccer arcade game to control the peg figures and win the match!

items.title: Pegchinko
items.description: Pegchinko is a casual roguelike-style game where every shot counts and no bounce is the same twice. Launch your ball, chain insane combos, and upgrade your pegs for maximum impact. With each unpredictable path, you’ll need sharp strategy and a bit of luck to claim victory in this ever-changing arena of ricocheting chaos.

items.title: Pencil Rush
items.description: Pencil Rush is a casual game where you pick up your tool – a colored pencil and start the challenge. Swipe pencils, trace, and race your way along the obstacle course. (You gotta avoid those obstacles. Hit them, and it’s game over!) Add to your color collection by picking up more pencils along the run. Run and make it to the finish line where you can color an amazing picture.

items.title: Penguin Restaurant
items.description: Penguin Restaurant is a charming management game where a group of penguin friends set out to run a successful eatery in Antarctica. Serve customers, expand the restaurant, and attract more visitors as business grows. Earn profits to open new locations and build a thriving franchise. Can you turn this cozy restaurant into a global success?

items.title: Penguin Wars
items.description: Penguin Wars is a game in which you play as a penguin trying to conquer Antarctica. You are going to do this by pushing all of the other penguins off of their icebergs. You have to go through all of the areas armed with nothing but your bazooka filled with snowballs, as well as your knowledge in spacing your shots.

items.title: Pepi Hospital: Learn & Care
items.description: Pepi Hospital Learn & Care is an engaging casual game for kids where you can play as a doctor, patient, or explorer. Dive into a colorful hospital environment featuring everything from X-ray rooms to dental clinics. Assist the Pepi characters, operate medical tools, and interact with numerous objects. Meet various characters, including the helpful Pepi Bot, and embark on an educational adventure that teaches fundamental medical concepts.

items.title: Pepi House: Happy Family
items.description: Pepi House is a vibrant virtual dollhouse where you can explore family life routines. Create and play out your own happy home stories in every room—from cooking in the kitchen to fixing a car in the garage. With dozens of interactive items and characters, let your imagination lead the way in this fun, imaginative family adventure!

items.title: Pepi Super Stores: Fun & Games
items.description: Pepi Super Stores is an engaging casual game that invites children to be curious and explore a lively shopping mall filled with exciting shops and activities. You can step into the roles of fashion designer, stylist, or chef, crafting your own unique stories. Featuring 34 characters, diverse scenes and a multitude of items, this game fosters curiosity and creativity, making it ideal for kids and families.

items.title: Perfect Piano
items.description: Become a piano master and complete all the songs in this entertaining game.Want to test your keyboarding skills on a different musical battleground? Check outFriday Night Funkin'.

items.title: Pet Cafe
items.description: Pet Cafe is a simulation game where every visitor can surround himself with various animals and pay you. Buy a wide selection of animals, from affectionate kittens and puppies to woolly sheep, and also buy seats for visitors. Take care of the animals by feeding them, shower them, and let them sleep so they will be happy and healthy all the time. The happier the animals are, the more visitors your cafe will attract.

items.title: Pet Healer - Vet Hospital
items.description: Pet Healer - Vet Hospital is a casual game where you help treat animals and become the best pet doctor. Collect coins, buy new equipment, unlock new medicine and learn to cure different diseases in your new pet clinic!

items.title: Ping Pong Chaos
items.description: Ping Pong Chaos is a chaotic 2-player game from the developer ofRooftop Snipers! Get ready to enter a crazy world and play insane ping pong matches against the computer or against your friends!

items.title: Pinturillo 2
items.description: Pinturillo 2 is a free online drawing game inspired by Pictionary. In the game, you draw a picture based on the word that is given to you, or you guess what the other player is drawing. Draw your best picture to give others a chance to guess correctly!

items.title: Pit Stop Helper
items.description: Pit Stop Helper is a casual game where you bring gallons of gas from the production machine to the waiting vehicles. Unlock the first-level go-kart vehicle with provided base money. The vehicles are ready to hit the road, and it's up to you to equip them with the right gear.

items.title: Plane Crash Ragdoll Simulator
items.description: Plane Crash Ragdoll Simulator is a 3D airplane game where you step into the shoes of a fearless pilot. Your mission is to survive a relentless barrage of rockets targeting your aircraft. Despite its apparent simplicity, the game delivers an adrenaline rush as you fire rockets at enemies and navigate through treacherous skies. Take control of various planes and helicopters, unlocking and customizing unique skins. Your goal is to navigate the dangerous skies to the finish point, but be careful if you hit the ground, your plane will explode!

items.title: Planet Plummet
items.description: Planet Plummet is a game where you combine identical planets to create larger, more powerful ones. Strategically merge smaller planets, expanding your cosmic empire with each fusion. Test your skills in this engaging puzzle adventure, striving to form the biggest planet in the galaxy.

items.title: Plant Squad
items.description: Zombies are taking over the world. You are the only hope! Save the world! Plant Squad will help you in this mission. Combine plants to get even more stronger ones, strategize defenses, clear out all zombies. Remember, zombies are also preparing for the battle...Release DateJuly 2024

items.title: Pocketro
items.description: Pocketro is a fast-paced roguelike card game that fuses poker mechanics with strategic deck-building. You’ll craft winning hands, collect random power-ups, and face tougher challenges with each round. Every decision shapes your run, making each session unpredictable and rewarding. Test your instincts, take risks, and outsmart the table in a game of clever gambits.

items.title: Pogo Stick Parkour: Rage Game
items.description: Pogo Stick Parkour: Rage Game is a difficult 2D platformer game where you must use a pogo stick to overcome the path. Use your skills and jump around this surreal mountain full of different scenarios and impossible challenges. Try hard to avoid the frustration of falling. Will you be able to reach the top?

items.title: Pokey Ball
items.description: Pokey Ball is a fast-paced challenge where you flick and launch a ball as high as possible. Master the perfect timing to reach new heights, overcoming obstacles along the way. Each successful poke pushes you further—how far can you go? Test your skills and aim for the top!

items.title: Pool Merge Mania
items.description: Pool Merge Mania is a clever spin on classic pool where bouncing shots meet merging mayhem. Fire balls into the arena, watch them collide and combine into higher-level spheres, and strategize to keep your table under the 15-ball limit. Quick merges mean tighter control, so aim smart and stay in the game!

items.title: Pop It 3D
items.description: Pop It is a satisfying arcade game to pop all the bubbles in different character figures.

items.title: Pop It! Duel
items.description: Pop It! Duel is a competitive version ofPop It!where you need to pop all the bubbles as fast as you can before the opponent in 3-round matches to win new pop-it figures.

items.title: Pop Match 3D
items.description: Pop Match 3D is a vibrant 3D matching game where your goal is to find and match sets of identical items inspired by your favorite pop culture trends and fandoms. From quirky collectibles to iconic objects, each level is packed with eye-catching 3D items waiting to be sorted and cleared.

items.title: Popcorn Chef 2
items.description: Popcorn Chef 2 is a game where you master the art of making the perfect popcorn pot. With precise timing and careful measurement, add just the right amount of kernels to create a fluffy, delicious treat. Challenge yourself to achieve the perfect balance and become the ultimate popcorn connoisseur.

items.title: Poppit
items.description: Poppit is an awesome puzzle game in which you must match three or more of the same color balloon together and pop them to increase your score and decrease your stress levels! Simply click on a balloon and watch it pop - any balloon of the same color that is adjacent will also pop. Try to create big combos and pop as many balloons as possible in one go!

items.title: Pot Pelting
items.description: Pot Pelting is a delightful casual game where you embark on a gardening adventure by throwing plant seeds at pots, nurturing them with water, and defending them against pests to earn points and unlock exciting upgrades. Cultivate a variety of plants with special abilities and aim for high scores. Let's dive into the world of Pot Pelting!

items.title: Pottery Master
items.description: Pottery Master is a calming, creative journey where you sculpt, shape, and paint your way to ceramic perfection. Use your hands and tools to mold clay into beautiful forms, then bring them to life with color and detail. Each piece is a chance to relax, express yourself, and craft a masterpiece in soothing style.

items.title: Power Players: Defenders
items.description: Power Players: Defenders is a match-3 arcade game where you must assist Axel in his one-on-one combat against the invaders by employing your match-3 abilities. Madcap is attempting to seize control of the city using a vast number of evil toys, and it's your responsibility to put an end to his plan! Unlock additional characters and upgrade their abilities to confront numerous adversaries. Can you rise to the challenge and rescue the city?

items.title: The Prank King
items.description: The Prank King is a laugh-out-loud casual game where you step into the shoes of prankster Nick, the ultimate trickster on a mission to outwit Misty, the notoriously cranky Scary Teacher. Each level is a new adventure as you sneak around her house, setting up hilarious traps and creating chaos at every turn. Your goal? To catch Misty off guard and watch her reactions as she falls victim to your cleverly planned pranks. With tons of creative tricks to choose from, you’ll craft moments of pure comedy gold that will have Misty fuming and you grinning from ear to ear!

items.title: Pretty Tidy
items.description: Pretty Tidy is a relaxing organization game that lets you transform cluttered chaos into picture-perfect order. You’ll clean, sort, and arrange with care, turning messy spaces into calming scenes of peace. Whether you're chasing symmetry or simply unwinding, every tap brings you closer to a beautifully tidy escape designed to soothe your mind.

items.title: Project Restoration
items.description: Project Restoration is a cozy farm-adventure game set in a distinctive post-apocalyptic world. After 200 years of slumber, three charming robots awaken to find a humanless Earth filled with secrets and decay. With your help, they’ll revive nature, rebuild civilization, and uncover the truth behind humanity’s disappearance. Grow crops, gather resources, construct workshops, and bring warmth back to a forgotten world one vintage furnishing at a time.

items.title: Puckit!
items.description: Puckit! is a fast-paced game where you clear the board by knocking pucks into holes or bouncing opponents out of play. Navigate intense levels and sharpen your aim as you strategize to advance. Each challenge tests your precision, adding a unique twist to the classic puck battle experience.

items.title: Punch Hero
items.description: Punch Hero is an engaging and addictive idle clicker game that combines wall-breaking action with a hero's journey. In this game, players will find themselves in a magical world where they need to break through enchanted walls, unlock new levels, and steadily increase their power, all while encountering dragons and other fantastic challenges.

items.title: Pure Farm: Fresh Food
items.description: Pure Farm: Fresh Food is a relaxing farming simulation where you cultivate exotic crops, craft homemade treats, and build a thriving agricultural community. Embrace a peaceful, self-sufficient lifestyle as you work alongside friendly neighbors to grow fresh produce and create artisanal goods. Nurture your farm, connect with others, and enjoy the rewards of mindful farming.

items.title: Purr-fect Scoops
items.description: Welcome to Purr-fect Scoops, the ultimate ice cream adventure where adorable cats and delicious treats collide! In this delightful simulation game, you'll embark on a journey to run your ice cream shop, serving up scrumptious cones and cups to a charming menagerie of animal customers. With a plethora of flavors, toppings, and power-ups at your disposal, get ready to indulge in a purr-fectly sweet experience like no other!

items.title: Qube 2048
items.description: Qube 2048 is a fast-paced arcade game blending the iconic gameplay of Q*bert with the strategic number-merging of 2048. Start with the number 2 and navigate a grid of blocks, doubling your value with every move. Your objective? Reach the highest possible number by carefully planning your path and avoiding traps along the way.

items.title: Raccoon Retail
items.description: Raccoon Retail is a funny simulation game where you play as a raccoon who works in the supermarket as a janitor. Customers are constantly creating a mess, and it's your job to keep the store clean. Drive around the store, collect the trash, then dispose of it in the dumpster. The faster you clean, the more money you can earn to upgrade your retail store and boost your revenue. Keep the store tidy and watch your profits grow!

items.title: Racehorse Tycoon
items.description: Racehorse Tycoon is a management game that lets you try out the life of owning a racehorse and making money off of it! Choose between various horses with different stats that can be used in different situations, as well as the food they eat, the stable they stay in, their trainer, and the jock that'll ride them in races.

items.title: Racing Builder
items.description: Racing Builder is a casual strategy game that combines racing and customization to deliver an exciting and fast-paced experience. In this game, your goal is to adapt your vehicle on the fly by changing wheels, modifying the body, and adding improvements, all for free, while speeding through challenging tracks to outrun your opponent at every level.

items.title: Infection Town of Zombies
items.description: Infection Town of Zombies is a casual game where you become the boss of Zombie and destroy humans! Lead the ultimate Zombie Horde in a chaotic showdown! Control a powerful zombie and infect the humans to become your army. Upgrade your character and mutated zombies for maximum devastation. Battle civilians, policemen, and soldiers, each with unique fighting styles. Customize your strategy and conquer the city!

items.title: Ragdoll Archers
items.description: Ragdoll Archers is an archery game featuring bow and arrow-equipped stickmen with ragdoll physics. Fire arrows at a range of opponents while earning points to upgrade your abilities and ammunition. Play two-player PvP against your friend or team up with them to defeat a range of foes!

items.title: Ragdoll Arena 2 Player
items.description: Ragdoll Arena 2 Player is a fun casual arcade game that consists of 14 challenging 2-player games. Play these games by yourself versus AI or play with your friend locally. Each game will have a different goal, but your main goal is to score three before your opponent. Many games are available, such as fruit slicing, hammer challenge, chicken catching, rooftop shooting matches, and more. Earn coins from the matches, and buy a new costume for your character! Have fun!

items.title: Playground Man! Ragdoll Show!
items.description: Playground Man! Ragdoll Show! is a casual action 3D game with ragdoll physics where you enter a world of destruction. Get ready to tear apart a wooden stickman! Immerse yourself in a physics-based playground, smash obstacles, and relax while solving engaging puzzles.

items.title: Ragdoll Throw Challenge
items.description: Ragdoll Throw Challenge is a physics-based casual game where you control a wobbly character, help them grab weapons, and fling them at your enemies for ultimate chaos and fun! The gameplay is simple, but movements can be complex and challenging to master.

items.title: Rainbow Friends Survivors
items.description: Rainbow Friends Survivors is an action-packed adventure where you take control against a rising invasion. The Blue Monster and the Alpha Monster are leading the charge, and only you can stop them. Navigate each level, defeat enemies, or reprogram them to fight by your side. Use strategy and quick thinking to turn the tide in this thrilling battle!

items.title: Ram Cars
items.description: Ram Cars is a car battle game where you drive and smash an opponent's car by drawing a line. This game offers 3D graphics, different arenas, multiple challenges, upgrades, and rewards! Draw the line to move your car. While planning your path, you will also see the trajectory of the enemy. That is where you need to think fast to react and coordinate your moving direction well to be rammed right into your opponent. The best hits are when you T-bone your opponent, which is not so easy to do! Don't forget to also upgrade your car's health and strength. More health equals harder to smash, and more strength means that a well-planned hit could destroy another fighter in one blow.

items.title: Ramp Bike Jumping
items.description: Ramp Bike Jumping is a stunt game that defies gravity and allows you to perform jaw-dropping tricks on a bike, motorcycle, skateboard, or even plane! Experience the thrill of defying the laws of physics as you jump and flip through the air with abandon. Get ready for an adrenaline-packed adventure filled with pure fun and utter madness in this high-flying, action-packed gaming experience! YEE-HAW!

items.title: Ramp Car Jumping
items.description: Ramp Car Jumping is a casual driving game where you send your car flying off a huge ramp, crashing into various obstacles. Smash through everything in your path, do flips, and fly as far as you can! Buy vehicles and unlock new tracks when you reach each target.

items.title: Red Bounce Ball 5
items.description: Guide the cute red ball to collect the star coins while avoiding deadly obstacles and solve tricky puzzles along the way.

items.title: Reply Run
items.description: Reply Run is a fun and engaging game where you swipe left and right to collect the right words and reply to text messages. Test your skills in composing the perfect responses while you navigate through the game. Can you master the art of texting on the run?

items.title: Rescue Throw
items.description: Rescue Throw is an arcade game in which you must throw the patient to the ambulance. Aim in the right direction, avoid any obstacles, and collect coins as you throw the stickman. Can you rescue the patient?

items.title: Retro Battle
items.description: Retro Gamer is a casual game featuring several fun retro minigames. Challenge your opponents in the street to various 2-player battles on retro gaming classics. Unlock new games as you earn more victories!

items.title: Rhino Rush Stampede
items.description: Rhino Rush Stampede is an endless running game with cool power-ups, epic upgrades, and cartoonish graphics. Collect delicious fruit and run for as long as you can!

items.title: Right Jump
items.description: Right Jump is an exciting casual platformer game that tests your agility and strategy! In Right Jump, timing is everything—jump at the perfect moment to navigate through tricky platforms, elevators, trampolines, and moving obstacles. Can you reach the end of each level?

items.title: Riot Escape
items.description: Riot Escape is an action game where you play as part of an escapee mob or a cop. Escapees must reach the end of the map without being stopped by the police. If you’re a cop, then you stop the mob from escaping!

items.title: Road Master 3D
items.description: Road Master 3D is a dynamic construction game where you take charge of creating and expanding city infrastructure. Dig through the terrain, break pavement, and construct roads to transform your surroundings. With each project, you’ll shape a thriving urban environment while tackling challenges that test your planning and building skills.

items.title: Road Turn
items.description: In Road Turn, a fun one-button car game, your job is to direct the traffic. Prevent traffic accidents by controlling when the cars can turn onto the highway.

items.title: Robbie: Game Challenges
items.description: Robbie: Game Challenges is a simulation game where you step Into the ultimate arcade adventure! Dive into a vibrant world of arcade machines, where every moment is packed with fun and surprises. Play dozens of unique mini-games, tackle thrilling challenges, and collect tickets to unlock rare pets or gain access to even more exciting machines.

items.title: Robo Runner
items.description: Robo Runner is a casual game where you play as a transforming robot. Battle various enemies and transform into new machines as you progress. Overcome the obstacles on each level and reach the finish line!

items.title: Robot Dinosaurs That Shoot Beams
items.description: Robot Dinosaurs That Shoot Beams When They Roar is an arcade game where you control a flying laser-shooting dinosaur to eliminate all the incoming enemies

items.title: Robot Unicorn Attack: Heavy Metal
items.description: Robot Unicorn Attack: Heavy Metal is an awesome and intense game in which you must control an epic robot unicorn and guide it through the hellish fantasy land. Your unicorn moves forward automatically – you must simply control the creatures jumping ability and power dashes. You must time your jump and dashes perfectly and avoid crashing into any objects or falling off of the platforms.

items.title: Robots Backpack
items.description: Robots Backpack is a high-octane action-strategy game where you place the robot into the slot, merge, and battle powerful mechs in a war-torn future. Step into the role of a rogue operator who discovers a mysterious backpack capable of summoning and combining robotic units into devastating war machines.

items.title: Rock Buster 3D
items.description: Rock Buster 3D is a casual game where you drive a tank and blast away rocks to reach new lands. The rocks get tougher to break as you progress, so use the available upgrades to help you smash through to the next zone!

items.title: Rocket Boom: Space Destroy 3D
items.description: Rocket Boom: Space Destroy 3D is a casual rocket launch game with a cool customization system where you can adjust your rocket ability and launch it to destroy the planet. The cool thing is that all the changes you make are reflected in the rocket's appearance itself. It can be thicker with powerful blasts but weaker in fuel, or vice versa. Find the perfect balance and create your own unique rocket. Destroy cities and continents to conquer the entire galaxy!

items.title: Rocket Well
items.description: Rocket Well is a casual game that challenges players to stick rockets to their ragdoll character and ascend from a deep well. Your mission is to guide the character, strategically using boosters to rise higher and overcome obstacles. However, be cautious about managing your fuel range to ensure a successful ascent.

items.title: Rocking Sky Trip
items.description: Rocking Sky Trip is an exciting endless running game in which you must control a rolling ball through a series of platforms and obstacles. This might sound easy, but the gameplay is fast-paced and the obstacles come thick and fast. If you hit any obstacle on the level then you have to restart – your reactions have to be really quick and you have to keep moving and swerving at all times!

items.title: Rodha
items.description: Rodha is a 2d platformer, in which you have to hop through different levels to reach your destination.

items.title: Roller Coaster Rush
items.description: Roller Coaster Rush: Experience the thrill of a lifetime in this adrenaline-pumping casual game. Strap yourself in and prepare for an exhilarating ride as you navigate through twists, turns, and loops. Maintain a steady pace to keep the roller coaster from overheating, while enjoying the breathtaking scenery. Feel the rush of excitement as you approach the finish line with a smile on your face. Get ready for a heart-pounding adventure that will leave you craving for more!

items.title: Rolling Balls Space Race
items.description: Rolling Balls Space Race is a high-speed sci-fi showdown where glowing tracks wind through the stars and precision is everything. Race solo or with a friend as you control a blazing ball, time your jumps perfectly, and dodge spaceborne obstacles. With dazzling visuals and intense reflex-based action, it’s a cosmic thrill ride to the finish.

items.title: Rooney On The Rampage
items.description: Rooney on the Rampage is an arcade game that lets you play as Wayne Rooney. He was thrown a red card, and he isn't too happy about that, so he goes on a rampage, with anyone in the way just a target for his headbutt. The key to this game is to time your headbutts perfectly to keep your momentum going.

items.title: Rough Ball
items.description: Rough Ball is a multiplayer platform game that tests your skills with its unique bouncy jump mechanic. Master creative moves and cool tricks as you navigate challenging levels designed to keep you on edge. Whether you're a speedrun enthusiast or looking to sharpen your reflexes, Rough Ball offers intense gameplay for all types of players. Compete with friends or join with players worldwide. Collect gold throughout tricky levels and unlock awesome ball skins in the in-game shop to personalize your experience. Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled adventure!

items.title: Run Desnecessauro
items.description: Run with Desnecessauro takes you on a wild adventure with Desnecessauro. Help Desnecessauro pursue Coitadossauro and find the most creative ways to "destroy" his unlucky best friend. Dodge obstacles or blow them up, whichever suits your mood! Customize Desnecessauro with your favorite outfits, collect funny in-game photos, and enjoy the quirky voices and jokes that add to the fun. Unlock achievements as you explore all the crazy antics and laugh-out-loud moments. What are you waiting for? It's time to RUN with Desnecessauro and experience the madness!

items.title: Rush Hour
items.description: Rush Hour is a high-speed racing adventure where every street becomes a thrilling challenge. Navigate busy urban traffic, pushing your reflexes and skills to the limit with each drift and daring maneuver. Embrace the adrenaline, master every sharp turn, and prove you have what it takes to reign as the ultimate champion of speed!

items.title: Sandwich Burger
items.description: Sandwich Burger is a fast-paced cooking game where you race against the clock to craft perfect burgers for hungry customers. Assemble each order quickly before tempers rise and tables empty. Compete in a sizzling championship, earn rewards, and test how many burgers you can serve under pressure in the ultimate burger showdown.

items.title: Sbaloon
items.description: Sbaloon is a fast-paced arcade shooter where you blast bouncing bubbles, upgrade your cannon, and fight to survive! Take control, pop endlessly, and build unstoppable combos in a colorful, chaotic world.

items.title: Scavenger Hunt - Hidden Items
items.description: Scavenger Hunt Game is a hidden object adventure where you search for items through unique levels. Test your detective skills as you uncover hidden treasures and unlock new areas. Challenge your brain and eyesight to find hidden objects in a relaxing yet engaging puzzle experience. Enjoy the journey and make your mark in the quest.

items.title: Scoring Champion
items.description: Scoring Champion is a dynamic sports game where you take on multiple disciplines like soccer, basketball, American football, and more. Your objective is to score with precision and power, hitting targets at each level. Earn coins for every successful shot and use them to upgrade your skills, equipment, and boost your earnings as you aim to become the ultimate champion!

items.title: Screamals
items.description: Screamals is a quirky casual game where you stretch and squish your character to dodge obstacles and collect notes. Pull up to grow tall and slim, or pull down to get short and wide—each move is key to survival. Use your shape-shifting skills to outsmart barriers and unleash a musical blast on the final boss.

items.title: Shape Crusher
items.description: Shape Crusher is an arcade-style shooter where you shoot various shapes and build your score. Upgrade your weapons progressively and unlock new ships with greater starting power. Jump into the chaotic shooting action!

items.title: Shape Shooter 3
items.description: Shape Shooter 3 is an intense survival game that pits you against a variety of shape enemies, each with unique abilities. Upgrade your weapons as you progress to make your ship more powerful. Customize your build and challenge tougher stages by scoring over 10000.

items.title: Ship Ramp Jumping
items.description: Ship Ramp Jumping is an action-packed game where you steer massive ships down giant ramps for spectacular crashes. It's not about sinking ships; it's about pushing them to the limit and watching the glorious chaos unfold. Command a variety of vessels, navigate through thrilling locations, and jump aircraft carriers off headlands for epic carnage. Who needs realistic games when you can smash ships in downtown Manhattan? Test your skill and beat gravity to reach your destination. Get ready for a thrilling ride!

items.title: Shoot Mine Upgrade Repeat
items.description: Shoot Mine Upgrade Repeat is a bounce-powered mining challenge where every shot counts. Fire one of six upgradable bullets—like banana bombs or ghost rounds—and shatter rocks for points and loot. Earn cash, hit the shop for wild gear, and dive deeper into the mine each round. Precision, upgrades, and ricochets decide how far your legacy will go.

items.title: Shop Master 3D
items.description: Shop Master 3D is a simulation game where you take charge of your very own clothing store. Manage every aspect of your shop, from setting up stands and stocking racks to upgrading your layout and expanding your brand selection.

items.title: Shopping Sort
items.description: Shopping Sort is a casual game where you become a savvy shopper, hunting down unbeatable deals and maximizing your savings. Compare prices, utilize coupons, and strategize to snag the best bargains. Master the art of frugal spending and watch your savings grow as you conquer the shopping world. Happy saving!

items.title: Shot Blaster
items.description: Shot Blaster is an arcade game to create your custom gun and shot all the stickmen who are running toward you. Kill them all to complete the level!

items.title: Shovel 3D
items.description: Shovel 3D is an arcade game where you shovel up snow into a giant ball and smash it through walls. At the end of each round whatever is left of your snowball is used to smash targets for bonus points.

items.title: Singing Horses
items.description: Singing Horses is a fun music game that lets you create a beautiful music arrangement from the four Swedish singing horses.

items.title: Skeleton Simulator
items.description: Skeleton Simulator is a simulation game created and developed by Andres Adendaal of Wireframe. In this little science experiment, take control of the skeleton's different points of articulation and see how it changes the way a human walks with those changes. You can even add another skeleton to see their funny interactions!

items.title: Sky Balls 3D
items.description: Sky Balls 3D is an exhilarating two-player casual sports game where you test your reactions and reflexes by guiding a ball on a narrow track thousands of meters in the sky, sometimes with guardrails... and sometimes not. You aim to keep the ball on track and avoid obstacles, traps, and gaps. While high in the sky, you not only have to avoid falling, but the real challenge is to do so while collecting coins and keys to unlock new ball skins and sky-boxes. Enjoy simple controls, stunning 3D graphics, and a choice of 1-player or 2-player modes across hundreds of challenging levels.

items.title: Slap and Run
items.description: Slap and Run is a fast-paced arcade game where your goal is simple—slap as many unsuspecting pedestrians as you can and outrun the chaos that follows. Dodge obstacles, weave through streets, and stay just ahead of the growing mob. Every slap adds to the madness, so keep moving if you want to stay in the game!

items.title: Slap Castle
items.description: Slap Castle is a funny arcade game to slap all the enemies and the king to conquer the kingdom!

items.title: Slice Arena
items.description: Slice Arena is a casual game where genetically tweaked fruits and veggies are out to munch on you! Only your culinary mastery can bring order back. Immerse yourself in captivating gameplay, acquiring a repertoire of culinary skills and upgrades. Hone your slicing talents to survive this veggie rebellion!

items.title: Slice It All!
items.description: Slice It All! is a thrilling game where you flip a sharp knife to slice through obstacles with precision. Tap at the perfect moment to cut items like pencils, pipes, and anvils cleanly in half. Sharpen your timing skills and enjoy the satisfying challenge of splitting everything in your path with style!

items.title: Slice Master
items.description: Slice Master is a casual one-person game whose goal is to slice everything in sight, well, almost everything.

items.title: Slime Conquer: Epic Battles
items.description: Slime Conquer: Epic Battle is a casual arcade game where you play as a slime blob who must defeat humankind and conquer the island. Control the blob through the endless enemies and become the conqueror! You will start small at first and will grow big as you progress. Be as big as possible to defeat the boss. Hunt all the creatures that are smaller than you and grow bigger to defeat the enemies. Overcome all the obstacles and win the battle with the boss at the end of the round!

items.title: Slime Jumper
items.description: Slime Jumper is a casual yet challenging 2D precision platformer that puts your skills to the test. Featuring a unique Jump-Only control system, this game delivers a fresh twist on platforming by limiting the player's input to just two buttons for maximum simplicity and precision.

items.title: Slime Knight
items.description: Slime Knight is a 2D platform game where you must reach the exit door in an ancient castle. You will control a knight that will be moving automatically, and all you have to do is jump and throw the sword to destroy the obstacles in front of you.

items.title: Slingshot Crash
items.description: Slingshot Crash is a thrilling game where you use a slingshot to launch cars and cause maximum damage. The more destruction you create, the more in-game money you earn to upgrade traffic, explosions, and more. Unleash your creativity to keep the chaos going and see just how far you can push the limits of destruction!

items.title: Slingshot Fortress
items.description: Slingshot Fortress is a casual destroy 2D action game that turns every shot into a flashback of your younger, more menacing days. Get ready to shoot stones, bombs, and shurikens, and let your slingshot shine as you smash through towering fortresses to uncover and defeat sneaky hidden creatures. Each level takes you to vibrant, ever-changing landscapes—from lush forests to icy tundras. Slingshot Fortress is the ultimate test of your aim and ingenuity. Sling, smash, and conquer in this nostalgic game.

items.title: Slingshot Stunt Driver & Sport
items.description: Slingshot Stunt Driver & Sport is a sports car game where you morph cars into planes, embracing the ultimate thrill of aerial stunts. Adjust slingshot strength, pick your launch direction, and witness the chaos as your car takes flight. Skillfully navigate the skies, aiming for precision landings amidst challenging terrain. It's not just about driving – it's about becoming the fearless stuntman of your dreams.

items.title: Slope Car
items.description: Slope Car is an arcade game to drive your car on a randomized slope and go as far as possible. This game is a combination ofCrazy Roll 3Dand driving a car.

items.title: Smarty Bubbles
items.description: Smarty Bubbles is a match-3 bubble shooting game with fun and relaxing gameplay. Shoot the bubbles at the matching colors and enjoy popping them all away. Your urge to pop bubbles will be satisfied by playing this game for free, here.

items.title: Snake Blockade
items.description: Snake Blockade is a casual snake game where you collect points to grow your snake. Use points to crush the blockade. Don't lose all your snake points, or the game will be over!

items.title: Snake Merge: Idle & io Zone
items.description: Snake Merge: Idle & io Zone is a combination of an arcade snake and merges game. Play a snake game where you must eat as much food as possible to grow longer and try to beat other players’ snakes. Survive as long as you can! Unlock new skins by merging the same characters. Many cool skins are waiting for you to unlock!

items.title: Snake Shooter: Tower Battle
items.description: Snake Shooter: Tower Battle is a fast-paced casual defense game where you use precise archery skills to take on a massive creeping dragon. Aim, shoot, and upgrade your bow to fend off relentless attacks. Unlock powerful abilities like fire arrows and multi-shot to strengthen your defenses. With vibrant visuals and nonstop action, every battle tests your strategy and reflexes.

items.title: Snake VS Block
items.description: Snake VS Block is a fast-paced arcade game where you guide a growing snake to smash through waves of numbered bricks. Collect extra balls to extend your snake and ramp up the destruction. Easy to pick up but tough to master, this game dares you to chase ever-higher scores in an endless test of reflexes and strategy.

items.title: Snakes and Ladders
items.description: Snakes and Ladders is a casual online game adapted from the English board game of the same name, which influenced the American version of Chutes and Ladders. This much-loved classic board game is free to play single-player or locally with friends. Roll the dice and make your way to the top. Hopefully, you don’t land on a snake!

items.title: Sneak In 3D
items.description: Sneak In 3D is an action game where you must take all the money in the vault. Test yourself and demonstrate your awesome effective fighting skills to beat all the guards in the bank.

items.title: Sneaker Art
items.description: Sneaker Art is a creative casual art game where you become a pro sneaker designer. Grab your paintbrush, unleash your imagination, and craft unique shoe designs. Choose from a variety of laces, showcase your artwork, and sell your masterpieces in your sneaker shop. Pack your custom sneakers in stylish boxes and grow your business with every sale!

items.title: Snow Farm Happy New Year
items.description: Snow Farm Happy New Year is a casual game where Santa, Rudolph, and friends await. Care for magical creatures, build a jolly township, and craft gifts in Christmas factories. Complete orders with Rudolph's sleigh, decorate with festive flair and ensure Santa is ready for the merriest season. Embrace the holiday spirit in this enchanting snowy farm adventure!

items.title: Soccer Dash
items.description: Soccer Dash is a casual soccer game where you play as the ball. Aim and control the soccer ball around obstacles and other players trying to obstruct you until the end. The game will go into a slow-motion state when you choose the direction of the kick, so take your time.

items.title: Soccer Merge
items.description: Soccer Merge is a fun and casual football game where you combine strategy and skill to build the ultimate team. The goal of the game is to earn money by winning competitions, attract the best players to your side, and create your ideal football team. Prove you're the best athlete and coach by passing challenges, scoring more goals than your opponents, and assembling the strongest squad. Compete in exciting online tournaments against players worldwide, testing your tactics and reflexes. As a coach, buy new players, upgrade them, and unlock special football attributes in the unique merge gameplay. With an in-depth development system, multiple tactical schemes, and regular championships with valuable prizes, Soccer Merge offers endless football action and strategic fun!

items.title: Solar System Scope
items.description: Solar System Scope is a fun way of exploring and discovering the solar system and outer space. This game will bring you closer to the furthest reaches of our world and lets you experience lots of fantastic space sceneries.

items.title: Solitaire Crime Stories
items.description: Solitaire Crime Stories is a casual solitaire game where you delve into the mysteries of Springdale, a seemingly tranquil town hiding dark secrets. Join journalist Lana Whitt and her assistant Bill as you solve crimes by mastering Solitaire. Explore unique locations, meet intriguing characters, and unravel the town's enigmatic puzzles. Plus, enjoy bonding with Max, the adorable kitten companion, in between investigations. Ready to become a Solitaire master and detective extraordinaire?

items.title: Spa Empire
items.description: Spa Empire is a vibrant idle arcade adventure where you build the ultimate relaxation haven from the ground up. Manage soothing massages, bold hair makeovers, and trendy treatments while expanding to beach retreats and forest sanctuaries. Upgrade facilities, train your dream team, and personalize your spa with stylish décor to keep guests glowing—and your empire growing.

items.title: Space City - Build Your Empire
items.description: Space City Build Your Empire is a short building game set on an alien planet. Your goal is to extract the resources necessary to fuel your ship and leave. Expand your production, build new technologies, and beware of thieves!

items.title: Space Colony
items.description: Space Colony is a casual game where you need to extract resources to develop your colony and explore the new planet. These resources include iron, titanium, and other materials that can be gathered from the planet's surface. You can use these resources to build structures, create vehicles, and power your colony as you venture further into space.

items.title: Space Pizza
items.description: Space Pizza is a lighthearted action game where you build your base, gather space mushrooms, and deal with pesky intruders along the way. Balance base-building with simple combat as you explore the quirky side of outer space and expand your operations, one mushroom at a time.

items.title: Space Swarm
items.description: Space Swarm is a challenging arcade game that tests your survival skills. You're the only hope for the last space station against the ruthless alien invasion. Upgrade your defenses and match the enemy's strength. Can you protect the station and save humanity?

items.title: Space Waves
items.description: Space Waves is an arcade game where you need to control an arrow to avoid obstacles until you get to the end. There are 33 levels to the game, and you can choose any level you want to play at any time. All levels vary in difficulty and are labeled accordingly with faces; this way you get to decide how courageous you want to be.

items.title: SpaceCraft Noob: Return to Earth
items.description: SpaceCraft Noob: Return to Earth is a casual adventure game where you become an astronaut and find yourself stranded on an alien planet after a spaceship crash. Your mission? Explore diverse biomes, gather vital resources, and construct advanced factories. Your ultimate goal is to build a rocket and make your way back home. Guide Noob in this cosmic journey filled with challenges and discoveries!

items.title: Spank The Monkey
items.description: Spank the Monkey is a game that's really exactly as it sounds - you just spank the heck out of the monkey. "How is that any fun?", you may ask, well, spanking that monkey gives you a score. Each spank is scored based on the speed you spanked it. Still confused? Try it out. It's simple and fun, but is totally addicting. Here's a little secret, you get a bit of fanfare if you go over a certain score.

items.title: Spirit Guardians
items.description: Spirit Guardians is a tower defense game where you summon elemental spirits and strategically place them to defend your base from waves of enemies. Master the three spirit elements, fire, water, and plant, to build the ultimate defense.

items.title: Spooky Park
items.description: Spooky Park is a casual simulation game that puts you in charge of a creepy and mysterious amusement park. In this game, you'll take on the role of the park owner, responsible for designing and managing a theme park that offers spine-tingling experiences to thrill-seeking visitors. If you enjoy simulation games that are a little out of the ordinary, "Spooky Park" offers a captivating journey into the world of thrilling and eerie amusement!

items.title: Sprunki
items.description: Sprunki is a casual music game that lets you craft unique soundscapes. This modded version of Incredibox by NyankoBfLolCombine gives you DJ control to mix loops, vocals, beats, and melodies—pretty much create your own musical style. The game features vibrant characters and sounds for a completely immersive experience full of rhythmic possibilities. Whether you're a music enthusiast or just love experimenting, it’s a fun and engaging way to express your creativity.

items.title: Squad Assembler: Red vs Blue
items.description: Squad Assembler: Red vs Blue is an engaging merge battle game where strategy meets creativity. Build and customize your squad to dominate intense battles, merging weapons, armor, and equipment to enhance your fighters. Design unique characters with special skills, turning them into powerful cyborg warriors to outwit the enemy.

items.title: Square Bird
items.description: Square Bird is a side-scrolling 2D platform game. Your bird will build a tower of square eggs to avoid danger whenever you click. It's a simple and fun game!

items.title: Squishy Fruits
items.description: Squishy Fruits is an arcade game where you must merge the same variety of fruits to make them pop. Combine and squish your favorite fruits with a simple click! This game offers a squishy twist on the classic merge game. Get ready to have a fruity fun experience by merging and squishing fruits!

items.title: SSSPICY!
items.description: SSSPICY! is an arcade game to help the hungry snake eat all the spicy pepper!

items.title: Stack Colors
items.description: Stack colors is a hypercasual game where you move side to side to collect colored blocks. Stack as many colors as possible and kick them over the finish line with as much force as you can for a big reward multiplier!

items.title: Knife Master: Ball Racing
items.description: Knife Master: Ball Racing is a fast-paced casual sports game where you juggle a ball while throwing knives higher and higher. The ball rebounds off the knife handles as you aim to keep it airborne. Test your reflexes by tossing knives quickly and avoiding the ball's path. How far can you climb without breaking the rhythm?

items.title: Stack Fall
items.description: Stack Fall is a casual sports game where your goal is to destroy every floor by striking the correct colored blocks. Be precise, as the ball shatters on mismatches. Build up the gauge to unleash fever mode, smashing through all barriers effortlessly. Stay focused, strategize your hits, and master the art of destruction!

items.title: Stacky Bird
items.description: Stacky Bird is a hyper-casual arcade game where you stack eggs to avoid obstacles. Lay egg towers and dash to avoid crashing your bird. Progress through the colorful levels, fly to new worlds, and enjoy the rewards!

items.title: State Wars: Conquer Them All
items.description: State Wars: Conquer Them All is a casual battle game where you merge troops and send them to war with other nation-states. Build an army of super soldiers and obliterate enemy territories to claim more land for your people and win the war!

items.title: Steal Brainrot Online
items.description: Steal Brainrot Online is a fast-paced, casual heist game where you collect rare Brainrot memes like Tralalero Tralala and Cappuccino Assassino, straight from the popularItalian Brainrot Clicker Game. You can buy Braintorts from the red carpet, sneak into other players’ bases to steal theirs, and protect your own with traps and locks. Use boosters, outbid opponents during deliveries, and rebirth for bigger rewards as you climb the leaderboard.

items.title: Steam City
items.description: Steam City is a casual building game that transports you to a world where Victorian charm meets futuristic innovation. As the newly appointed mayor renowned for your achievements in steam technology research, you will design and develop a unique city filled with sprawling infrastructure, beautiful buildings, and industrious citizens. With the help of your assistant, Agatha, and a cast of brilliant engineers like the self-taught Ida, you’ll bring your creative vision of progress to life while balancing the city’s needs and resources.

items.title: Steve's World
items.description: Steve’s World is a simple adventure platformer game where you control the brave hero Steve. Take Steve to the end of each level while dodging enemies and collecting gold and items.

items.title: Stick Crush
items.description: Stick Crush is an exhilarating casual physics game that tests your reactions and skills! Start by revving your car, crashing into obstacles, and launching your stick character into the sky. Once airborne, navigate challenges, dodge obstacles, and take down enemies with precise maneuvers.

items.title: Stick Figure Penalty 2
items.description: Stick Figure Penalty 2 is an animation killing game with 15 ways to kill the prisoner. Prepare yourself to see the bloody animation from this game.

items.title: Sticker Art
items.description: Sticker Art is a fun casual game that lets you unleash your creativity and make unique stickers. Customize various sticker shapes and designs with colors and patterns, then save and share your creations with friends. With a user-friendly interface suitable for all ages, this game has a delightful experience for kids and adults alike. Explore pre-made templates, or let your imagination roam freely! There are endless possibilities to express your creativity in this game.

items.title: Stickman Army: Team Battle
items.description: Stickman Army Team Battle is a cool stickman fighter game in which you must fight against another stickman army and try to eliminate the enemy team's leader. Your actions are slightly random as each turn you have to spin a slot machine - depending on what the slots land on will depend on what attacks and damage you do.

items.title: Stickman Army: The Resistance
items.description: Stickman Army: The Resistance is a cool fighting defense game in which you must control two stickmen soldiers and try to survive for as long as possible. Each stickman character covers one side of their defensive tower and you must switch between both defenders to prevent your position from being overrun. You start with basic weapons and defenses and you must unlock new equipment as you progress.

items.title: Stickman battle 1-4 Players
items.description: Stickman battle 1-4 Players is a lively collection of dynamic action games where you battle with spinning weapons, score thrilling goals, race to the finish, and survive challenging levels. Jump into quick rounds or tournaments spanning several matches. Play solo or with up to three friends or bots, customize your cars, faces, and colors, and enjoy nonstop fun together.

items.title: Stickman Bow
items.description: Stickman Bow is a fun and straightforward archery game where you guide a stickman with a bow and arrow to hit targets across challenging levels.

items.title: Stickman: Dinosaur Arena
items.description: Stickman: Dinosaur Arena is a casual game where you lead a squad of powerful dinosaurs into battle. Strengthen your team, unlock new species, and upgrade your current lineup to dominate the battlefield. Push your limits and rise through the ranks to become the ultimate Dino Commander!

items.title: Stickman That One Level
items.description: Stickman That One Level is a casual game with puzzle elements where you need to escape a trap-filled prison. Find the key and open 100 doors to make your escape!

items.title: Stickman Zombie Escape
items.description: Stickman Zombie Escape is a casual platform game where you must pass level after level to get out of the dungeon. Be careful since there are a lot of zombies and traps around. Use your parkour skills and jump on the blocks. Destroy and avoid everything that gets in your way. Stickman has been waiting for freedom, get out soon!

items.title: Stone Grass: Mowing Simulator
items.description: Stone Grass: Mowing Simulator is a relaxing yet addictive game where you take control of a powerful mower and transform wild fields into perfectly trimmed landscapes. Glide smoothly through thick overgrowth, clearing grass with satisfying precision.

items.title: Store Manager
items.description: Store Manager is a casual game where you build your retail empire, starting from a small mini-mart and expanding into a supermarket business. Sell various goods, including vegetables, high-quality fish and meat, perfume, and electronics. Aim to fill customers' shopping carts and watch your profits soar!

items.title: Street Food Simulator
items.description: Street Food Simulator is a fast-paced cooking adventure where you run a food truck and serve up sizzling dishes on the go. Take orders, cook delicious meals, and satisfy hungry customers to earn cash and unlock upgrades.
