Enabling the speed boost lets you be faster than your opponents, so you can try to trick them to bump into you, but, at the same time, it consumes your mass, so using it requires balance and attention.

items.title: Wormate.io
items.description: Wormate is a simple enough online game for anyone to learn. You eat, you grow, and you survive. Look out for other players, especially when you get bigger, as they'll want to eat all the food you drop. The advantage of being big is that you can trap smaller worms by circling them.

items.title: Worms.Zone
items.description:
WormsZone.io is survival of the fittest. You're a worm, and you must eat and grow to be big and strong. Who knew being a worm could be so much fun? Try to trap your opponents so you can get all of their delicious food.
Pressing the left or right mouse button allows you to turbo-speed your worm. Use it sparingly and tactically to sprint ahead of the other players and secure big rewards, but be advised: the more you use your turbo, the faster your worm shrinks.
As you get larger, you get slower. Turbo also becomes more costly for your score, so use it sparingly when you are big and plentifully when you are small.
Be aware that upgrades you can buy in the menu don't make your worm perform better in the arena, but improve the effectiveness and/or duration of the power-ups found while playing, so don't be tricked by those.

items.title: Mahjongg
items.description:
Your objective is to clear the virtual board of all tiles by matching up pairs. When you find two tiles that have the same pattern, you click on one and click on the matching one, causing them to disappear from the board.
There are four tiles for each character, with the exception of flows and seasons, which are one-of-a-kind tiles. Tiles with an exact match must be matched with the same patterned tile. Flowers can be matched with any flower. Seasons can be matched with any season.
Each tile has a specific character or symbol, and you must select two free tiles with the same character to remove them from the board. It gets tricky when tiles are "locked." A tile is considered "locked" when it has a tile on both sides of it. A tile is considered "free" when it has no tiles on top of it and at least one of its sides is not blocked by another tile.

items.title: Mahjongg Solitaire
items.description:
Spot the patterns
Mahjong is a tricky puzzle game. There are so many tiles, many of which look the same but feature slight differences. Along with the need to spot these patterns, you can’t move any pieces with both sides blocked. The left or right side needs to be accessible, at least.
Finding a couple of “free” tiles is the challenge here, with a tile-free being when there are no tiles on top of it. In addition, either its left or right side needs to be open. In this version of Mahjong Solitaire, you can look at the top of your screen to understand how many pairs of tiles are “free” to be matched, plus you can match the special tiles, those with a colored background, anytime.
Use hints when you’re stuck
Mahjongg Solitaire features hints if you get stuck, but unlike some other mahjong games, it does not have a shuffle feature. The games are also timed, meaning there is some urgency to how many tiles you can match.
When the game ends, you’ll get a score for the tiles you matched and a bonus for how far you got in the game before your time ran out.

items.title: Onet Connect Classic
items.description:
In Onet Connect, your objective is to connect tiles by matching pairs. You get to choose what type of board you want to play on. Choose from cute animals, tasty candies, or juicy fruits, and keep matching until the board is fully cleared. Inspired byclassic mahjong, Onet Connect takes a fresh approach to pairing games. Each mode comes with the same rules but provides a different visual twist, so you can switch up the theme while honing your skills.
You can match tiles that are side by side, and initially, you will have to do to begin making a bit of board space. Once you have some of the board clear, you can match any tiles that may not be side by side but instead have blank space between the two.
Quick thinking is essential, especially because there is a ticking clock breathing down your neck—but don’t worry—there’s a hint option to lend a hand if you get stuck!
If you’re new to Onet Connect or need a refresher on how the pieces link, simply hit pause and click the question mark icon. This feature provides a clear visual guide to help you understand the connection mechanics, ensuring you can tackle even the trickiest boards with confidence.
Winning a round grants you extra points to boost your score, as well as additional shuffles. These shuffles let you rearrange the board when you’re struggling to find matches, opening up new possibilities. Plus, you have access to three hints, each one showing two connectable pieces to help you out of tough spots. Use them wisely—they’re free but limited!
The levels in Onet Connect gradually increase in difficulty, testing both your speed and your strategy. As you progress, you’ll be challenged to match faster, spot connections more efficiently, and use your shuffles and hints more strategically. It’s the ultimate test of your concentration and quick reflexes, inviting you to keep improving and setting high scores. Dive in and see if you can master every mode, conquer the timer, and reach the highest levels in this addictive matching adventure!

items.title: Piles of Mahjong
items.description:
Piles of Mahjong brings a fresh twist to the classic Mahjong formula with some exciting new dynamics. The game has most of the same foundational rules as a classic game of tablemahjong, but instead of simply matching two tiles, your goal is to match three tiles from a pile featuring a mix of familiar patterns like circles and sticks, alongside fun new additions like bird and panda heads. To make a match, you must select tiles by clicking on them, and they’ll move to one of the seven empty spaces at the bottom of the screen.
But be careful! If you fill all seven spaces without making any triple matches, it’s game over. Strategic thinking is essential to clear the pile and avoid running out of space.
The game offers helpful features to assist you when you’re stuck, but they come with a price. You can reshuffle the tiles with 300 reward points or by watching an ad, flip all the tiles face up for the same cost, or even auto-match tiles in the bottom row with 100 reward points or an ad.
To add to the challenge, you start with two chances to remove a tile from the bottom area. Once those chances are used up, you will need to spend 100 reward points or watch an ad to earn another set of removals. These are useful if you are close to filling up your bottom spaces or if you find some tiles to pair with no space to move them to.
With its engaging twists and strategic layers, Piles of Mahjong tests your puzzle-solving skills while adding a bit of pressure to every move you make!

items.title: War Mahjong
items.description:
There are two layers of tiles stacked on top of each other in War Mahjong. Your goal is to clear tiles that are the same and beside each other until all the tiles have disappeared. You clear them by clicking on groups of the same tile. When you clear tiles from the second layer it creates blank space that causes the tiles above to fall in their place. This can potentially create a combo effect.
When you get combos, you'll earn bombs. A combo happens when you match tiles, and it creates a cascading effect that leads to more tiles being matched.
The bombs are vital for end-game play, as you can use them to clear any tile when you have no matches left.

items.title: Bloxd.io
items.description: Bloxd.io is a sandbox game in which you navigate challenging obstacle courses by timing your jumps and movements accurately. In survival mode, you gather resources, craft tools, and fend off enemies to stay alive. There are several game modes to choose from to start the game, each with a variety of challenges.

items.title: CubeCraft: Merge & Battle
items.description:
Step into a vibrant pixelated world where your mission is clear: defend the Noob village from relentless waves of invading enemies. To survive, you’ll need to merge characters pairing identical warriors, animals, and skeletons—to create stronger, tougher fighters. Each round gives you only a limited number of moves to merge and plan your defenses before the battle begins, so every decision matters.
Types of Fighters:
🗡️Warrior- Brave and bold frontline defenders.
🐾Animal- Quick and nimble fighters with surprising strength.
💀Skeleton- Fearless undead who can take a serious beating.
Win battles to earn reward money, then use it to unlock new fighters by choosing from three random options at the bottom of the screen. Merge strategically and position your units wisely—placement is just as important as power. As you advance, enemies will become faster, tougher, and far more relentless, so you’ll need to stay sharp and keep upgrading your army to survive.
Game Tips

items.title: Noob Miner 2: Escape From Prison
items.description:
You’ve been caught stealing diamond apples... again! Now you’re locked up in a prison, forced to toil away in the mine as part of your punishment. But this isn't just any ordinary prison labor—there’s more at stake here than just digging for ores. You need to stay sharp and well-fed, so always stock up on food and enhancement potions before heading underground, or you’ll starve to death!
As you work through your grueling days, you’ll be assigned to incomplete building projects and resource extraction, where you’ll uncover hidden opportunities that could lead to your freedom. Keep your eyes peeled for the Super Pickaxe—a tool so powerful it could be your key to escape!
Along the way, visit merchants to purchase better pickaxes, potions, and other essential supplies to boost your mining efficiency. These tools will help you dig deeper, extract more valuable resources, and stay one step ahead of your captors. Who knows what secrets the mine holds? Keep digging, upgrading, and planning your way to freedom!
Challenge yourself and earn maximum coins. Get to know the characters of the prison. Be attentive; perhaps they are hiding something from you. Get as many upgrades as possible so you can mine resources faster and more efficiently. Increase your luck to mine more resources per block. Upgrade your mine to generate more ore. Find, buy, and sell resources to merchants: new different kinds of picks, food, torches, dynamite, and much more.
Don't get too used to this vibrant life in prison—your aim, after all, is to escape.

items.title: Pixel Warfare
items.description:
Start an online battle instantly
Pixel Warfare features active game rooms where you can join and instantly start fighting in online battles! Each game room has several maps and various settings so that you can find the perfect game.
Use your arsenal of weaponry
Pixel Warfare features a variety of weapons you can scroll through when you’ve started a match. There’s a shotgun, sniper, rocket launcher, machinegun, and many other weapons. They all contain a set amount of ammunition. You have every weapon by default, so there is no need to unlock them.
Create a private room
If you want full control over the game, you can start a personalized game room with custom options. Here you can choose the game mode, map, round duration, max players, weapons to allow, and more.
Build up your stats
Pixel Warfare will remember your kills, deaths, and K/D ratio, displaying them to you in the menu screen, so you can see how well you’re doing over time.

items.title: Poxel.io
items.description:
Invite your friends to play with you by hosting a game with them and playing in real-time together. Play the game more to continue progressing and advancing your levels so you can earn PX coins and buy skins, characters, hats, back items, and more! Keep playing the game, and you can eventually reach the top of the leaderboard, so you can show the world that you are #1 in Poxel.io
Poxel.io is fast-paced multiplayer chaos where sharp reflexes and smart movement are your keys to survival. You’ll need eyes in the back of your head to stay alive and to climb your way to the top of the leaderboard.
You’re dropped into a maze-like battleground armed and ready. Your goal? Take down enemies while dodging incoming fire. But don’t just shoot anything that moves, some players are your teammates. They’ll be clearly labeled, so watch your fire. What goes around definitely comes around.
You can host private games and invite friends to battle in real time. The more you play, the more you progress, the more you earn PX coins and gems, which you can use to unlock cool content.

items.title: Skyblock Survive With Noob!
items.description:
You have a lot of freedom to explore Skyblock with Noob. This sandbox game offers adventure and exploration, making it so addictive. You begin with a few basic resources, but early on, you discover how easy it is to find more all around you. Noob has the potential to dig or break the terrain around him with a left click of the mouse. Chip away to find treasures and essentials and dig across this and other floating islands.
There are a few necessary moves to make to explore with Noob properly, and they include destroying blocks, placing blocks, dropping items, checking your inventory, and more.
A few fun features make it easier to navigate the floating islands, like getting dynamite and using it to explode everything or getting a jet pack; movement is easier as you can glide through the sky. Before that, avoid falling to your death and losing all the hard-earned items you've collected.
Possibilities are nearly endless with Noob. The important thing is to have fun and explore!

items.title: Stickman Epic
items.description:
In Stickman Epic, your main goal is to clear each level by defeating zombies and bosses while constantly upgrading your hero. The game will start with a quick tutorial teaching you what your stickman is capable of. You will learn to walk left and right, easy enough. Other moves are jumps and double jumps—these are crucial to master as levels progress. The space bar is used to fight your opponent. Multiple clicks will do the job.
There are 15 chapters in Stickman Epic and they include:
Chapter 1 is fairly easy, and you can practice your moves while gathering coins and rewards. Chapter 2 begins to get trickier immediately, with new obstacles such as lava introduced to quickly keep you on your toes, forcing you to practice your jumps. Chapter 3 is the real test of your stickman's strength—this is where you and a giant zombie will battle to the finish. You may have to repeat this round several times to get enough rewards to unlock the rest of the rounds.
With a wide array of 72 different armor options, you can customize your stickman’s defense to withstand even the toughest of foes. The right combination of armor will give you a tactical advantage, making you an unstoppable force. Whether you’re facing off against challenging zombies or navigating terrifying terrain, every decision you make will impact your chances of survival. Conquer 15 thrilling levels and test your combat skills in epic showdowns with six powerful bosses, or prove your endurance in Survival Mode for endless action.

items.title: 8 Ball Billiards Classic
items.description:
8 Ball Billiards Classic is much like the classic in-person game: your goal is to pocket all your balls (either solids or stripes) and sink the 8-ball to win. Use your mouse to aim the cue stick and adjust the power of your shot. Click and drag the cue stick back to set your shot’s power, then release it to strike the cue ball. This is a 2-player game, so carefully plan each shot to outmaneuver your opponent and clear the table before they do!
You can use the settings to choose the ability of your AI-controlled opponents and, if you are good at it, you can also remove the visual help that allows you to understand the trajectory of your shots.

items.title: 8 Ball Pool Billiards Multiplayer
items.description:
8 Ball Pool Billiards is just like your classic pool game, where your objective is to pot your balls into the pockets. This game adds a fun twist in that you can play with random players from all around the world, helping you enhance your game to a pro-level with continued practice.
The game begins with a break shot where you hit the cue ball to scatter the other balls. Your objective is to pot the balls into pockets using the cue ball where possible. The first break will tell you whether you are stripes or solids, depending on what ball you get in the pocket first.
In each turn, aim to strike the cue ball to hit your target ball into a pocket. If successful, you continue your turn; otherwise, your opponent takes their turn. The key is to use strategic shots to position the cue ball for the next play and try to control the table by positioning balls to your advantage. The direction of where your ball will land is outlined from the stick to the ball with an arrow, giving you an indication of the target path.
The player who pots all their balls first wins the game.
Choose from numerous game rooms such as a private two-player game between you and your friend, a quick play game where you choose your level and play against the public quickly, or a local play where you may need to wait a bit to be matched with a live partner.

Use your arrow keys to move all the tiles in the specified direction. Every time you move, another two is spawned into the game. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one, doubling the numerical value. Keep sliding the tiles around until you reach your highest score. The final objective is to get one tile to reach the number 2048. Be careful to think about your movements, as the board will keep filling up each time you move! If the board fills all the way without you reaching 2048, it's game over.

items.title: Bolts and Nuts
items.description:
The game is a classic puzzle game where you aim to strategically remove bolts so that the panels they are holding up all fall off the game screen. Once you remove a bolt, you need to add it to a free hole. The only obstacle is that there is a limited number of free holes, and some inadvertently get covered by the panels you freed up. This means you need to think a few steps ahead before acting fast.
As you advance in levels, the task becomes more complicated, and you need to discern how best to beat the clock. There are over a hundred levels in the game, which become increasingly more complex. No need to worry; the levels may get more complex over time, but you also accumulate more points, which you can use to buy help, such as screwdrivers to remove bolts for which there is no room, or time freezers.
This is one of those games where finishing a level brings satisfaction, but then you quickly want to move on to the next round and test your skill once again. It is an addictive game of logic, risk, and quick thinking.
Bolts and Nuts is a feel-good game suitable for children, but it also provides adults with the opportunity to challenge their problem-solving skills.

items.title: Candy Riddles
items.description:
Candy Riddles Gameplay
Candy Riddles is similar to Candy Crush but with its own unique style of gameplay. Match three or more candies to eliminate the row and unlock new candies that give you special abilities. Each level comes with a unique design that makes you think differently.
Candy Riddles Levels
As you move through the levels as a candy-matching machine, you'll unlock new items and challenges that keep the gameplay fresh. These can be collectible elements like honey or special sweets for matching longer chains of candy. For example, in level 3, matching five sweets will give you a rainbow cake! This eliminates all of the matched colors, creating a tasty avalanche of treats. There's much more to discover at each level, so give the game a try!

items.title: Chess Free
items.description:
Chess Free follows the classic rules of chess. The objective is to checkmate your opponent's king, meaning it is in a position to be captured and cannot escape.
You can play against the computer, compete online with real players, or share the same screen with a friend. With 18 difficulty levels ranging from Beginner to World Champion, you can play based on your level.
Depending on your level, you can choose a "handicap," so you have a bit of an advantage. You can also enable hints and interactive tips to help guide you throughout.
The rules are basic—players take turns moving their pieces. Pawns move forward but capture diagonally, knights move in an L-shape, and other pieces have unique movement patterns. Strategy is key in chess. Protect your pieces, control the center of the board, and anticipate your opponent's moves. The game ends when one player's king is checkmated, resulting in a win or if a draw occurs under certain conditions.
In chess, a draw is a result where neither player wins, and the game ends in a tie. This can happen for several reasons, such as stalemate (where a player has no legal moves but is not in check), repetition of the same position three times, 50 moves without a capture or pawn move, insufficient material to checkmate, or mutual agreement between the players.
Made a mistake?
No problem—use the move cancel feature to undo and rethink your strategy. After each match, detailed analysis highlights errors and suggests better moves, while the option to replay specific moments helps reinforce learning.
You can save your rating and pick different time control modes like bullet, blitz, and rapid. Customize the board and pieces to your liking, review your move history, and even express yourself with playful cartoon emotions as you interact with your opponent.

items.title: Circle The Cat
items.description:
Click the circles to create a barrier. Capturing the cat can be quite tricky. It’s best to start from further away from the cat, because if you build too close, that cat will always find a way to squeeze past!
When you’ve figured it out and built a fairly wide, closed perimeter, you must then fill it with circles until the cat has no circles to jump to. At this point, you’ve circled the cat, and the game starts again.

items.title: Color Match
items.description:
In Color Match, your goal is to match the color of an object presented to you using a series of available colors. The challenge is to mix and combine different colors until you reach the correct shade that closely matches the object.
You can only move on to the next round once you've matched the color to a high percentage. At first, if you manage to match 60% of the color, you’ll need to keep experimenting. At 70%, you're getting closer, but it's still not enough. When you finally reach 90%, that’s when you’ve nailed it!
Once you've mixed the right colors and achieved the exact match, you can apply that color to the object and compare it side by side with the original. This visual comparison helps you see just how close you were to the perfect match!
The objects you’ll need to match colors for include a variety of items like an avocado, a tomato, cherries, watermelon, and more. Keep matching and refining your color-mixing skills to progress further in the game!

items.title: Cut the Rope
items.description:
After you pass the tutorial, the game begins with the monster Om Nom inside a box, which gets opened in front of you. Inside the box, there are candies and stars. You'll have to cut the ropes holding the candies in the correct order so the candies swing and collect all the stars, then feed Om Nom. Sometimes, you must slice through the rope at the right moment so it falls in the right direction.
You need a certain number of stars to continue progress in Cut the Rope. As you get further, you’ll encounter new puzzle elements like bubbles and air cushions. Use these devices to secure all the stars before feeding little Om Nom.

items.title: Detective IQ: Brain Games
items.description:
With each mystery solved, your Detective IQ: Brain Game rises and brings you closer to the upper ranks of the Detective Society. It’s all about thinking critically, solving puzzles, and honing the skills real detectives use daily. Each brain game you tackle helps sharpen your observation and logical reasoning, challenging you to become sharper, quicker, and more insightful.
In Detective IQ, you’ll encounter hundreds of thrilling cases to test your abilities and observation skills. Master detective skills—like observation, logic, and problem-solving—and rise through the Detective Society ranks, just like Detective Mehul. What is your ultimate goal? Legendary status. Weekly new stories and criminals keep the challenges fresh, so there’s always a new case to crack. And once you catch a criminal, choose from unique punishments to bring justice to each case. Start as a rookie and climb the path to becoming a legendary detective!
Join the adventure in Detective IQ, available in 9 languages. Solve mini mysteries like: “Who ate the cake?” (Was it the boy with cake on his face?), “Who’s faking their pregnancy?” (Could it be the woman with the pillow under her shirt?), and “Who’s hiding the evidence?” (Where’s the handprint? Where’s the knife?). Solve puzzles, uncover clues, and claim rewards as you test your detective mettle. Can you match wits with Detective Mehul and rise to the top?

items.title: Diner in the Storm
items.description:
In Diner in the Storm, every interaction brings you deeper into the mysterious world of this stormy night. As soon as you enter the diner, you're greeted by Maggie, the friendly yet wary waitress.
Maggie:"Come on in, sweetheart, and close the door behind you. This storm isn’t letting up anytime soon. Grab a seat—I’ll bring you a hot coffee and the menu."
Maggie gestures towards the radio, giving you a subtle hint:"Feel free to change the music if you want."
As you settle in, the game’s atmosphere intensifies. You begin to overhear snippets of a conversation from a nearby booth. Ethan, a jittery customer, is talking to Edith, though she doesn’t seem interested.
Ethan:"Did you see anything weird in the sky on your way here?"
Edith:"Ugh, here we go again…"
Ethan, undeterred, leans in:"I swear, we saw something huge—like flickering lights—just before the storm hit. Well... I saw it anyway."
At this point, you’re prompted to decide how to respond. Asking the right question might nudge Ethan to reveal something eerie, like: "I’m telling you, it was aliens. No way that was just lightning!"
As you explore further, another patron, Juan, catches your eye. His reaction is far from friendly.
Juan:"What are you looking at?"
His aggressive tone suggests you should steer clear, and the game allows you to choose whether to confront him or simply move along. Either way, he doesn’t seem like someone who wants company.
Wandering through the diner, you spot a woman who seems familiar. She notices your glance and quickly cuts you off:"No photos, no autographs."
You ask who she is, and the game reveals that she's none other than Bruna Starr, a social media sensation."Bruna Starr, three million followers. You seriously don’t know me?"
You can respond,"I’m not on the app. I listen to the radio instead."
She shrugs, her voice detached:"Well, I travel a lot. Guess you could say I’m off the grid."
Another figure, Csapar, an older, mysterious man, sits alone at a booth. When you ask to join him, he nods quietly.
"I’m no ghost,"he says with a knowing smile,"but I’ve got stories that might make you believe otherwise."
In Diner in the Storm, these conversations aren't just filler—they lead you deeper into the puzzle-filled world, where every dialogue unlocks new clues about the diner, its patrons, and the strange forces at play outside. Your goal is to uncover the truth behind the storm—or become another unsolved mystery.
There are multiple scenarios that can take place, but your ultimate goal is to get everyone out of the diner and to safety in a town nearby named Hope Springs.

items.title: Farm Merge Valley
items.description:
Merge to grow your farm
Build the perfect farm life for your friendly neighbors and animals. Start by merging crops to reach new types of things to grow. You can create various animals, crops, and materials to produce goods and repair buildings.
Level up your experience
Keep merging to gain experience points and increase your level. You will unlock new items and rewards that help you progress in the game when you level up. Leveling up brings more game features to enjoy and areas that help expand your farm.
Fulfil orders to earn money
When your animals produce output, you can use the product to manufacture goods to sell for money. You can use your currency to purchase new areas of land and grow your farm to new heights. You'll find new buildings to renovate and expand your production to new heights that deliver greater monetary rewards.

items.title: Find Me: Lost Objects
items.description:
In Find Me Lost Objects, you'll work through several rounds, including Hello Octopo, Sweet Home, Abandoned Reef, Sea Trip, Ancient World, Walk in Space, In the Insect World, Ghost Town, Polar Expedition, Toward the Dream, and Pirate Island. Let’s start with the first level, Hello, Octopo.
Meet Octopo, who needs your help in this point-and-click game! Their friend Octopka has disappeared today, and your task is to find her hats. The first one is a striped black-and-white hat with a red ribbon. There are plenty of hats around, but you won’t move on until you find it. You can explore by holding the mouse and moving the landscape, zooming in and out – there’s more to this underwater area than meets the eye.
Next, Octopo’s hats are dark brown with a brim, and finding them won’t be easy with the colorful, vast sea around you. Keep your eyes peeled! Octopo is getting worried because their favorite Octopushka hasn’t returned, so they suggest heading outside to look for her. Your next task awaits in Sweet Home, where you’ll need to find Octopushka.
In Sweet Home, ask around to see if anyone has seen Octopushka. You’ll also need to find a few more objects. One hint is that Octopushka asked the chef Octopus if they had any mushrooms for soup – she must have gone looking for them! Another octopus mentions she was last seen by a fish near the Abandoned Reef, a dangerous place filled with pirates. Better get moving!
Click on seahorses and fish for points! As you move through each round, new underwater challenges await. Look for items listed in the right menu by exploring the image, and if you’re stuck, use the hint button shaped like a magnifying glass. Good luck!

items.title: Hexa Sort
items.description:
Hexa Sort is a captivating and brain-teasing puzzle game that combines strategy with vibrant design. Your mission is to arrange hexagons on a 19-space board by matching their bold primary colors—blue, red, yellow, green, and more. To clear the board, you must place hexagons of the same color close together. Once aligned and unobstructed, they stack automatically with satisfying ASMR-inspired sound effects, but there’s a catch—they must match exactly. The smooth 3D graphics and vibrant palette make every move visually appealing, creating a relaxing yet immersive gameplay experience.
The real challenge lies in the hexagons’ multiple-layered colors, which add a clever layer of complexity. To reveal and match the colors underneath, you must first stack the top layers. This means strategic placement is key; you’ll need to position hexagons near similar colors to ensure cascading matches when the top layers are cleared. It’s a puzzle that requires both foresight and precision and as the stacks build up, so does the satisfaction of mastering each move.
To keep things engaging, Hexa Sort includes exciting power-ups and boosters, giving you the tools to overcome even the trickiest situations. Whether you’re a casual player or a puzzle enthusiast, the game’s combination of vibrant visuals, smooth mechanics, and rewarding challenges makes it as relaxing as it is addictive. Dive into Hexa Sort and discover a colorful world where strategy meets satisfaction!

items.title: JuicyJong
items.description: This is is more than just a puzzle. It's a test of your observational skills and strategic thinking! Get ready to swipe, match, and think your way through the addictive world of JuicyJong!

items.title: Light Line
items.description:
Light Line is a simple yet challenging puzzle game where your goal is to light up every space on the board. Start by tapping the glowing starting point and dragging a continuous line through the blank spaces, ensuring every block is filled without lifting your finger or leaving any block empty.
If you’re stuck, don’t worry—use the hint button! It will highlight the correct path to guide you through tricky stages. You only have a few tries, so use it only once you have exhausted all your options.
With 100 levels to unlock, the game starts off easy but quickly ramps up in difficulty, testing your logic and precision.
The key to success lies in carefully planning your route. Some levels feature complex layouts that require trial and error to perfect. Others are pretty straightforward. Just remember you can't light the same cube twice, so plan ahead and don't hesitate to try again. You can always trace back and erase your steps to start the round over again.

items.title: Lines
items.description:
The goal of Lines is to connect all the segments across the screen by rotating them into place. Simply click on a line segment to adjust its position until it aligns with the others. Once all the lines are connected, the round is complete, and the next challenge begins.
The lines don’t need to be straight, they just need to form a continuous connection. Early levels are simple and require only a few clicks, but the puzzles become increasingly challenging as you progress. Strategic thinking is essential to connect all pieces with the fewest clicks, as no line can remain disconnected.
Helpful speech bubbles may appear with tips, but they can be hidden by clicking if they block your view. Multiple solutions may exist, and not every puzzle piece needs to be used as long as the lines connect from left to right.
The game offers various level packs, starting with the first set of five puzzles. Some puzzles feature only one valid solution. Use the level selection button in the top-left corner to navigate between levels.
If a puzzle becomes too challenging, you can watch an ad for assistance to advance to the next round. With increasingly complex designs, this game offers a true brain-teasing experience!

items.title: Ludo King
items.description:
You can start an online game or play against the computer, with just one additional player or play against three opponents in a 4 player challenge.
Choose your color and then start the game. Each player will take turns to roll the dice.

items.title: Mahjong Shanghai
items.description:
Find the matching pairs and click to remove them. This will reveal more tiles to match and clear the board. Play Mahjong Shanghai until there are no exposed pieces left, or you run out of moves!
The Shanghai Mahjong mode features the traditional 144 tile setup. There is no way to shuffle the tiles so you have to think about your moves. The kids mode features fewer mahjong tiles to make it easier for kids to play.

items.title: Mahjong Titans
items.description: Click on two tiles of the same kind to remove them from the stack. This is only possible if you can move the tile left or right without disturbing other tiles. When you remove tiles higher up, it reveals further tiles to play underneath. There are 144 tiles to match in a traditional Mahjong Solitaire game, so sit back and enjoy the dramatic Chinese music while you solve the puzzle!

items.title: Mahjongg Solitaire
items.description:
Spot the patterns
Mahjong is a tricky puzzle game. There are so many tiles, many of which look the same but feature slight differences. Along with the need to spot these patterns, you can’t move any pieces with both sides blocked. The left or right side needs to be accessible, at least.
Finding a couple of “free” tiles is the challenge here, with a tile-free being when there are no tiles on top of it. In addition, either its left or right side needs to be open. In this version of Mahjong Solitaire, you can look at the top of your screen to understand how many pairs of tiles are “free” to be matched, plus you can match the special tiles, those with a colored background, anytime.
Use hints when you’re stuck
Mahjongg Solitaire features hints if you get stuck, but unlike some other mahjong games, it does not have a shuffle feature. The games are also timed, meaning there is some urgency to how many tiles you can match.
When the game ends, you’ll get a score for the tiles you matched and a bonus for how far you got in the game before your time ran out.

items.title: Match Arena
items.description: You only have a limited number of moves per match. Therefore, you must think carefully about each move you make to ensure it is efficient. You can also watch your opponent's moves in real-time to see exactly what they are doing and how they are progressing. This game really does provide an interesting twist on the match-three genre! Check out the map-progression version in Skydom.

items.title: Mirror Room Escape
items.description:
Step into a room filled with mirrors and intricate puzzles, where every reflection holds a clue. Your goal is to decipher the hidden patterns, align the mirrors correctly, and unlock the path to escape.
This first-person pov game will have you nudging at door knobs and circling the room looking for the next clue.
Start by analyzing the mirror with digit tiles: observe how numbers reflect and use them to crack the passcode. As you progress, you'll encounter color-coded symbols, stepping platforms, and a locked drawer requiring precise rotations. Each puzzle builds upon the last, challenging you to interpret mirrored hints, decipher sequences, and manipulate objects strategically.
Use collected mirrors to reveal new clues, unlock compartments, and align reflections. Rotate objects according to their mirrored angles, match colors based on their reflections, and follow step-by-step sequences to activate hidden mechanisms. Keep an eye on details like the positioning of arrows, reflections of letters, and the direction of laser beams bouncing off mirrors.
With each successful puzzle solved, you'll gather keys, tools, and hints leading you closer to the final escape. Precision, observation, and logical thinking will guide you through this mind-bending mirrored maze.

items.title: Open House
items.description:
You, Oscar, are fresh off a rough flight, and things couldn’t have started worse. Somewhere during the trip, all your belongings fell out of the plane. You beg Theo, the pilot who took you to this island, to turn back so you can find them, but he refuses, saying he has too many passengers. He takes off without you.
Trying to stay positive, you decide this might be the perfect chance to start over in your new beachside home. After all, it’s only a suitcase… and luckily, you were wearing your favorite shirt during the flight. Time to see your new place.
You greet your neighbor, who’s not exactly welcoming, then head toward your new home only to find it looks nothing like the pictures from the real estate listing. The porch is falling apart, the rooms are wrecked, and it’s clear today is not your day. You can’t help but wonder if you’re on some sort of prank show.
Your first quest is to remove all the covers from the furniture in hopes of finding a hidden camera. To do this, you’ll complete match-3 puzzles that appear on the screen. Each match earns points and helps you move forward.
As you work, you notice the place is so bad that it even has critters running around. It’s time to contact the real estate agency. You sit at your computer only for the desk to collapse. You’ll need to replace both the desk and the chair before you can write to Mr. Fraudley, the man who sold you this disaster of a house. You send him a message explaining the mess… and get blocked immediately.
Just when you’re feeling hopeless, your neighbor Charles surprises you by finding your missing suitcases, but the purple flower, which means a lot to you, is still missing. He advises you to get a wardrobe to store your clothes. After that, you’ll need a good night’s rest, which means buying a new bed.
Between each home repair or furniture purchase, you’ll play match-3 puzzles to earn what you need. Every successful round brings you closer to fixing up the house.
You keep trying to leave the island, but something always stops you. In the meantime, you keep decorating, cleaning, and repairing. Over time, you might just discover that this wrecked beach house has the potential to become the dream home you never knew you wanted.

items.title: Parking Jam
items.description:
Everyone's been stuck in a parking jam, but the real challenge is figuring out how to escape!
This is a satisfying puzzle game where you click and drag cars to clear them from a crowded parking lot and onto the street. As you progress through the rounds, the difficulty increases, with road barriers and tighter spaces making it harder to maneuver the vehicles. Careful planning is key to getting all the cars out.
Cars can be moved in reverse, allowing for different strategies to clear the jam. Each puzzle comes with a limited number of moves, so you’ll need to think ahead and use them wisely. Your score also reflects how many players have successfully solved the same parking jam, giving you a sense of the challenge level.
Some levels, like Level 11, are especially tricky due to the sheer number of cars blocking the way. Can you navigate through the toughest jams and free up the lot?

items.title: Piece of Cake: Merge and Bake
items.description:
In Piece of Cake: Merge and Bake, your goal is to merge matching items to create new ones until the board is cleared of all matches. Start by clicking on the toast pan to make toast. Merge two pieces of toast to get toast with a sunny-side-up egg, and continue merging upgraded items like salami, sandwiches, and beyond. Each new combination helps you progress through the game.
As you complete customer orders by matching the correct items, you'll earn money to restore the café and other locations around town. Each renovation reveals more of the town's hidden story, making your progress both satisfying and intriguing. The game's beautiful graphics and detailed animations make every step feel rewarding.
The puzzles are fun and very addictive, pushing you to think strategically as you merge as many items as possible. Along with daily missions offering valuable prizes, you can also fulfill special customer orders to earn additional rewards. As you advance, new areas of the game will unlock, with new challenges and even more complex puzzles to solve.
To help you on your journey, the game offers boosters that speed up your progress, whether you're merging items, fulfilling orders, or upgrading locations. The user-friendly interface makes it easy to play, and every merge is just one click away.
With its combination of charming visuals, story-driven gameplay, and strategic merging, Piece of Cake: Merge and Bake is an all-around fun game where you will rebuild the café and uncover the secrets of the town while merging.

items.title: Piles of Mahjong
items.description:
Piles of Mahjong brings a fresh twist to the classic Mahjong formula with some exciting new dynamics. The game has most of the same foundational rules as a classic game of tablemahjong, but instead of simply matching two tiles, your goal is to match three tiles from a pile featuring a mix of familiar patterns like circles and sticks, alongside fun new additions like bird and panda heads. To make a match, you must select tiles by clicking on them, and they’ll move to one of the seven empty spaces at the bottom of the screen.
But be careful! If you fill all seven spaces without making any triple matches, it’s game over. Strategic thinking is essential to clear the pile and avoid running out of space.
The game offers helpful features to assist you when you’re stuck, but they come with a price. You can reshuffle the tiles with 300 reward points or by watching an ad, flip all the tiles face up for the same cost, or even auto-match tiles in the bottom row with 100 reward points or an ad.
To add to the challenge, you start with two chances to remove a tile from the bottom area. Once those chances are used up, you will need to spend 100 reward points or watch an ad to earn another set of removals. These are useful if you are close to filling up your bottom spaces or if you find some tiles to pair with no space to move them to.
With its engaging twists and strategic layers, Piles of Mahjong tests your puzzle-solving skills while adding a bit of pressure to every move you make!

items.title: Skydom
items.description:
Each level you play in Skydom has an objective. This objective typically involves clearing a certain amount of a particular object or gemstone. When you do, the level is complete, and you get rewarded! Some levels also put you in competition against other players online.
What's unique about Skydom is that every second level, you will have to challenge an opponent to get through and reach the next stage. So the game won't be as relaxed and "solo" as most Match 3 games, but there will be some tension and another player to benchmark against.
Additionally, after completing 10 levels, you will unlock a Daily Challenge, offering even more opportunities for additional earnings.

items.title: Solitr
items.description:
The objective of the Solitr game is similar to that of the tabletop card version of Solitaire—you must move all your cards to the four foundation piles located in the upper right corner of the screen, leaving none on the board.
The rules are straightforward—stack each pile of cards in ascending order from King to Ace of the same suit. Once you have a complete ascending order, you can place these cards in the upper right corner. There is a hidden stockpile at the top left of the screen, which you can choose to display one or three cards, but only one will be available for movement at a time.
You will want to strategically move the uncovered stockpile card onto one of the seven tableau columns, depending on whether it can be placed in ascending order. You can drag cards to move them onto the seven tableau columns or to the four foundations. Remember that the seven columns only allow for alternating colors to be placed in ascending order.
For building rules, cards in the foundations must be stacked by the same suit in ascending order, from Ace to King. In the tableau, cards need to be stacked in alternating colors, from high rank (King) to low rank (Ace). Additionally, any empty spots in the tableau can be filled with a King of any suit.
As the deck is shuffled in random order, you must carefully strategize to find the correct moves as you reveal cards one by one. This is the essence of the solitaire challenge.
You can move either single cards or piles of cards within the tableau, but you can only move cards from the waste pile. Whenever you expose a face-down card in a tableau column, that card will automatically turn face-up for you.

items.title: Thief Puzzle
items.description:
In Thief Puzzle, you're tasked with a series of sneaky heists in various comical settings. You'll start by testing your skills in simple situations: snatching a purse from an old woman seated on a bench or grabbing groceries from two unsuspecting women from a ledge. As you progress, the challenges escalate. You’ll even swipe a tourist’s suitcase while they admire the Eiffel Tower and outwit a rival thief to steal a money bag in a museum. There’s never a dull moment as you navigate your way through each clever scenario.
From beachside schemes where you steal a pearl from a shell to slipping into restricted areas by pickpocketing a key, every level brings new surprises. As the difficulty increases, you’ll find yourself pulling off trickier moves like swiping a diamond ring from a newly engaged couple while they’re lost in a kiss or lifting answers from a classmate’s test without getting caught by whirling fans. You’ll also have to outsmart guard dogs to steal car keys, drive away with precision, avoid TNT explosions, and—just for fun—snatch a toupee from the head of a party guest.
As the levels progress, you will need increasing sharp thinking and precise timing as you carefully plot your moves to avoid detection and snatch the prize. With every stage growing more challenging, you'll need to outwit elaborate defenses using clever strategies and creative solutions.
Sharp thinking alone won't cut it. You will need to calculate the perfect angles and find the shortest path to avoid detection. The puzzles are designed to challenge your wit and timing, requiring you to navigate obstacles and interact with dynamic environments. The slightest misstep could alert your target or trigger traps, so precision is key as you outmaneuver everything from dogs, furniture, and, of course, unsuspecting victims.

items.title: Tic Tac Toe Online
items.description:
The strategy is the same as the classic pen-and-paper game. You can choose to be a naught or a cross, and your aim is to match 3 in a row to win the game, all the while blocking your opponent from being able to match 3 before you. There’s a basic level of strategy to the game that suits all players' ages.
In this version of Tic Tac Toe, you can play online multiplayer games or local games against the computer or a friend.
Set the right difficulty level
Tic-tac-toe is traditionally played on a 3x3 board. In Tic-tac-toe Online, you can expand that to a 5x5 or 7x7 board for a greater challenge and some exciting games! In these larger board sizes, you match 4 instead of 3 in a row, changing the game entirely.
Play online multiplayer
The online multiplayer game option for Tic Tac Toe is fantastic. There are two modes available: quick match and create a match. If you choose a quick match, you are automatically placed into a random game with another Tic Tac Toe Online player. You can battle it out and rematch them as often as you want.

items.title: Tropical Merge
items.description: Tropical Merge features various exotic objects that you can combine with other items in groups of 3. Merging these three ingredients creates an entirely new object. That object, too, can be combined with two others to produce further upgrades. Each upgrade becomes more valuable as you continue to build your tropical paradise!

items.title: Four Colors
items.description:
There are various strategies you can use to maximize your chances of winning at this multiplayer UNO-inspired game. The main principle is to get rid of all your cards before everyone else. You can do that by matching the color or number of the card placed down before yours. If you don't have a playable card, you must draw cards from the pile until you do.
When you have one card left, press the "1" button, otherwise you will be punished with two penalty cards!

items.title: War Mahjong
items.description:
There are two layers of tiles stacked on top of each other in War Mahjong. Your goal is to clear tiles that are the same and beside each other until all the tiles have disappeared. You clear them by clicking on groups of the same tile. When you clear tiles from the second layer it creates blank space that causes the tiles above to fall in their place. This can potentially create a combo effect.
When you get combos, you'll earn bombs. A combo happens when you match tiles, and it creates a cascading effect that leads to more tiles being matched.
The bombs are vital for end-game play, as you can use them to clear any tile when you have no matches left.

items.title: What's The Difference?
items.description:
Your goal in What's The Difference is to quickly identify subtle changes between two nearly identical images. Your keen eye and swift reflexes will earn you valuable rewards, like stars that unlock treasure chests brimming with prizes. As you progress, you'll have the chance to participate in daily challenges and climb the leaderboards in weekly tournaments, competing against online players from all over.
If you find yourself stuck, don’t worry! You can ask for a hint to guide you to the hidden differences. But be careful not to get click-happy—too many incorrect guesses will result in a mistake warning. To add to the fun, you can express your emotions using emojis, letting other players know if you're feeling frustrated or celebrating a win.\
With over 1,000 levels featuring bright, high-quality images of animals, nature, sweets, and more, "What's the Difference?" offers endless entertainment for all ages. The playful scenes and colorful missions make it a great game for the whole family to enjoy together. And don’t forget to update your avatar as you progress and get ready for a thrilling speed round!
Are you ready to become the best at photo hunts and puzzle solving? Travel through different worlds, find the five differences online, complete your photo hunt, participate in exciting events, and earn rewards! Do you think you can be faster than other players? Then get ready to master What's The Difference?

items.title: Wood Block Journey
items.description:
Wood Block Journey is a Tetris-inspired puzzle game where the goal is to clear the board by forming lines using various wooden shapes made up of tiles in different configurations. To clear a row, you need to align shapes like a 4-tile row, T-shaped, L-shaped, or a single tile. When you fill a row completely, it disappears.
For extra points and momentum, you can clear larger blocks by aligning 3x3 tiles. When these blocks align, they vanish, giving you a significant boost!
You can either embark on a journey through vibrant levels with specific missions or play a single classic game. A helpful tutorial will guide you through common moves, like combining a 4-tile row with L-shaped pieces to create 3x3 blocks, the perfect combo to clear larger sections of the board.
Stay strategic, keep the board clear, and enjoy progressing through each level!

items.title: Words of Wonders
items.description:
Words of Wonders is an engaging word puzzle game that combines the excitement of crossword puzzles with the thrill of word search. Players form words by connecting letters in a grid, unlocking hidden words,, and progressing through levels.
You'll see a grid of random letters when you start the game. Each grid represents a level; your task is to find words by connecting adjacent letters. You can swipe your finger over the letters in any direction (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally) to form words. Longer words and more complex combinations may unlock bonus rewards, so watch for opportunities to maximize your word choices.
Connect the letters to form a word. It will be revealed if the word you formed is on the crossword grid. Not all words will be on the grid, so use the letters you have already discovered to ensure you create words that will fit the puzzle!
Completing the grid allows you to unlock the next level, which gets progressively more challenging. The difficulty increases with more letters and words to find, so keep your brain engaged as you move through the game.
Some examples include finding the words “WON,” “OWN,” “NOW,” or “TOP,” “POT,” or “OPT” from a set of three letters. Or a mixture of three and four-letter words to form “WALL,” "ALL,” and “LAW.”
If you find yourself stuck, there are hints and boosters available to help you out. These tools can reveal letters or help you find the next word, though they're limited, so use them wisely. There are also rewards for completing levels or discovering difficult words, such as coins or additional hints, which can help you advance further.
Progress through the levels and collect unique background images with each new milestone. The levels get more difficult by introducing longer words and more letters, increasing the chances of getting it wrong and challenging your vocabulary skills!
Some levels feature specific themes, like landmarks or animals, where the words you form are related to that theme. As you progress, you’ll unlock different "worlds" or locations, each with unique challenges and puzzles. You also get fun bits of info throughout, like learning that The Great Pyramid of Giza is the oldest of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.
The goal is to find all the words in the grid before you run out of moves or time. Each level has a set number of words to complete in order to progress to the next stage. You may also encounter bonus rounds or challenges that offer extra rewards when completed.
As you move through levels, you'll earn points, coins, and other rewards, which will help you advance in the game. Some versions of the game also let you compete against friends or other players, adding a competitive element to the experience.
With its relaxing pace and engaging gameplay, Words of Wonders is a fun way to challenge your mind and expand your vocabulary while enjoying an immersive puzzle-solving experience.
Enjoy a range of exciting and challenging word puzzles in Words of Wonders. The game features an easy starting point to suit players of all ages and experience levels. See how good you are at finding all the words and become a master wordsmith!
Game Tips

items.title: BodyCamera Shooter
items.description:
The goal of a BodyCamera Shooter is to stay alive by neutralizing threats and surviving waves of enemies in unfamiliar territory. The emphasis is often on tactical decision-making, realism, and immersion, with a strong focus on precision and careful movement. You must navigate through environments, often with limited resources and visual awareness, to complete these objectives while maintaining your own survival.
The key to this game is combined reaction time and precision. There are numerous moves to make, and uncertainty greatly outweighs tactical precision, forcing you to adapt and react quickly to unpredictable situations. WASD or arrow keys will navigate your player, but your strength lies in using your keypad or mouse to aim and shoot.
Focus on mastering movement while aiming and shooting at first. You'll likely get killed while practicing this, but it is hard to move on to more skillful moves until this is down pat.
Once you gain a bit of momentum, incorporate a bit of running (shift key) and jumping (space bar) to avoid enemy fire and navigate your surroundings more quickly.
The R key will be vital once you master your craft; it will reload your weapon quickly. Use this when surrounded by enemy fire to avoid wasting time with automatic reloads.
You can upgrade your soldier through six different levels, each corresponding to a new weapon that will be unlocked as you progress through the levels.
There are four different scenarios for the combat: the first two will be available immediately, while to access the Counter-Strike looking map, you will have to reach level 5, and the last one will only be accessible after reaching level 10.

items.title: BuildNow GG
items.description: BuildNow GG is part of an emerging genre of online game that combines tactical building with third-person shooter gameplay.

items.title: Downtown 1930s Mafia
items.description:
Downtown 1930s is an action-packed multiplayer third-person shooter where you choose your weapon color, car, and character to take control of the streets in the fictional Empire City. Equipped with a vintage car, a powerful weapon, and a tailored suit, your goal is to lead your gang to survival, dominate the city, and maintain respect in this ever-evolving world. With gameplay influenced by community feedback, Downtown 1930s is constantly being improved, offering a dynamic experience where the action never stops.
Features include an open world, intense gunfights, and high-speed driving. You can engage in epic gang drive-bys, choose your character, and even shoot at gas station pumps for explosive splash damage. Plus, the game includes a filter for bad words, ensuring a fun and friendly environment. Invite friends to play together in the same room, whether you're fighting in the streets or strategizing your next move.
The game offers two types of rooms: the Full Fight room, where no admin controls the action, and anyone can challenge you to a fight: just be ready for tough gameplay; and the Admin room, where a player manages the room and enforces rules. If the admin leaves, the room turns into a Full Fight room, so make sure to respect the rules and other players for the best experience. Empire City. It is a third-person shooter under permanent development driven by advice and ideas of the community.

items.title: Fragen
items.description:
In Fragen, you take on the role of a soldier in full combat gear, ready to fight your way through an abandoned complex filled with enemies. As you roam, you’ll face shooters everywhere, so stay alert. Switch between close-range and long-range guns depending on your position, and always keep an eye both ahead and over your shoulder.
Start by choosing either a solo or team battle, then pick your mode. Solo battle options include free-for-all, sniper only, or secondary weapon only. Team battle offers modes like team deathmatch, gun race, sniper only, and secondary only.
The game features a battle pass where you can earn skins, gear upgrades, and exclusive rewards. Weapon customization lets you fine-tune rifles, shotguns, snipers, and more to fit your style.
For best results, use a controller or mouse, as playing solely with the keyboard can slow you down. Speed and precision are key to survival.
Your arsenal consists of primary and secondary weapons. Check their stats carefully for headshot damage, range, fire rate, and capacity to find what best fits your play style and the current environment. Weapons can only be purchased once you’ve earned enough reward points.
Solo battle modes include:
Team battle modes include:
Rewards vary daily and can include cash, armor, weapons, and more. Since there are no maps to guide you, rely on your instincts to navigate the terrain.
Use the tactical cover system to take advantage of terrain and obstacles, gaining the upper hand in firefights. Prove yourself in ranked modes and clan challenges by climbing leaderboards and competing as a team.
Fight through stunning environments—from neon-lit streets to desert bases and industrial zones. With smooth controls, intuitive aiming, and immersive graphics and sound, Fragen delivers realistic and intense battles for both newcomers and veterans alike.
Get ready for nonstop action where every battle counts, whether you’re going solo, teaming up, or climbing the ranks. With deep customization, tactical gameplay, and stunning environments, this shooter delivers fast, immersive combat that keeps you coming back for more.

items.title: Grandfather Road Chase: Shooter
items.description:
You are in the back of an open truck with an experienced driver driving as fast as possible to avoid enemy fire along long stretches of open road. There is nowhere to hide; you only have courage and your aim. This first-person shooter game boasts realistic graphics during a high-speed chase with you as the target.
Every few levels, your chase will end up within the enemy camp, where you will be tasked with taking down the opponents who are standing against you.
The game is played through the eyes of the shooter and across various levels; you are tasked with shooting down any cars that are tailing you. Will you be able to shoot down the cars catching up with you, or sit idle as they aim in your direction?
What Are My Weapons?
You may have a weak car, but you are not short of an arsenal. You can wield AK47s, miniguns, flamethrowers, and more to shoot down enemies, but you don't get this full arsenal from the get-go. It's earned through rewards, which are currency to purchase new weapons. Be mindful, before being able to purchase them, you have to unlock the weapons by advancing in the game.
Two types of rewards will help you to expand your choice of weapons:
Daily rewardswill reward you with a few bucks every day
Online rewards: you can get extra dollars by playing for 8, 13 and 17 consecutive minutes
Complete over 50 unique levels, unlock biomes and locations, and defeat all bosses to experience ultimate road madness!

items.title: Muscle Gun.IO
items.description:
In Muscle Gun.IO, an intense first-person shooter, your primary goal is simple—defeat your opponent before they defeat you. Thrust into the heart of battle, you'll navigate unfamiliar terrain, armed and ready to outmaneuver and outgun your enemies. With adrenaline pumping, every encounter becomes a test of skill and strategy as you fight for survival in a variety of challenging environments. Whether you're sprinting across open fields or sneaking through tight corridors, staying sharp and alert is key to victory.
The multiplayer game offers a range of dynamic modes that transport you to different battle zones, each equipped with unique challenges and weapon sets. With 55 customizable weapons available, you can upgrade your arsenal using points earned through combat. Each weapon upgrade allows for deeper customization, so you can adapt your loadout to match your playstyle, the battlefield, and your opponent’s strength. Whether you're a sniper picking off enemies from a distance or a close-combat brawler, your choice of weaponry will make all the difference in outlasting the competition.
The more you play, the more you'll get to know the variety of maps offered and the territory they represent. It's key to study the ins and outs of these locations because it will help you find hiding spots and to better understand where your opponent may be hiding. Be careful of leaving yourself a completely open target to your fierce enemies who want to take you down.

items.title: Ninja Clash Heroes
items.description:
Choose your Ninja Clash hero.Ninja Clash Heroes 3D features various heroes, each with their own weapons arsenal, health stats, and unique buffs. Find an OP hero and go ninja style! The more kills you get with a hero, the further you’ll level up and earn greater HP.
Fight a war in an ancient Japanese setting.Explore a historical map playing as a heavily armed 21st-century ninja hero. Take on the enemy team using your weapon of choice and rack up your highest score yet. Rake in the stars and reach the online daily leaderboard.
Pick-up power-ups around the map.Use health packs and speedy shoes like a true samurai warrior to prolong your survival. Utilize the ancient trampolines to catapult your way across the map and surprise your enemies!
Acquire boxes full of loot.Use the stars you earn to crack open boxes full of new weapons, weapon skins, power-ups, and attractive new attire, so you’re looking fresh on the battlefield.

items.title: Sniper Shot: Bullet Time
items.description:
In Sniper Shot: Bullet Time, an FPS game, you step into the shoes of a highly skilled sniper entrusted with the critical mission of taking down enemies from afar. As you enter this matrix-like grid, take a moment to familiarize yourself with your surroundings. Everything can easily look the same in this monochromatic background.
Scan the environment for potential targets while keeping your weapon ready. The game immerses you in thrilling slow-motion sequences that amplify the intensity of your shots, allowing you to savor every dramatic headshot and strategic kill.
Success in this high-stakes world demands mastery of various shooting techniques. Use your reloads wisely and perfect the art of no-scope shots to get rid of enemies quickly and efficiently. The key is to aim for vital body parts to deliver devastating blows that not only ensure enemy elimination but also add an exhilarating layer of strategy to your gameplay.
But don’t forget to stay vigilant—your enemies are not just sitting ducks. Watch your back and anticipate incoming fire as you navigate the battlefield. Their objective is the same as yours—to eliminate the enemy.
As you progress through increasingly complex levels, keep a close eye on the number of enemies remaining, ensuring you accurately identify each target before squeezing the trigger. Each new wave brings tougher opponents, testing your skills and reflexes like never before.
Good luck, and watch your back!

items.title: Squirrel with a Gun!
items.description:
In Squirrel with a Gun, you’re exactly what the title suggests—a squirrel armed with firepower, taking on a world of ragdoll chaos! The premise is as wild as it sounds: you’ll face off against enemy ragdolls wielding bats, and your mission is to eliminate them on each level.
The game features ragdoll physics that keeps every move unpredictable. Left-click to move and shoot simultaneously, but don’t expect smooth precision—this game is all about finding the perfect balance between timing and movement. As you progress, you can upgrade your arsenal, unlocking more guns, bigger firepower, and increasingly powerful weapons that add to the mayhem.
Each level offers unique challenges. Some enemies might be perched on fragile glass surfaces that you’ll need to shatter, while others roam maze-like environments waiting to take you down. Watch out for the baseball bats—getting hit means you have to start the level over! Strategic shooting is key since some ragdolls might need multiple shots to defeat, depending on where you hit them.
Adding to the challenge, more powerful guns come with a recoil so strong it can propel you into chaotic spins, adding an extra layer of unpredictability. Navigate through intricate levels, dodge enemy attacks, and embrace the absurdity of being a heavily armed squirrel in this one-of-a-kind action-packed adventure.

items.title: Subway Clash Remastered
items.description: Explore the map and shoot the enemy team. Pick up weapons along the way. There are various weapons you’ll find, from the default AK47 to a grenade launcher, rocket launcher, and shotgun. Rack up enough points to defeat your enemy by killing as many as you can, then restart the game!

items.title: Time Shooter 2
items.description:
Time Shooter 2 is a shooting game inspired by the style of SuperHot, featuring the same thrilling action that keeps you determined to beat each level.
The futuristic graphics support the premise that time moves only when you move, so plan your moves wisely. Controlling time is to your advantage. You will be able to stop a bullet in midair to identify how to dodge it. You will also be able to get a good grasp of your surroundings and plan your next ambush.
Anything in the game can be a weapon, and they are all well within reach. Pick up the weapon best fitted to the job and navigate the map, carefully taking down enemies and controlling time with your movements. Anything can be a weapon, so don’t be afraid to use whatever the situation demands.
You can receive endless ammo or invulnerability by watching a short ad for one level only.

items.title: Wild Hunter 3D
items.description:
Step into the wild and take on the role of a skilled hunter. Each hunt presents different animals to track and shoot, but the rugged landscape makes them difficult to spot. Staying alert is key, as the terrain provides plenty of cover for your targets.
Your hunting goals appear in the top-left corner, showing how many deer, boars, or other animals you need to hunt. Completing these objectives earns reward points, and after each successful shot, you’ll see a distance meter displaying how far you were from the target. You can move around to find a better position, but the most rewarding shots come from a distance.
Precision is everything. If you miss, the animal will be startled and run, making it much harder to hit. Moving targets requires skill, and a poorly timed shot could turn the hunt against you. If an animal becomes aware of your presence, it might charge, and a wild boar stampede could end the round instantly.
To improve your aim, you can adjust both general sensitivity and scope sensitivity. Moving closer may give you an easier shot, but true hunters thrive on long-range accuracy. Survive 100 rounds, master the wild, and prove yourself as the ultimate hunter.
Sharpen your aim, manage your resources, and prepare for the thrill of the hunt in Wild Hunter 3D!

items.title: Zombie Hunters Online
items.description:
The aim of Zombie Hunters Online is to ward off and destroy as many zombies as possible.
Shoot zombies
Join the Zombie Hunters Arena and slay zombies as your life depends on it. Pick up power-ups and new weapons for a boost in your defensive and attack capabilities.
Complete tasks
As you move through the levels, there are different tasks you must complete while staying alive. You may have to collect keycards or protect a zone to move through to the next level.
Work together
Work with your teammates to complete each level and jump through the portal to continue progressing to more challenging levels!

items.title: A Small World Cup
items.description:
First thing first, when playing A Small World Cup - you must choose your team. It's the World Cup, so you get to choose from a variety of countries, which include the USA, Argentina, Mexico, Canada, Brazil, Chile, Peru, and plenty more countries. The primary difference between the teams is the color of their shirts.
Once you've chosen your team, you will be matched with another World Cup team, and the match begins. It's as simple as that.
A Small World Cup uses ragdoll gameplay with a left-click aim and release dynamic. This means you will have limited control over movement and must be strategic about what constitutes a winning move, both in offense and defense.
Small movements can produce big results, sometimes not in your favor. If you aim and release with too much force, you may find your ball bouncing back and scoring a goal for the opposing team. You may also want to aim for your opponent and use them in gameplay to block the goal.
The graphics are vibrant, and the sound puts you right in the center of the soccer field, with the crowd roaring at every goal.

items.title: CarBall.io
items.description:
What do you get when you mix a soccer game with a driving game? You get CarBall.io. This unique game combines elements of driving gameplay, such as nitro boosts, with traditional soccer elements, including opposing teams, goal post defense, and offensive strategy. It may sound like an odd combination, but you will immediately love the combination as soon as you find yourself chasing a giant soccer ball across a field with bumper-to-bumper cars inadvertently cornering you as you try to bounce it with the hood of your car.
The game's objective is to score as many goals as possible in your opponent's net. You are part of a team of 3 cars, and AI controls your teammates. Scoring is easier said than done when you're driving. You will essentially need to push the ball with a car, and plenty of other cars will surround you with the same goal, so expect traffic jams.
The game offers limited customization options, but some features are available. You can choose the team color you'd like to join and the type of car you want to drive. This part is key. Select the car that aligns with your strengths and weaknesses. Each car is equipped with different attributes, all of which can be upgraded as you accumulate points.
These are:

items.title: Kick Soccer Hero
items.description:
Kick Soccer Hero is all about scoring goals in the most unpredictable settings imaginable. Sure, you are aiming for the net, but between you and victory lies pure chaos. One round, you might be dodging pallbearers carrying a coffin, another, you will be threading the ball past a scar-faced dancer at a spooky Halloween party. Sometimes you are kicking from the roof of a moving truck on a bridge, other times you are on a rec court where a prison guard is chasing down an escaped inmate. Every match feels like a surprise set piece waiting to happen.
You get three balls per round to make your goal. If an obstacle is blocking the net, you can use a shot to knock it out of the way before going for the score. A guiding line helps you visualize your trajectory, but the path is rarely straightforward.
Clear each round to collect rewards:
Score stylish or complex shots to earn bonus points and trigger reward rounds for even more coins.
Aim with your mouse or by flicking your finger, then launch the ball toward the goal with power or precision. Use clever curve mechanics to bend the ball around defenders, and time your shots to outsmart goalkeepers and avoid moving obstacles. When the net is blocked, hit obstacles directly to clear your path, then go for the score. Keep winning to unlock new heroes, balls, and increasingly wild levels.
Kick Soccer Hero delivers smooth flick controls, hilarious and unpredictable match scenarios, and plenty of opportunities for stylish, high-scoring goals. The variety of environments keeps each round fresh, while the league progression and rewards give you a reason to keep coming back. Whether you are a casual player looking for a quick laugh or a competitive gamer chasing leaderboard glory, every match is an unpredictable adventure worth playing.

items.title: Penalty Shooters 2
items.description:
It's those final minutes of the game. Those tense minutes when penalty shots will make you a champion, lead your team to victory, or send you home. The crowd is roaring. Suspense is in the air. That's what Penalty Shooters 2 is focused on: those final minutes.
You start by choosing your fantasy league from various global leagues. Countries include:
Within each league, you can choose one of the 12 available teams. Their names don’t match the actual soccer clubs, but they are pretty close, and you can figure out who is who if you follow the most important soccer leagues in the world, even though the colors of the jerseys are sometimes very different from the real ones.
There is a short tutorial on maneuvering to play both offense and defense, which is worth reviewing, as these are the key moves to scoring that winning goal.
Focus and concentration will win the game. The game aims to compete in a soccer tournament and win by scoring goals and defending the goal.
Each round has five turns, where you aim to outscore your opponent and advance in this exciting penalty shootout game.
How to score a goal
Holding the mouse will raise the height of the shot; use this to aim for difficult spots, such as the top corners of the net. Be sure to vary your aim, as the goalkeeper will remember your previous shots.
Timing is everything when playing goalie. Watch the shooter and follow the target on screen to ensure you make the right move at the right time.

items.title: Penalty Shooters 3
items.description:
Penalty Shooters 3 lets you switch from ball shooter to goalkeeper, so you get to learn the playing ground from all angles. You start the game by choosing the mode you want to play in. If you choose Tier Mode, you will be met with six challenges (Tier 1 - Tier 6). You can only access Tier 1 to begin with until you win enough trophies to unlock other tiers.
How many trophies do you need to unlock various tiers?
